Quran Translation.1974: Invent not similitudes For God   for God knoweth  And ye know not
Quran Translation.1975: God sets forth the Parable  Of two men   one  a slave Under the dominion of another   He has no power of any sort   And  the other  a man On whom We have bestowed Goodly favours from Ourselves  And he spends thereof  freely   Privately and publicly   Are the two equal    By no means &semi   Praise be to God  But Most of them understand not
Quran Translation.1976: God sets forth  another  Parable Of two men   one of them Dumb  with no power Of any sort   a wearisome burden Is he to his master   Whichever way he directs him  He brings no good   Is such a man equal With one who commands Justice  and is on A Straight Way
Quran Translation.1977: To God belongeth the Mystery Of the heavens and the earth  And the Decision of the Hour  Of Judgment  is as The twinkling of an eye  Or even quicker   For God hath power Over all things
Quran Translation.1978: It is He Who brought you Forth from the wombs Of your mothers when Ye knew nothing   and He Gave you hearing and sight And intelligence and af s   That ye may give thanks  To God
Quran Translation.1979: Do they not look at The birds  held poised In the midst of  the air And  the sky   Nothing Holds them up but  the power Of  God  Verily in this Are Signs for those who believe
Quran Translation.1980: It is God Who made your habitations Homes of rest and quiet For you  and made for you  Out of the skins of animals   Tents for  dwellings  which Ye find so light  and handy  When ye travel and when Ye stop  in your travels    And out of their wool  And their soft fibres  Between wool and hair   And their hair  rich stuff And articles of convenience  To serve you  for a time
Quran Translation.1981: It is God Who made  Out of the things He created  Some things to give you shade   Of the hills He made some For your shelter   He made you Garments to protect you From heat  and coats of mail To protect you from Your  mutual  violence  Thus does He complete His favours on you  that Ye may bow to His Will  in Islām
Quran Translation.1982: But if they turn away  Thy duty is only to preach The Clear Message
Quran Translation.1983: They recognise the favours Of God   then they deny them   And most of them Are  creatures  ungrateful
Quran Translation.1984: One day We shall raise From all Peoples a Witness   Then will no excuse be accepted From Unbelievers  nor will they Receive any favours
Quran Translation.1985: When the wrong doers  Actually  see the Penalty  Then will it in no way Be mitigated  nor will they Then receive respite
Quran Translation.1986: When those who gave partners To God will see their   partners    They will say     Our Lord   These are our   partners   those Whom we used to invoke Besides Thee   But they will Throw back their word at them  And say      Indeed ye are liars
Quran Translation.1987: That day shall they  openly  show  Their  submission to God   and all Their inventions shall leave Them in the lurch
Quran Translation.1988: Those who reject God And hinder  men  from the Path Of God for them Will We add Penalty To Penalty   for that they Used to spread mischief
Quran Translation.1989: One day We shall raise From all Peoples a witness Against them  from amongst themselves   And We shall bring thee As a witness against these  Thy people    and We have sent down To thee the Book explaining All things  a Guide  a Mercy  And Glad Tidings to Muslims
Quran Translation.1990: God commands justice  the doing Of good  and liberality to kith And kin  and He forbids All shameful deeds  and injustice And rebellion   He instructs you  That ye may receive admonition
Quran Translation.1991: Fulfil the Covenant of God When ye have entered into it  And break not your oaths   ye have confirmed them   Indeed ye have made God your surety   for God Knoweth all that ye do
Quran Translation.1992: And be not like a woman Who breaks into untwisted strands The yarn which she has spun  After it has become strong  Nor take your oaths to practise Deception between yourselves  Lest one party should be More numerous than another   For God will test you by this   And on the Day of Judgment He will certainly make clear To you  the truth of  that Wherein ye disagree
Quran Translation.1993: If God so willed  He Could make you all one People   But He leaves straying Whom He pleases  and He guides Whom He pleases   but ye Shall certainly be called to account For all your actions
Quran Translation.1994: And take not your oaths  To practice deception between yourselves  With the result that someone s foot May slip after it was Firmly planted  and ye may Have to taste the evil  consequences  Of having hindered  men  From the Path of God  And a mighty Wrath Descend on you
Quran Translation.1995: Nor sell the Covenant of God For a miserable price   For with God is  a prize  Far better for you  If ye only knew
Quran Translation.1996: What is with you must vanish   What is with God will endure  And We will certainly bestow  On those who patiently persevere  Their reward according to The best of their actions
Quran Translation.1997: Whoever works righteousness  Man or woman  and has Faith  Verily  to him will We give A new Life  a life That is good and pure  and We Will bestow on such their reward According to the best Of their actions
Quran Translation.1998: When thou dost read The Qur ān  seek God s pro  From Satan the Rejected One
Quran Translation.1999: No authority has he over those Who believe and put their trust In their Lord
Quran Translation.2000: His authority is over those Only  who take him as patron And who join partners with God
Quran Translation.2001: When We substitute one revelation For another  and God knows best What He reveals  in stages    They say    Thou art but a forger     But most of them understand not
Quran Translation.2002: Say  the Holy Spirit has brought The revelation from thy Lord In Truth  in order to strengthen Those who believe  and as a Guide And Glad Tidings to Muslims
Quran Translation.2003: We know indeed that they Say    It is a man that Teaches him   The tongue Of him they wickedly point to Is notable foreign  while this Is Arabic  pure and clear
Quran Translation.2004: Those who believe not In the Signs of God   God will not guide them  And theirs will be A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.2005: It is those who believe not In the Signs of God  That forge falsehood   It is they who lie
Quran Translation.2006: Any one who  after accepting Faith in God  utters Unbelief   Except under compulsion  His heart remaining firm In Faith but such as Open their breast to Unbelief   On them is Wrath from God  And theirs will be A dreadful Penalty
Quran Translation.2007: This because they love The life of this world Better than the Hereafter   And God will not guide Those who reject Faith
Quran Translation.2008: Those are they whose hearts  Ears  and eyes God has sealed up  And they take no heed
Quran Translation.2009: Without doubt  in the Hereafter They will perish
Quran Translation.2010: But verily thy Lord   To those who leave their homes After trials and persecutions   And who thereafter strive And fight for the Faith And patiently persevere   Thy Lord  after all this Is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2011: One Day every soul Will come up struggling For itself  and every soul Will be recompensed  fully  For all its actions  and none Will be unjustly dealt with
Quran Translation.2012: God sets forth a Parable   A city enjoying security And quiet  abundantly supplied With sustenance from every place   Yet was it ungrateful For the favours of God   So God made it taste Of hunger and terror  in extremes   Closing in on it  like a garment  From every side   because Of the  evil  which  Its people  wrought
Quran Translation.2013: And there came to them An Apostle from among themselves  But they falsely rejected him   So the Wrath seized them Even in the midst Of their iniquities
Quran Translation.2014: So eat of the sustenance Which God has provided For you  lawful and good   And be grateful for the favours Of God  if it is He Whom ye serve
Quran Translation.2015: He has only forbidden you Dead meat  and blood  And the flesh of swine  And any  food  over which The name of other than God Has been invoked  But if one is forced by necessity  Without wilful disobedience  Nor transgressing due limits   Then God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2016: But say not for any false thing That your tongues may put forth     This is lawful  and this Is forbidden   so as to ascribe False things to God  For those Who ascribe false things To God  will never prosper
Quran Translation.2017: In such falsehood  Is but a paltry profit   But they will have A most grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.2018: To the Jews We prohibited Such things as We have Mentioned to thee before   We did them no wrong  But they were used to Doing wrong to themselves
Quran Translation.2019: But verily thy Lord   To those who do wrong In ignorance  but who Thereafter repent and make amends   Thy Lord  after all this  Is Oft  Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2020: Abraham was indeed a model  Devoutly obedient to God   And  true in faith  and he Joined not gods with God
Quran Translation.2021: He showed his gratitude For the favours of God  Who chose him  and guided him To a Straight Way
Quran Translation.2022: And We gave him Good In this world  and he will be  In the Hereafter  in the ranks Of the Righteous
Quran Translation.2023: So We have taught thee The inspired  message     Follow the ways of Abraham The True in Faith  and he Joined not gods with God
Quran Translation.2024: The Sabbath was only made  Strict  to those who disagreed  As to its observance    But God will judge between them On the Day of Judgment  As to their differences
Quran Translation.2025: Invite  all  to the Way Of thy Lord with wisdom And beautiful preaching   And argue with them In ways that are best And most gracious   For thy Lord knoweth best  Who have strayed from His Path  And who receive guidance
Quran Translation.2026: And if ye do catch them out  Catch them out no worse Than they catch you out   But if ye show patience  That is indeed the best  course  For those who are patient
Quran Translation.2027: And do thou be patient  For thy patience is but From God   nor grieve over them   And distress not thyself Because of their plots
Quran Translation.2028: For God is with those Who restrain themselves  And those who do good
Quran Translation.2029: Glory to  God  Who did take His Servant For a Journey by night From the Sacred Mosque To the Farthest Mosque  Whose precincts We did Bless  in order that We Might show him some Of Our Signs   for He Is the One Who heareth And seeth  all things
Quran Translation.2030: We gave Moses the Book  And made it a Guide To the Children of Israel   Commanding      Take not Other than Me As Disposer of  your  affairs
Quran Translation.2031: O ye that are sprung From those whom We carried  In the Ark  with Noah   Verily he was a devotee Most grateful
Quran Translation.2032: And We gave  clear  warning To the Children of Israel In the Book  that twice Would they do mischief On the earth and be elated With mighty arrogance  And twice would they be punished
Quran Translation.2033: When the first of the warnings Came to pass  We sent Against you Our servants Given to terrible warfare   They entered the very inmost Parts of your homes   And it was a warning  Completely  fulfilled
Quran Translation.2034: Then did We grant you The Return as against them   We gave you increase In resources and sons  And made you The more numerous In man power
Quran Translation.2035: If ye did well  Ye did well for yourselves   If ye did evil   Ye did it  against yourselves  So when the second Of the warnings came to pass   We permitted your enemies  To disfigure your faces  And to enter your Temple As they had entered it before  And to visit with destruction All that fell into their power
Quran Translation.2036: It may be that your Lord May  yet  show Mercy Unto you   but if ye Revert  to your sins   We shall revert  To Our punishments    And We have made Hell A prison for those who Reject  all Faith
Quran Translation.2037: Verily this Qur ān Doth guide to that Which is most right  or stable   And giveth the glad tidings To the Believers who work Deeds of righteousness  That they shall have A magnificent reward
Quran Translation.2038: And to those who believe not In the Hereafter   it announceth  That We have prepared For them a Penalty Grievous  indeed
Quran Translation.2039: The prayer that man Should make for good  He maketh for evil   For man is given to Hasty  deeds
Quran Translation.2040: We have made the Night And the Day as two  Of Our  Signs   the Sign Of the Night have We obscured  While the Sign of the Day We have made to enlighten You   that ye may seek Bounty from your Lord  And that ye may know The number and count Of the years   all things Have We explained in detail
Quran Translation.2041: Every man s fate We have fastened On his own neck   On the Day of Judgment We shall bring out For him a scroll  Which he will see Spread open
Quran Translation.2042: It will be said to him &colon     Read thine  own  record   Sufficient is thy soul This day to make out An account against thee
Quran Translation.2043: Who receiveth guidance  Receiveth it for his own Benefit   who goeth astray Doth so to his own loss   No bearer of burdens Can bear the burden Of another   nor would We Visit with Our Wrath Until We had sent An apostle  to give warning
Quran Translation.2044: When We decide to destroy A population  We  first  send A definite order to those Among them who are given The good things of this life And yet transgress   so that The word is proved true Against them   then  it is  We destroy them utterly
Quran Translation.2045: How many generations Have We destroyed after Noah   And enough is thy Lord To note and see The sins of His servants
Quran Translation.2046: If any do wish For the transitory things  Of this life   We readily Grant them such things As We will  to such persons As We will   in the end Have We provided Hell For them   they will burn Therein  disgraced and rejected
Quran Translation.2047: Those who do wish For the  things of  the Hereafter  And strive therefor With all due striving  And have Faith   They are the ones Whose striving is acceptable  To God
Quran Translation.2048: Of the bounties of thy Lord We bestow freely on all  These as well as those   The bounties of thy Lord Are not closed  to anyone
Quran Translation.2049: See how We have bestowed More on some than on others   But verily the Hereafter Is more in rank and gradation And more in excellence
Quran Translation.2050: Take not with God Another object of worship   Or thou  O man    wilt sit In disgrace and destitution
Quran Translation.2051: Thy Lord hath decreed That ye worship none but Him  And that ye be kind To parents  Whether one Or both of them attain Old age in thy life  Say not to them a word Of contempt  nor repel them  But address them In terms of honour
Quran Translation.2052: And  out of kindness  Lower to them the wing Of humility  and say     My Lord   bestow on them Thy Mercy even as they Cherished me in childhood
Quran Translation.2053: Your Lord knoweth best What is in your hearts   If ye do deeds of righteousness  Verily He is Most Forgiving To those who turn to Him Again and again  in true penitence
Quran Translation.2054: And render to the kindred Their due rights  as  also  To those in want  And to the wayfarer   But squander not  your wealth  In the manner of a spendthrift
Quran Translation.2055: Verily spendthrifts are brothers Of the Evil Ones   And the Evil One Is to his Lord  Himself  Ungrateful
Quran Translation.2056: And even if thou hast To turn away from them In pursuit of the Mercy From thy Lord which thou Dost expect  yet speak To them a word Of easy kindness
Quran Translation.2057: Make not thy hand tied  Like a niggard s  to thy neck  Nor stretch it forth To its utmost reach  So that thou become Blameworthy and destitute
Quran Translation.2058: Verily thy Lord doth provide Sustenance in abundance For whom He pleaseth  and He Provideth in a just measure  For He doth know And regard all His servants
Quran Translation.2059: Kill not your children For fear of want   We shall Provide sustenance for them As well as for you  Verily the killing of them Is a great sin
Quran Translation.2060: Nor come nigh to adultery   For it is a shameful  deed  And an evil  opening the road  To other evils
Quran Translation.2061: Nor take life which God Has made sacred except For just cause  And if Anyone is slain wrongfully  We have given his heir Authority  to demand Qiṣāṣ Or to forgive    but let him Not exceed bounds in the matter Of taking life   for he Is helped  by the Law
Quran Translation.2062: Come not nigh To the orphan s property Except to improve it  Until he attains the age Of full strength   and fulfil  Every  engagement  For  every  engagement Will be enquired into  On the Day of Reckoning
Quran Translation.2063: Give full measure when ye Measure  and weigh With a balance that is straight   That is the most fitting And the most advantageous In the final determination
Quran Translation.2064: And pursue not that Of which thou hast No knowledge   for Every act of hearing  Or of seeing Or of  feeling in  the heart Will be enquired into  On the Day of Reckoning
Quran Translation.2065: Nor walk on the earth With insolence   for thou Canst not rend the earth Asunder  nor reach The mountains in height
Quran Translation.2066: Of all such things The evil is hateful In the sight of thy Lord
Quran Translation.2067: These are among the  precepts Of  wisdom  which thy Lord Has revealed to thee  Take not  with God  Another object of worship  Lest thou shouldst be thrown Into Hell  blameworthy and rejected
Quran Translation.2068: Has then your Lord   O Pagans    preferred for you Sons  and taken for Himself Daughters among the angels   Truly ye utter A most dreadful saying
Quran Translation.2069: We have explained  things  In various  ways  in this Qur ān  In order that they may receive Admonition  but it only increases Their flight  from the Truth
Quran Translation.2070: Say   if there had been  Other  gods with Him   As they say  behold  They would certainly have Sought out a way To the Lord of the Throne
Quran Translation.2071: Glory to Him   He is high Above all that they say    Exalted and Great  beyond measure
Quran Translation.2072: The seven heavens and the earth  And all beings therein  Declare His glory   There not a thing But celebrates His praise   And yet ye understand not How they declare His glory   Verily He is Oft Forbearing  Most Forgiving
Quran Translation.2073: When thou dost recite The Qur ān  We put  Between thee and those who Believe not in the Hereafter  A veil invisible
Quran Translation.2074: And We put coverings Over their hearts  and minds  Lest they should understand The Qur ān  and deafness Into their ears   when thou Dost commemorate thy Lord  And Him alone in the Qur ān  They turn on their backs  Fleeing  from the Truth
Quran Translation.2075: We know best why it is They listen  when they listen To thee   and when they Meet in private conference  Behold  the wicked say    Ye follow none other than A man bewitched
Quran Translation.2076: See what similes thy strike For thee   but they have gone Astray  and never can they Find a way
Quran Translation.2077: They say     What   When we are reduced To bones and dust  Should we really be raised up  To be  a new creation
Quran Translation.2078: Say      Nay    be ye Stones or iron
Quran Translation.2079: Or created matter Which  in your minds  Is hardest  to be raised up     Yet shall ye be raised up      Then will they say     Who will cause us To return     Say     He Who created you first     Then will they wag Their heads towards thee  And say    When will That be     Say    May be It will be quite soon
Quran Translation.2080: It will be on a Day When He will call you  And ye will answer  His call  with  words Of  His praise  and ye Will think that ye tarried But a little while
Quran Translation.2081: Say to My servants That they should  only  say Those things that are best   For Satan doth sow Dissensions among them   For Satan is to man An avowed enemy
Quran Translation.2082: It is your Lord That knoweth you best   If He please  He granteth You mercy  or if He please  Punishment   We have not sent Thee to be a disposer Of their affairs for them
Quran Translation.2083: And it is your Lord That knoweth best all beings That are in the heavens And on earth   We Did bestow on some Prophets More  and other  gifts Than on others   and We gave To David  the gift Of  the Psalms
Quran Translation.2084: Say     Call on those  Besides Him whom ye fancy   They have neither the power To remove your troubles From you nor to change them
Quran Translation.2085: Those whom they call upon Do desire  for themselves  means Of access to their Lord   Even those who are nearest   They hope for His Mercy And fear His Wrath   For the Wrath of thy Lord Is something to take heed of
Quran Translation.2086: There is not a population But We shall destroy it Before the Day of Judgment Or punish it with A dreadful Penalty   That is written In the  eternal  Record
Quran Translation.2087: And We refrain from sending The Signs  only because The men of former generations Treated them as false   We sent the She camel To the Thamūd to open Their eyes  but they Treated her wrongfully   We only send the Signs By way of terror  And warning from evil
Quran Translation.2088: Behold   We told thee That thy Lord doth encompass Mankind round about   We granted the Vision Which We showed thee  But as a trial for men   As also the Cursed Tree  Mentioned  in the Qur ān   We put terror  and warning  Into them  but it only Increases their inordinate transgression
Quran Translation.2089: Behold   We said to the angels     Bow down unto Adam     They bowed down except Iblīs   He said    Shall I bow down To one whom Thou didst create From clay
Quran Translation.2090: He said    Seest Thou   This is The one whom Thou hast honoured Above me   If Thou wilt but Respite me to the Day Of Judgment  I will surely Bring his descendants Under my sway  All but a few
Quran Translation.2091: God  said     Go thy way   If any of them follow thee  Verily Hell will be The recompense of you  all   An ample recompense
Quran Translation.2092: Lead to destruction those Whom thou canst among them  With thy  seductive  voice   Make assaults on them With thy cavalry and thy Infantry   mutually share With them wealth and children   And make promises to them   But Satan promises them Nothing but deceit
Quran Translation.2093: As for My servants  No authority shalt thou Have over them     Enough is thy Lord For a Disposer of affairs
Quran Translation.2094: Your Lord is He That maketh the Ship Go smoothly for you Through the sea  in order that Ye may seek of His Bounty  For He is unto you Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2095: When distress seizes you At sea  those that ye Call upon besides Himself  Leave you in the lurch   But when He brings you back Safe to land  ye turn Away  from Him   Most ungrateful Is man
Quran Translation.2096: Do ye then feel secure That He will not cause you To be swallowed up Beneath the earth When ye are on land  Or that He will not send Against you a violent tornado  With showers of stones  So that ye shall find No one to carry out Your affairs for you
Quran Translation.2097: Or do ye feel secure That He will not send you Back a second time To sea and send against you A heavy gale to drown you Because of your ingratitude  So that ye find no helper Therein against Us
Quran Translation.2098: We have honoured the sons Of Adam   provided them With transport on land and sea   Given them for sustenance things Good and pure   and conferred On them special favours  Above a great part Of Our Creation
Quran Translation.2099: One day We shall call Together all human beings With their  respective  Imāms   Those who are given their record In their right hand Will read it  with pleasure   And they will not be Dealt with unjustly In the least
Quran Translation.2100: But those who were blind In this world  will be Blind in the Hereafter  And most astray From the Path
Quran Translation.2101: And their purpose was To tempt thee away From that which We Had revealed unto thee  To substitute in Our name Something quite different    In that case   behold   They would certainly have Made thee  their  friend
Quran Translation.2102: And had We not Given thee strength  Thou wouldst nearly Have inclined to them A little
Quran Translation.2103: In that case We should Have made thee taste An equal portion  of punishment  In this life  and an equal portion In death   and moreover Thou wouldst have found None to help thee against Us
Quran Translation.2104: Their purpose was to scare Thee off the land  In order to expel thee   But in that case they Would not have stayed  Therein  after thee  Except for a little while
Quran Translation.2105: This was Our  way With the apostles We sent Before thee   thou wilt find No change in Our ways
Quran Translation.2106: Establish regular prayers  At the sun s decline Till the darkness of the night  And the morning prayer And reading   for the prayer And reading in the morning Carry their testimony
Quran Translation.2107: And pray in the small watches Of the morning    it would be  An additional prayer  Or spiritual profit  For thee   soon will thy Lord Raise thee to a station Of Praise and Glory
Quran Translation.2108: Say     O my Lord   Let my entry be By the Gate of Truth And Honour  and likewise My exit by the Gate Of Truth and Honour   And grant me From Thy Presence An authority to aid  me
Quran Translation.2109: And say     Truth has  now  Arrived  and Falsehood perished   For Falsehood is  by its nature  Bound to perish
Quran Translation.2110: We send down  stage by stage  In the Qur ān that which Is a healing and a mercy To those who believe   To the unjust it causes Nothing but loss after loss
Quran Translation.2111: Yet when We bestow Our favours on man  He turns away and becomes Remote on his side  instead Of coming to Us   and when Evil seizes him he Gives himself up to despair
Quran Translation.2112: Say     Everyone acts According to his own disposition   But your Lord knows best Who it is that is Best guided on the Way
Quran Translation.2113: They ask thee concerning The Spirit  of inspiration   Say     The Spirit  cometh  By command of my Lord   Of knowledge it is only A little that is communicated To you   O men
Quran Translation.2114: If it were Our Will  We could take away That which We have Sent thee by inspiration   Then would thou find None to plead thy affair In that matter as against Us
Quran Translation.2115: Except for Mercy from thy Lord   For His Bounty is To thee  indeed  great
Quran Translation.2116: Say     If the whole Of mankind and Jinns were to gather together To produce the like Of this Qur ān  they Could not produce The like thereof  even if They backed up each other With help and support
Quran Translation.2117: And We have explained To man  in this Qur ān  Every kind of similitude   Yet the grater part of men Refuse  to receive it  Except with ingratitude
Quran Translation.2118: They say     We shall not Believe in thee  until thou Cause a spring to gush Forth for us from the earth
Quran Translation.2119: Or  until  thou have A garden of date trees And vines  and cause rivers To gush forth in their midst  Carrying abundant water
Quran Translation.2120: Or thou cause the sky To fall in pieces  as thou Sayest  will happen   against us   Or thou bring God And the angels before  us  Face to face
Quran Translation.2121: Or thou have a house Adorned with gold  Or thou mount a ladder Right into the skies  No  we shall not even believe In thy mounting until thou Send down to us a book That we could read   Say     Glory to my Lord   Am I aught but a man   An apostle
Quran Translation.2122: What kept men back From Belief when Guidance Came to them  was nothing But this   they said    Has God sent a man  Like us  to be  His  Apostle
Quran Translation.2123: Say    If there were settled  On earth  angels walking about In peace and quiet  We should Certainly have sent them Down from the heavens An angel for an apostle
Quran Translation.2124: Say     Enough is God For a witness between me And you   for He is Well acquainted with His servants  And He sees  all things
Quran Translation.2125: It is he whom God guides  That is on true guidance   But he whom He leaves Astray for such wilt thou Find no protector besides Him  On the Day of Judgment We shall gather them together  Prone on their faces  Blind  dumb  and deaf   Their abode will be Hell   Every time it shows abatement  We shall increase for them The fierceness of the Fire
Quran Translation.2126: That is their recompense  Because they rejected Our Signs  And said    When we are reduced To bones and broken dust  Should we really be raised up  To be  a new Creation
Quran Translation.2127: See they not that God  Who created the heavens And the earth  has power To create the like of them  Anew    Only He has Decreed a term appointed  Of which there is no doubt  But the unjust refuse  To receive it  except With ingratitude
Quran Translation.2128: Say     If ye had Control of the Treasures Of the Mercy of my Lord  Behold  ye would keep them Back  for fear of spending Them   for man Is  ever  niggardly
Quran Translation.2129: To Moses We did give Nine Clear Signs   Ask the Children of Israel   When he came to them  Pharaoh said to him     O Moses   I consider thee  Indeed  to have been Worked upon by sorcery
Quran Translation.2130: Moses said    Thou knowest Well that these things Have been sent down by none But the Lord of the heavens And the earth as eye opening Evidence   and I consider thee Indeed  O Pharaoh  to be One doomed to destruction
Quran Translation.2131: So he resolved to remove them From the face of the earth   But We did drown him And all who were with him
Quran Translation.2132: And We said thereafter To the Children of Israel    Dwell securely in the land  Of promise      but when The second of the warnings came To pass  We gathered you Together in a mingled crowd
Quran Translation.2133: We sent down the  Qur ān  In Truth  and in Truth Has it descended   and We sent Thee but to give Glad Tidings and to warn  sinners
Quran Translation.2134: It is  a Qur ān Which We have divided  Into parts from time to time   In order that thou mightest Recite it to men At intervals   We have Revealed it by stages
Quran Translation.2135: Say     Whether ye believe In it or not  it is true That those who were given Knowledge beforehand  when It is recited to them  Fall down on their faces In humble prostration
Quran Translation.2136: And they say     Glory To our Lord   Truly Has the promise of our Lord Been fulfilled
Quran Translation.2137: They fall down on their faces In tears  and it increases Their  earnest  humility
Quran Translation.2138: Say     Call upon God  or Call upon Raḥmān   By whatever name ye call Upon Him   it is well    For to Him belong The Most Beautiful Names  Neither speak thy Prayer aloud  Nor speak it in a low tone  But seek a middle course Between
Quran Translation.2139: Say     Praise be to God  Who begets no son  And has no partner In  His  dominion   Nor  needs  He any To protect Him from humiliation   Yea  magnify Him For His greatness and glory
Quran Translation.2140: Praise be to God  Who hath sent to His Servant The Book  and hath allowed Therein no Crookedness
Quran Translation.2141: He hath made it  Straight  And Clear  in order that He may warn  the godless  Of a terrible Punishment From Him  and that He May give Glad Tidings To the Believers who work Righteous deeds  that they Shall have a goodly Reward
Quran Translation.2142: Wherein they shall Remain for ever
Quran Translation.2143: Further  that He may warn Those  also  who say    God hath begotten a son
Quran Translation.2144: No knowledge have they Of such a thing  nor Had their fathers  It is A grievous thing that issues From their mouths as a saying  What they say is nothing But falsehood
Quran Translation.2145: Thou wouldst only  perchance  Fret thyself to death  Following after them  in grief  If they believe not In this Message
Quran Translation.2146: That which is on earth We have made but as A glittering show for the earth  In order that We may test Them as to which of them Are best in conduct
Quran Translation.2147: Verily what is on earth We shall make but as Dust and dry soil  Without growth or herbage
Quran Translation.2148: Or dost thou reflect That the Companions of the Cave And of the Inscription Were wonders among Our Signs
Quran Translation.2149: Behold  the youths betook themselves To the Cave   they said    Our Lord   bestow on us Mercy from Thyself  And dispose of our affair For us in the right way
Quran Translation.2150: Then We drew  a veil  Over their ears  for a number Of years  in the Cave   So that they heard not
Quran Translation.2151: Then We roused them  In order to test which Of the two parties was best At calculating the term Of years they had tarried
Quran Translation.2152: We relate to thee their story In truth   they were youths Who believed in their Lord  And We advanced them In guidance
Quran Translation.2153: We gave strength to their hearts   Behold  they stood up And said     Our Lord is The Lord of the heavens And of the earth   never Shall we call upon any god Other than Him   if we Did  we should indeed Have uttered an enormity
Quran Translation.2154: These our people have taken For worship gods other Than Him   why do they Not bring forward an authority Clear  and convincing  For what they do   Who doth more wrong Than such as invent A falsehood against God
Quran Translation.2155: When ye turn away From them and the things They worship other than God  Betake yourselves to the Cave   Your Lord will shower His mercies on you And dispose of your affair Towards comfort and ease
Quran Translation.2156: Thou wouldst have seen The sun  when it rose  Declining to the right From their Cave  and when It set  turning away From them to the left  While they lay in the open Space in the midst Of the Cave  Such are Among the Signs of God   He whom God guides Is right guided   but he Whom God leaves to stray   For him wilt thou find No protector to lead him To the Right Way
Quran Translation.2157: Thou wouldst have deemed them Awake  whilst they were asleep  And We turned them On their right and on Their left sides   their dog Stretching forth his two fore legs On the threshold   if thou Hadst come up on to them  Thou wouldst have certainly Turned back from them in flight  And wouldst certainly have been Filled with terror of them
Quran Translation.2158: Such  being their state   We raised them up  from sleep   That they might question Each other  Said one of them    How long have ye stayed  here      They said    We have stayed  Perhaps  a day  or part Of a day    At length  They  all  said    God  alone  Knows best how long Ye have stayed here  Now send ye then one of you With this money of yours To the town   let him Find out which is the best Food  to be had  and bring some To you  that  ye may  Satisfy your hunger therewith   And let him behave With care and courtesy  And let him not inform Any one about you
Quran Translation.2159: For if thy should Come upon you  they would Stone you or force you To return to their cult  And in that case ye would Never attain prosperity
Quran Translation.2160: Thus did We make Their case known to the people  That they might know That the promise of God Is true  and that there can Be no doubt about the Hour Of Judgment  Behold  They dispute among themselves As to their affair   Some  said    Construct a building over them     Their Lord knows best About them   those who prevailed Over their affair said    Let us surely build a place Of worship over them
Quran Translation.2161: Some  say they were three  The dog being the fourth Among them    others  say They were five  the dog Being the sixth  doubtfully Guessing at the unknown    Yet others  say they were Seven  the dog being the eighth  Say thou     My Lord Knoweth best their number   It is but few that know Their  real case    Enter not  Therefore  into controversies Concerning them  except On a matter that is clear  Nor consult any of them About  the affair of  the Sleepers
Quran Translation.2162: Nor say of anything    I shall be sure to do So and so to morrow
Quran Translation.2163: Without adding    So please God     And call thy Lord to mind When thou forgettest  and say    I hope that my Lord Will guide me ever closer  Even  than this To the right road
Quran Translation.2164: So they stayed in their Cave Three hundred years  and  some  Add nine  more
Quran Translation.2165: Say     God knows best How long they stayed   With Him is  the knowledge Of  the secrets of the heavens And the earth   how clearly He sees  how finely He hears  Everything    They have no protector Other than Him   nor does He share His Command With any person whatsoever
Quran Translation.2166: And recite  and teach  What has been revealed To thee of the Book Of thy Lord   none Can change His Words  And none wilt thou find As a refuge other than Him
Quran Translation.2167: And keep thy soul content With those who call On their Lord morning And evening  seeking His Face   and let not Thine eyes pass beyond them  Seeking the pomp and glitter Of this Life   nor obey Any whose heart We Have permitted to neglect The remembrance of Us  One who follows his own Desires  whose case has Gone beyond all bounds
Quran Translation.2168: Say    The Truth is From your Lord     Let him who will  Believe  and let him Who will  reject  it    For the wrong doers We Have prepared a Fire Whose  smoke and flames   Like the wall and roof Of a tent  will hem Them in   if they implore Relief they will be granted Water like melted brass  That will scald their faces  How dreadful the drink   How uncomfortable a couch To recline on
Quran Translation.2169: As to those who believe And work righteousness  Verily We shall not suffer To perish the reward Of any who do A  single  righteous deed
Quran Translation.2170: For them will be Gardens Of Eternity   beneath them Rivers will flow   they will Be adorned therein With bracelets of gold  And they will wear Green garments of fine silk And heavy brocade   They will recline therein On raised thrones  How good the recompense   How beautiful a couch To recline on
Quran Translation.2171: Set forth to them The parable of two men   For one of them We provided Two gardens of grape vines And surrounded them With date palms   In between the two We placed corn fields
Quran Translation.2172: Each of those gardens Brought forth its produce  And failed not in the least Therein   in the midst Of them We caused A river to flow
Quran Translation.2173: Abundant  was the produce This man had   he said To his companion  in the course Of a mutual argument     More wealth have I Than you  and more honour And power in  my following Of  men
Quran Translation.2174: He went into his garden In a state  of mind  Unjust to his soul   He said    I deem not That this will ever perish
Quran Translation.2175: Nor do I deem That the Hour  of Judgment  Will  ever  come   Even if I am brought back To my Lord  I shall Surely find  there  Something better in exchange
Quran Translation.2176: His companion said to him  In the course of the argument With him     Dost thou deny Him Who created thee Out of dust  then out of A sperm drop  then fashioned Thee into a man
Quran Translation.2177: But  I think  for my part That He is God  My Lord  and none shall I Associate with my Lord
Quran Translation.2178: Why didst thou not  As thou wentest into Thy garden  say     God s Will  Be done    There is no power But with God     If thou Dost see me less than Thee in wealth and sons
Quran Translation.2179: It may be that my Lord Will give me something Better than thy garden  And that He will send On thy garden thunderbolts  By way of reckoning  From heaven  making it  But  slippery sand
Quran Translation.2180: Or the water of the garden Will run off underground So that thou wilt never Be able to find it
Quran Translation.2181: So his fruits  and enjoyment  Were encompassed  with ruin   And he remained twisting And turning his hands Over what he had spent On his property  which had  Now  tumbled to pieces To its very foundations  And he could only say    Woe is me   Would I had Never ascribed partners To my Lord and Cherisher
Quran Translation.2182: Nor had he numbers To help him against God  Nor was he able To deliver himself
Quran Translation.2183: There  the  only  pro  comes From God  the True One  He is the Best to reward  And the Best to give success
Quran Translation.2184: Set forth to them The similitude of the life Of this world   it is like The rain which We send Down from the skies   The earth s vegetation absorbs it  But soon it becomes Dry stubble  which the winds Do scatter   it is  only  God Who prevails over all things
Quran Translation.2185: Wealth and sons are allurements Of the life of this world   But the things that endure  Good Deeds  are best In the sight of thy Lord  As rewards  and best As  the foundation for  hopes
Quran Translation.2186: One Day We shall Remove the mountains  and thou Wilt see the earth As a level stretch  And We shall gather them  All together  nor shall We Leave out any one of them
Quran Translation.2187: And they will be marshalled Before thy Lord in ranks   With the announcement     Now have ye come to Us  Bare  as We created you First   aye  ye thought We shall not fulfil The appointment made to you To meet  Us
Quran Translation.2188: And the Book  of Deeds  Will be placed  before you    And thou wilt see The sinful in great terror Because of what is  recorded  Therein   they will say    Ah   woe to us   What a book is this   It leaves out nothing Small or great  but Takes account thereof     They will find all that they Did  placed before them   And not one will thy Lord Treat with injustice
Quran Translation.2189: Behold   We said To the angels    Bow down To Adam     they bowed down Except Iblīs  He was One of the Jinns  and he Broke the Command Of his Lord  Will ye then take him And his progeny as protectors Rather than Me   And they Are enemies to you   Evil would be the exchange For the wrong doers
Quran Translation.2190: I called them not To witness the creation Of the heavens and the earth  Nor  even  their own creation   Nor is it for Me To take as helpers Such as lead  men  astray
Quran Translation.2191: One Day He will say    Call on those whom ye Thought to be My partners   And they will call on them  But they will not listen To them   and We shall Make for them a place Of common perdition
Quran Translation.2192: And the Sinful shall see The Fire and apprehend That they have to fall Therein   no means will they Find to turn away therefrom
Quran Translation.2193: We have explained In detail in this Qur ān  For the benefit of mankind  Every kind of similitude   But man is  in most things  Contentious
Quran Translation.2194: And what is there To keep back men From believing  now that Guidance has come to them  Nor from praying for forgiveness From their Lord  but that  They ask that  the ways Of the ancients be repeated With them  or the Wrath Be brought to them Face to face
Quran Translation.2195: We only send the apostles To give glad tidings And to give warnings   But the Unbelievers dispute With vain argument  in order Therewith to weaken the truth  And they treat My Signs As a jest  as also the fact That they are warned
Quran Translation.2196: And who doth more wrong Than one who is reminded Of the Signs of his Lord  But turns away from them  Forgetting the  deeds  which his hands Have sent forth   Verily We Have set veils over their hearts Lest they should understand this  And over their ears  deafness  If thou callest them To guidance  even then Will they never accept guidance
Quran Translation.2197: But your Lord is Most Forgiving  Full of Mercy  If He were To call them  at once  to account For what they have earned  Then surely He would Have hastened their Punishment   But they have their appointed Time  beyond which they Will find no refuge
Quran Translation.2198: Such were the populations We destroyed when they Committed iniquities   but We fixed an appointed time For their destruction
Quran Translation.2199: Behold  Moses said To his attendant    I will not Give up until I reach The junction of the two Seas or  until  I spend Years and years in travel
Quran Translation.2200: But when they reached The Junction  they forgot  About  their Fish  which took Its course through the sea  Straight  as in a tunnel
Quran Translation.2201: When they had passed on  Some distance   Moses said To his attendant     Bring us Our early meal   truly We have suffered much fatigue At this  stage of  our journey
Quran Translation.2202: He replied     Sawest thou  What happened  when we Betook ourselves to the rock   I did indeed forget  About  the Fish   none but Satan made me forget To tell  you  about it   It took its course through The sea in a marvellous way
Quran Translation.2203: Moses said     That was what We were seeking after     So they went back On their footsteps  following  The path they had come
Quran Translation.2204: So they found one Of Our servants  On whom We had bestowed Mercy from Ourselves And whom We had taught Knowledge from Our own Presence
Quran Translation.2205: Moses said to him     May I follow thee  On the footing that Thou teach me something Of the  Higher  Truth Which thou hast been taught
Quran Translation.2206: The other  said     Verily Thou wilt not be able To have patience with me
Quran Translation.2207: And how canst thou Have patience about things About which thy understanding Is not complete
Quran Translation.2208: Moses said     Thou wilt Find me  if God so will   Truly  patient   nor shall I Disobey thee in aught
Quran Translation.2209: The other said     If then Thou wouldst follow me  Ask me no questions About anything until I Myself speak to thee Concerning it
Quran Translation.2210: So they both proceeded   Until  when they were In the boat  he scuttled it  Said Moses     Hast thou Scuttled it in order To drown those in it   Truly a strange thing Hast thou done
Quran Translation.2211: He answered     Did I not Tell thee that thou canst Have no patience with me
Quran Translation.2212: Moses said     Rebuke me not For forgetting  nor grieve me By raising difficulties In my case
Quran Translation.2213: Then they proceeded   Until  when they met A young man  he slew him  Moses said     Hast thou Slain an innocent person Who had slain none   Truly a foul  unheard of  thing Hast thou done
Quran Translation.2214: He answered     Did I not Tell thee that thou canst Have no patience with me
Quran Translation.2215: Moses  said     If ever I Ask thee about anything After this  keep me not In thy company   then wouldst Thou have received  full  excuse From my side
Quran Translation.2216: Then they proceeded   Until  when they came To the inhabitants of a town  They asked them for food  But they refused them Hospitality  They found there A wall on the point of Falling down  but he Set it up straight   Moses  said     If thou Hadst wished  surely thou Couldst have exacted some Recompense for it
Quran Translation.2217: He answered     This is The parting between me And thee   now will I Tell thee the interpretation Of  those things  over which Thou wast unable To hold patience
Quran Translation.2218: As for the boat  It belonged to certain Men in dire want   They plied on the water   I but wished to render it Unserviceable  for there was After them a certain king Who seized on every boat By force
Quran Translation.2219: As for the youth  His parents were people Of Faith  and we feared That he would grieve them By obstinate rebellion And ingratitude  to God and man
Quran Translation.2220: So we desired that Their Lord would give them In exchange  a son  Better in purity  of conduct  And closer in af
Quran Translation.2221: As for the wall  It belonged to two youths  Orphans  in the Town   There was  beneath it  A buried treasure  to which They were entitled   Their father Had been a righteous man   So thy Lord desired that They should attain their age Of full strength and get out Their treasure a mercy  And favour  from thy Lord  I did it not of my own Accord  Such is the interpretation Of  those things  over which Thou wast unable To hold patience
Quran Translation.2222: They ask thee concerning Ẓul qarnain  Say    I will rehearse to you Something of his story
Quran Translation.2223: Verily We established his power On earth  and We gave him The ways and the means To all ends
Quran Translation.2225: Until  when he reached The setting of the sun  He found it set In a spring of murky water   Near it he found a People   We said     O Ẓul qarnain    Thou hast authority   either To punish them  or To treat them with kindness
Quran Translation.2226: He said     Whoever doth wrong  Him shall we punish   then Shall he be sent back To his Lord   and He will Punish him with a punishment Unheard of  before
Quran Translation.2227: But whoever believes  And works righteousness   He shall have a goodly Reward  and easy will be His task as we order it By our command
Quran Translation.2229: Until  when he came To the rising of the sun  He found it rising On a people for whom We had provided No covering pro  Against the sun
Quran Translation.2230: He left them  as they were   We completely understood What was before him
Quran Translation.2232: Until  when he reached  A tract  between two mountains  He found  beneath them  a people Who scarcely understood a word
Quran Translation.2233: They said     O Ẓul qarnain   The Gog and Magog  people  Do great mischief on earth   Shall we then render thee Tribute in order that Thou mightest erect a barrier Between us and them
Quran Translation.2234: He said      The power  in which My Lord has established me Is better  than tribute    Help me therefore with strength  And labour    I will Erect a strong barrier Between you and them
Quran Translation.2235: Bring me blocks of iron   At length  when he had Filled up the space between The two steep mountain sides  He said    Blow  with your bellows    Then  when he had made It  red  as fire  he said     Bring me  that I may Pour over it  molten lead
Quran Translation.2236: Thus were they made Powerless to scale it Or to dig through it
Quran Translation.2237: He said     This is A mercy from my Lord   But when the promise Of my Lord comes to pass  He will make it into dust   And the promise of My Lord is true
Quran Translation.2238: On that day We shall Leave them to surge Like waves on one another   The trumpet will be blown  And We shall collect them All together
Quran Translation.2239: And We shall present Hell that day for Unbelievers To see  all spread out
Quran Translation.2240: Unbelievers  whose eyes Had been under a veil From Remembrance of Me  And who had been unable Even to hear
Quran Translation.2241: Do the Unbelievers think That they can take My servants as protectors Besides Me   Verily We Have prepared Hell For the Unbelievers For  their  entertainment
Quran Translation.2242: Say     Shall we tell you Of those who lose most In respect of their deeds
Quran Translation.2243: Those whose efforts have Been wasted in this life  While they thought that They were acquiring good By their works
Quran Translation.2244: They are those who deny The Signs of their Lord And the fact of their Having to meet Him  In the Hereafter    vain Will be their works  Nor shall We  on the Day Of Judgment  give them Any weight
Quran Translation.2245: That is their reward  Hell   because they rejected Faith  and took My Signs And My Messengers By way of jest
Quran Translation.2246: As to those who believe And work righteous deeds  They have  for their entertainment  The Gardens of Paradise
Quran Translation.2247: Wherein they shall dwell  For aye    no change Will they wish for from them
Quran Translation.2248: Say     If the ocean were Ink  wherewith to write out  The words of my Lord  Sooner would the ocean be Exhausted than would the words Of my Lord  even if we Added another ocean Like it  for its aid
Quran Translation.2249: Say     I am but a man Like yourselves   but  The inspiration has come To me  that your God is One God   whoever expects To meet his Lord  let him Work righteousness  and  In the worship of his Lord  Admit no one as partner
Quran Translation.2251: This is  a recital Of the Mercy of thy Lord To His servant Zakarīya
Quran Translation.2252: Behold   he cried To his Lord in secret
Quran Translation.2253: Praying     O my Lord   Infirm indeed are my bones  And the hair of my head Doth glisten with grey   But never am I unblest  O my Lord  in my prayer To Thee
Quran Translation.2254: Now I fear  what  My relatives  and colleagues   Will do  after me   But my wife is barren   So give me an heir As from Thyself
Quran Translation.2255: One that  will  truly  Represent me  and represent The posterity of Jacob   And make him  O my Lord   One with whom Thou art Well pleased
Quran Translation.2256: His prayer was answered      O Zakarīya   We give thee Good news of a son   His name shall be Yaḥyā   On none by that name Have We conferred distinction before
Quran Translation.2257: He said     O my Lord   How shall I have a son  When my wife is barren And I have grown quite decrepit From old age
Quran Translation.2258: He said     So  it will be    Thy Lord saith    That is Easy for Me   I did Indeed create thee before  When thou hadst been nothing
Quran Translation.2259: Zakarīya  said     O my Lord   Give me a Sign     Thy Sign   was the answer    Shall be that thou Shalt speak to no man For three nights  Although thou art not dumb
Quran Translation.2260: So Zakarīya came out To his people From his chamber   He told them by signs To celebrate God s praises In the morning And in the evening
Quran Translation.2261: To his son came the command      O Yaḥyā   take hold Of the Book with might     And We gave him Wisdom Even as a youth
Quran Translation.2262: And pity  for all creatures  As from Us  and purity   He was devout
Quran Translation.2263: And kind to his parents  And he was not overbearing Or rebellious
Quran Translation.2264: So Peace on him The day he was born  The day that he dies  And the day that he Will be raised up To life  again
Quran Translation.2265: Relate in the Book  The story of  Mary  When she withdrew From her family To a place in the East
Quran Translation.2266: She placed a screen  To screen herself  from them   Then We sent to her Our angel  and he appeared Before her as a man In all respects
Quran Translation.2267: She said     I seek refuge From thee to  God  Most Gracious    come not near  If thou dost fear God
Quran Translation.2268: He said     Nay  I am only A messenger from thy Lord   To announce  to thee The gift of a holy son
Quran Translation.2269: She said     How shall I Have a son  seeing that No man has touched me  And I am not unchaste
Quran Translation.2270: He said     So  it will be    Thy Lord saith    That is Easy for Me   and  We Wish  to appoint him As a Sign unto men And a Mercy from Us     It is a matter  So  decreed
Quran Translation.2271: So she conceived him  And she retired with him To a remote place
Quran Translation.2272: And the pains of childbirth Drove her to the trunk Of a palm tree   She cried  in her anguish      Ah   would that I had Died before this   would that I had been a thing Forgotten and out of sight
Quran Translation.2273: But  a voice  cried to her From beneath the  palm tree      Grieve not   for thy Lord Hath provided a rivulet Beneath thee
Quran Translation.2274: And shake towards thyself The trunk of the palm tree   It will let fall Fresh ripe dates upon thee
Quran Translation.2275: So eat and drink And cool  thine  eye  And if thou dost see Any man  say    I have Vowed a fast to  God  Most Gracious  and this day Will I enter into no talk With any human being
Quran Translation.2276: At length she brought The  babe  to her people  Carrying him  in her arms   They said     O Mary   Truly an amazing thing Hast thou brought
Quran Translation.2277: O sister of Aaron   Thy father was not A man of evil  nor thy Mother a woman unchaste
Quran Translation.2278: But she pointed to the babe  They said     How can we Talk to one who is A child in the cradle
Quran Translation.2279: He said     I am indeed A servant of God   He hath given me Revelation and made me A prophet
Quran Translation.2280: And He hath made me Blessed wheresoever I be  And hath enjoined on me Prayer and Charity as long As I live
Quran Translation.2281: He  hath made me kind To my mother  and not Overbearing or miserable
Quran Translation.2282: So Peace is on me The day I was born  The day that I die  And the day that I Shall be raised up To life  again
Quran Translation.2283: Such  was  Jesus the son Of Mary    it is  a statement Of truth  about which They  vainly  dispute
Quran Translation.2284: It is not befitting To  the majesty of  God That He should beget A son  Glory be to Him   When He determines A matter  He only says To it    Be    and it is
Quran Translation.2285: Verily God is my Lord And your Lord   Him Therefore serve ye   this is A Way that is straight
Quran Translation.2286: But the sects differ Among themselves   and woe To the Unbelievers because Of the  coming  Judgment Of a momentous Day
Quran Translation.2287: How plainly will they see And hear  the Day that They will appear before Us   But the unjust to day Are in error manifest
Quran Translation.2288: But warn them of the Day Of Distress  when The matter will be determined   For  behold   they are negligent And they do not believe
Quran Translation.2289: It is We Who will inherit The earth  and all beings Thereon   to Us will they All be returned
Quran Translation.2290: Also  mention in the Book  The story of  Abraham   He was a man of Truth  A prophet
Quran Translation.2291: Behold  he said to his father     O my father   why Worship that which heareth not And seeth not  and can Profit thee nothing
Quran Translation.2292: O my father   to me Hath come knowledge which Hath not reached thee   So follow me   I will guide Thee to a Way that Is even and straight
Quran Translation.2293: O my father   serve not Satan   for Satan is A rebel against  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2294: O my father   I fear Lest a Penalty afflict thee From  God  Most Gracious  So that thou become To Satan a friend
Quran Translation.2295: The father  replied     Dost thou Hate my gods  O Abraham   If thou forbear not  I will Indeed stone thee   Now get away from me For a good long while
Quran Translation.2296: Abraham said     Peace be On thee   I will pray To my Lord for thy forgiveness   For He is to me Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2297: And I will turn away From you  all  and from those Whom ye invoke besides God   I will call on my Lord   Perhaps  by my prayer to my Lord  I shall be not unblest
Quran Translation.2298: When he had turned away From them and from those Whom they worshipped besides God  We bestowed on him Isaac and Jacob  and each one Of them We made a prophet
Quran Translation.2299: And We bestowed Of Our Mercy on them  And We granted them Lofty honour on the tongue Of truth
Quran Translation.2300: Also mention in the Book  The story of  Moses   For he was specially chosen  And he was an apostle  And  a prophet
Quran Translation.2301: And We called him From the right side Of Mount  Sinai   and made Him draw near to Us  For mystic  converse
Quran Translation.2302: And out of Our Mercy  We gave him his brother Aaron   also  a prophet
Quran Translation.2303: Also mention in the Book  The story of  Ismā īl   He was  strictly  true To what he promised  And he was an apostle  And  a prophet
Quran Translation.2304: He used to enjoin On his people Prayer And Charity  and he was Most acceptable in the sight Of his Lord
Quran Translation.2305: Also mention in the Book The case of Idrīs   He was a man of truth  And sincerity    and  a prophet
Quran Translation.2306: And We raised him To a lofty station
Quran Translation.2307: Those were some Of the prophets on whom God did bestow His Grace   Of the posterity of Adam  And of those whom We Carried  in the Ark  With Noah  and of The posterity of Abraham And Israel of those Whom We guided and chose  Whenever the Signs Of  God  Most Gracious Were rehearsed to them  They would fall down In prostrate adoration And in tears
Quran Translation.2308: But after them there followed A posterity who missed Prayers and followed after lusts  Soon  then  will they Face Destruction
Quran Translation.2309: Except those who repent And believe  and work Righteousness   for these Will enter the Garden And will not be wronged In the least
Quran Translation.2310: Gardens of Eternity  those Which  God  Most Gracious Has promised to His servants In the Unseen   for His promise Must  necessarily  come to pass
Quran Translation.2311: They will not there hear Any vain discourse  but Only salutations of peace   And they will have therein Their sustenance  morning And evening
Quran Translation.2312: Such is the Garden which We give as an inheritance To those of Our servants Who guard against evil
Quran Translation.2313: The angels say &colon     We descend not but By command of thy Lord   To Him belongeth what is Before us and what is Behind us  and what is Between   and thy Lord Never doth forget
Quran Translation.2314: Lord of the heavens And of the earth  And of all that is Between them   so worship Him  And be constant and patient In His worship   knowest thou Of any who is worthy Of the same Name as He
Quran Translation.2315: Man says     What   When I am dead  shall I Then be raised up alive
Quran Translation.2316: But does not man Call to mind that We Created him before Out of nothing
Quran Translation.2317: So  by thy Lord  Without doubt  We shall gather Them together  and  also  The Evil Ones  with them    Then shall We bring them Forth on their knees Round about Hell
Quran Translation.2318: Then shall We certainly Drag out from every sect All those who were worst In obstinate rebellion Against  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2319: And certainly We know best Those who are most worthy Of being burned therein
Quran Translation.2320: Not one of you but will Pass over it   this is  With thy Lord  a Decree Which must be accomplished
Quran Translation.2321: But We shall save those Who guarded against evil  And We shall leave The wrong doers therein   Humbled  to their knees
Quran Translation.2322: When Our Clear Signs Are rehearsed to them  The Unbelievers say to those Who believe    Which of the two Sides is best in point of Position   which makes the best Show in Council
Quran Translation.2323: But how many  countless  Generations before them Have We destroyed  Who were even better In equipment and in glitter To the eye
Quran Translation.2324: Say     If any men go Astray   God  Most Gracious Extends  the rope  to them  Until  when they see The warning of God  being Fulfilled  either in punishment Or in  the approach of  The Hour  they will At length realise who is Worst in position  and  who  Weakest in forces
Quran Translation.2325: And God doth advance In guidance those who seek Guidance   and the things That endure  Good Deeds  Are best in the sight Of thy Lord  as rewards  And best in respect of  Their  eventual returns
Quran Translation.2326: Hast thou then seen The  sort of  man who Rejects Our Signs  yet Says     I shall certainly Be given wealth and children
Quran Translation.2327: Has he penetrated to The Unseen  or has he Taken a contract with  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2328: Nay   We shall record What he says  and We Shall add and add To his punishment
Quran Translation.2329: To Us shall return All that he talks of  And he shall appear Before Us bare and alone
Quran Translation.2330: And they have taken  For worship  gods other than God  to give them Power and glory
Quran Translation.2331: Instead  they shall reject Their worship  and become Adversaries against them
Quran Translation.2332: Seest thou not that We Have set the Evil Ones on Against the Unbelievers  To incite them with fury
Quran Translation.2333: So make no haste Against them  for We But count out to them A  limited  number  of days
Quran Translation.2334: The day We shall gather The righteous to  God  Most Gracious  like a band Presented before a king for honours
Quran Translation.2335: And We shall drive The sinners to hell  Like thirsty cattle Driven down to water
Quran Translation.2336: None shall have the power Of intercession  but such a one As has received permission  or promise  From  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2337: They say      God  Most Gracious Has begotten a son
Quran Translation.2338: Indeed ye have put forth A thing most monstrous
Quran Translation.2339: At it the skies are ready To burst  the earth To split asunder  and The mountains to fall down In utter ruin
Quran Translation.2340: That they should invoke A son for  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2341: For it is not consonant With the majesty of  God  Most Gracious that He Should beget a son
Quran Translation.2342: Not one of the beings In the heavens and the earth But must come to  God  Most Gracious as a servant
Quran Translation.2343: He does take and account Of them  all   and hath Numbered them  all  exactly
Quran Translation.2344: And everyone of them Will come to him singly On the Day of Judgment
Quran Translation.2345: On those who believe And work deeds of righteousness  Will  God  Most Gracious Bestow Love
Quran Translation.2346: So have We made The  Qur ān  easy In thine own tongue  That with it thou mayest give Glad tidings to the righteous  And warnings to people Given to contention
Quran Translation.2347: But how many  countless  Generations before them Have We destroyed   Canst thou Find a single one of them  Now  or hear  so much As  a whisper of them
Quran Translation.2349: We have not sent down The Qur ān to thee to be  An occasion  for thy distress
Quran Translation.2350: But only as an admonition To those who fear  God
Quran Translation.2351: A revelation from Him Who created the earth And the heavens on high
Quran Translation.2352: God  Most Gracious Is firmly established On the throne  of authority
Quran Translation.2353: To Him belongs what is In the heavens and on earth  And all between them  And all beneath the soil
Quran Translation.2354: If thou pronounce the word Aloud   it is no matter    For verily He knoweth What is secret and what Is yet more hidden
Quran Translation.2355: God   there is no god But He   To Him belong The Most Beautiful Names
Quran Translation.2356: Has the story of Moses Reached thee
Quran Translation.2357: Behold  he saw a fire   So he said to his family    Tarry ye   I perceive A fire   perhaps I can Bring you some burning brand Therefrom  or find some guidance At the fire
Quran Translation.2358: But when he came To the fire  a voice Was heard     O Moses
Quran Translation.2359: Verily I am thy Lord   Therefore  in My presence  Put off thy shoes   thou art In the sacred valley Ṭuwā
Quran Translation.2360: I have chosen thee   Listen  then  to the inspiration  Sent to thee
Quran Translation.2361: Verily  I am God   There is no god but I   So serve thou Me  only   And establish regular prayer For celebrating My praise
Quran Translation.2362: Verily the Hour is coming  My design is to keep it Hidden for every soul To receive its reward By the measure of Its Endeavour
Quran Translation.2363: Therefore let not such as Believe not therein But follow their own Lusts  divert thee therefrom  Lest thou perish
Quran Translation.2364: And what is that In thy right hand  O Moses
Quran Translation.2365: He said    It is My rod   on it I lean   with it I beat down fodder For my flocks   and In it I find Other uses
Quran Translation.2366: God  said    Throw it  O Moses
Quran Translation.2367: He threw it  and behold   It was a snake  Active in motion
Quran Translation.2368: God  said    Seize it  And fear not   We Shall return it at once To its former condition
Quran Translation.2369: Now draw thy hand Close to thy side   It shall come forth white  And shining   without harm  Or stain   as another Sign
Quran Translation.2370: In order that We May show thee  Two  of Our Greater Signs
Quran Translation.2371: Go thou to Pharaoh  For he has indeed Transgressed all bounds
Quran Translation.2372: Moses  said     O my Lord   Expand me my breast
Quran Translation.2374: And remove the impediment From my speech
Quran Translation.2375: So they may understand What I say
Quran Translation.2376: And give me a Minister From my family
Quran Translation.2378: Add to my strength Through him
Quran Translation.2379: And make him share My task
Quran Translation.2380: That we may celebrate Thy praise without stint
Quran Translation.2382: For Thou art He That  ever  regardeth us
Quran Translation.2383: God  said     Granted Is thy prayer  O Moses
Quran Translation.2384: And indeed We conferred A favour on thee Another time  before
Quran Translation.2385: Behold   We sent To thy mother  by inspiration  The message
Quran Translation.2386: Throw  the child  Into the chest  and throw  The chest  into the river   The river will cast him Up on the bank  and he Will be taken up by one Who is an enemy to Me And an enemy to him     But I cast  the garment Of  love over thee from Me   And  this  in order that Thou mayest be reared Under Mine eye
Quran Translation.2387: Behold   thy sister goeth forth And saith    Shall I show you One who will nurse And rear the  child      So We brought thee back To thy mother  that her eye Might be cooled and she Should not grieve  Then thou didst slay A man  but We saved thee From trouble  and We tired Thee in various ways  Then didst thou tarry A number of years With the people of Midian  Then didst thou come hither As ordained  O Moses
Quran Translation.2388: And I have prepared thee For Myself  for service
Quran Translation.2389: Go  thou and thy brother  With My Signs  And slacken not  Either of you  in keeping Me in remembrance
Quran Translation.2390: Go  both of you  to Pharaoh  For he has indeed Transgressed all bounds
Quran Translation.2391: But speak to him mildly   Perchance he may take Warning or fear  God
Quran Translation.2392: They  Moses and Aaron  said     Our Lord   We fear lest He hasten with insolence Against us  or lest he Transgress all bounds
Quran Translation.2393: He said     Fear not   For I am with you   I hear and see  everything
Quran Translation.2394: So go ye both to him  And say    Verily we are Apostles sent by thy Lord   Send forth  therefore  the Children Of Israel with us  and Afflict them not   With a Sign  indeed  Have we come from thy Lord   And Peace to all Who follow guidance
Quran Translation.2395: Verily it has been revealed To us that the Penalty  Awaits  those who reject And turn away
Quran Translation.2396: When this message was delivered    Pharaoh  said     Who  then  O Moses  is the Lord Of you two
Quran Translation.2397: He said     Our Lord is He Who gave to each  Created  thing its form And nature  and further  Gave  it  guidance
Quran Translation.2398: Pharaoh  said     What then Is the condition Of previous generations
Quran Translation.2399: He replied     The knowledge Of that is with my Lord  Duly recorded   my Lord Never errs  nor forgets
Quran Translation.2400: He Who has made for you The earth like a carpet Spread out   has enabled you To go about therein by roads  And channels    and has sent Down water from the sky   With it have We produced Divers pairs of plants Each separate from the others
Quran Translation.2401: Eat  for yourselves  and pasture Your cattle   verily  in this Are Signs for men Endued with understanding
Quran Translation.2402: From the  earth  did We Create you  and into it Shall We return you  And from it shall We Bring you out once again
Quran Translation.2403: And We showed Pharaoh All Our Signs  but he Did reject and refuse
Quran Translation.2404: He said     Hast thou come To drive us out Of our land with thy magic  O Moses
Quran Translation.2405: But we can surely produce Magic to match thine   So make a tryst Between us and thee  Which we shall not fail To keep neither we nor thou  In a place where both Shall have even chances
Quran Translation.2406: Moses said     Your tryst Is the Day of the Festival  And let the people be assembled When the sun is well up
Quran Translation.2407: So Pharaoh withdrew   He concerted his plan  And then came  back
Quran Translation.2408: Moses said to him     Woe to you   Forge not Ye a lie against God  Lest He destroy you  at once  Utterly by chastisement   The forger must suffer Frustration
Quran Translation.2409: So they disputed  one with Another  over their affair  But they kept their talk secret
Quran Translation.2410: They said     These two Are certainly  expert  magicians   Their object is to drive you Out from your land With their magic  and To do away with your Most cherished institutions
Quran Translation.2411: Therefore concert your plan  And then assemble In  serried  rank s  He wins  all along  to day Who gains the upper hand
Quran Translation.2412: They said     O Moses   Whether wilt thou That thou throw  first  Or that we be the first To throw
Quran Translation.2413: He said    Nay  throw ye First     Then behold Their ropes and their rods  So it seemed to him On account of their magic  Began to be in lively motion
Quran Translation.2414: So Moses conceived In his mind A  sort of  fear
Quran Translation.2415: We said     Fear not   For thou hast indeed The upper hand
Quran Translation.2416: Throw that which is In thy right hand   Quickly will it swallow up That which they have faked  What they have faked Is but a magician s trick   And the magician thrives not   No matter  where he goes
Quran Translation.2417: So the magicians were Thrown down to prostration   They said    We believe In the Lord of Aaron and Moses
Quran Translation.2418: Pharaoh  said     Believe ye In Him before I give You permission   Surely This must be your leader  Who has taught you magic   Be sure I will cut off Your hands and feet On opposite sides  and I Will have you crucified On trunks of palm trees   So shall ye know for certain  Which of us can give The more severe and the more Lasting Punishment
Quran Translation.2419: They said     Never shall we Regard thee as more than The Clear Signs that have Come to us  or than Him Who created us   So decree whatever thou Desirest to decree   for thou Canst only decree  touching  The life of this world
Quran Translation.2420: For us  we have believed In our Lord   may He Forgive us our faults  And the magic to which Thou didst compel us   For God is Best And Most Abiding
Quran Translation.2421: Verily he who comes To his Lord as a sinner  At Judgment   for him Is Hell   therein shall he Neither die nor live
Quran Translation.2422: But such as comes To Him as Believers Who have worked righteous deeds   For them are ranks exalted
Quran Translation.2423: Gardens of Eternity  Beneath which flow rivers   They will dwell therein For aye   such is the reward Of those who purify Themselves  from evil
Quran Translation.2424: We sent an inspiration To Moses     Travel by night With My servants  and strike A dry path for them Through the sea  without fear Of being overtaken  by Pharaoh  And without  any other  fear
Quran Translation.2425: Then Pharaoh pursued them With his forces  but The waters completely overwhelmed Them and covered them up
Quran Translation.2426: Pharaoh led his people astray Instead of leading them aright
Quran Translation.2427: O ye Children of Israel   We delivered you from Your enemy  and We Made a Covenant with you On the side of Mount  Sinai   and We sent Down to you Manna And quails
Quran Translation.2428: Saying      Eat of the good Things We have provided For your sustenance  but Commit no excess therein  Lest My Wrath should justly Descend on you   and those On whom descends My Wrath Do perish indeed
Quran Translation.2429: But  without doubt  I am  Also  He that forgives Again and again  to those Who repent  believe  And do right  who  In fine  are ready to receive True guidance
Quran Translation.2430: When Moses was up on the Mount  God said &colon     What made thee Hasten in advance of thy people  O Moses
Quran Translation.2431: He replied     Behold  they are Close on my footsteps   I hastened to Thee  O my Lord  To please Thee
Quran Translation.2432: God  said     We have tested Thy people in thy absence   The Sāmirī has led them Astray
Quran Translation.2433: So Moses returned to his people In a state of indignation And sorrow  He said     O my people   did not Your Lord make a handsome Promise to you   Did then The promise seem to you Long  in coming    Or did ye Desire that Wrath should Descend from your Lord on you  And so ye broke your promise To me
Quran Translation.2434: They said     We broke not The promise to thee  as far As lay in our power   But we were made to carry The weight of the ornaments Of the  whole  people  and we Threw them  into the fire   And that was what The Sāmirī suggested
Quran Translation.2435: Then he brought out  Of the fire  before the  people  The image of a calf   It seemed to low   So they said     This is Your god  and the god Of Moses  but  Moses  Has forgotten
Quran Translation.2436: Could they not see that It could not return them A word  for answer   and that It had no power either To harm them or To do them good
Quran Translation.2437: Aaron had already  before this  Said to them     O my people   Ye are being tested in this   For verily your Lord is  God  Most Gracious   so follow me And obey my command
Quran Translation.2438: They had said     We will not Abandon this cult  but we Will devote ourselves to it Until Moses returns to us
Quran Translation.2439: Moses  said     O Aaron   What kept thee back  when Thou sawest them going wrong
Quran Translation.2440: From following me   Didst thou Then disobey my order
Quran Translation.2441: Aaron  replied     O son Of my mother   Seize  me not  By my beard nor by  The hair of  my head   Truly I feared lest thou Shouldst say    Thou hast caused A division among the Children Of Israel  and thou didst not Respect my word
Quran Translation.2442: Moses  said     What then Is thy case  O Sāmirī
Quran Translation.2443: He replied     I saw what They saw not   so I took A handful  of dust  from The footprint of the Apostle  And threw it  into the calf    Thus did my soul suggest To me
Quran Translation.2444: Moses  said     Get thee gone   But thy  punishment  in this life Will be that thou wilt say    Touch me not     and moreover  For a future penalty  thou hast A promise that will not fail   Now look at thy god  Of whom thou hast become A devoted worshipper   We will certainly  melt  it In a blazing fire and scatter It broadcast in the sea
Quran Translation.2445: But the god of you all Is the One God   there is No god but He   all things He comprehends in His knowledge
Quran Translation.2446: Thus do We relate to thee Some stories of what happened Before   for We have sent Thee a Message from Our own Presence
Quran Translation.2447: If any do turn away Therefrom  verily they will Bear a burden On the Day of Judgement
