Quran Translation.2448: They will abide in this  state    And grievous will the burden Be to them on that Day
Quran Translation.2449: The Day when the Trumpet Will be sounded   that Day  We shall gather the sinful  Blear eyed  with terror
Quran Translation.2450: In whispers will they consult Each other     Ye tarried not Longer than ten  Days
Quran Translation.2451: We know best what they Will say  when their leader Most eminent in Conduct Will say     Ye tarried not Longer than a day
Quran Translation.2452: They ask thee concerning The Mountains   say    My Lord Will uproot them and scatter Them as dust
Quran Translation.2453: He will leave them as plains Smooth and level
Quran Translation.2454: Nothing crooked or curved Wilt thou see in their place
Quran Translation.2455: On that Day will they follow The Caller  straight    no crookedness  Can they show  him   all sounds Shall humble themselves in The Presence of  God  Most Gracious   Nothing shalt thou hear But the tramp of their feet  As they march
Quran Translation.2456: On that Day shall no Intercession avail Except for those for whom Permission has been granted By  God  Most Gracious And whose word is Acceptable to Him
Quran Translation.2457: He knows what  appears To His creatures as  before Or after or behind them   But they shall not compass it With their knowledge
Quran Translation.2458: All  faces shall be humbled Before  Him  the Living  The Self Subsisting  Eternal   Hopeless indeed will be The man that carries Iniquity  on his back
Quran Translation.2459: But he who works deeds Of righteousness  and has faith  Will have no fear of harm Nor of any curtailment  Of what is his due
Quran Translation.2460: Thus have We sent this Down an Arabic Qur ān And explained therein in detail Some of the warnings  In order that they may Fear God  or that it may Cause their remembrance  of Him
Quran Translation.2461: High above all is God  The King  the Truth   Be not in haste With the Qur ān before Its revelation to thee Is completed  but say    O my Lord   advance me In knowledge
Quran Translation.2462: We had already  beforehand  Taken the covenant of Adam  But he forgot   and We found On his part no firm resolve
Quran Translation.2463: When We said to the angels    Prostrate yourselves to Adam    They prostrated themselves  but not Iblīs   he refused
Quran Translation.2464: Then We said     O Adam   Verily  this is an enemy To thee and thy wife   So let him not get you Both out of the Garden  So that thou art landed In misery
Quran Translation.2465: There is therein  enough provision  For thee not to go hungry Nor to go naked
Quran Translation.2466: Nor to suffer from thirst  Nor from the sun s heat
Quran Translation.2467: But Satan whispered evil To him   he said    O Adam   Shall I lead thee to The Tree of Eternity And to a kingdom That never decays
Quran Translation.2468: In the result  they both Ate of the tree  and so Their nakedness appeared To them   they began to sew Together  for their covering  Leaves from the Garden   Thus did Adam disobey His Lord  and allow himself To be seduced
Quran Translation.2469: But his Lord chose him  For His Grace    He turned To him  and gave him guidance
Quran Translation.2470: He said     Get ye down  Both of you  all together  From the Garden  with enmity One to another   but if  As is sure  there comes to you Guidance from Me  whosoever Follows My guidance  will not Lose his way  nor fall Into misery
Quran Translation.2471: But whosoever turns away From My Message  verily For him is a life narrowed Down  and We shall raise Him up blind on the Day Of Judgment
Quran Translation.2472: He will say     O my Lord   Why hast thou raised me Up blind  while I had Sight  before
Quran Translation.2473: God  will say     Thus Didst thou  when Our Signs Came unto thee  disregard Them   so wilt thou  This day  be disregarded
Quran Translation.2474: And thus do We recompense Him who transgresses beyond bounds And believes not in the Signs Of his Lord   and the Penalty Of the Hereafter is far more Grievous and more enduring
Quran Translation.2475: It is not a warning to such Men  to call to mind  How many generations before them We destroyed  in whose haunts They  now  move   Verily  In this are Signs for men Endued with understanding
Quran Translation.2476: Had it not been For a Word that went forth Before from thy Lord   Their punishment  must necessarily Have come   but there is A term appointed  for respite
Quran Translation.2477: Therefore be patient with what They say  and celebrate  constantly  The praises of thy Lord  Before the rising of the sun  And before its setting   Yea  celebrate them For part of the hours Of the night  and at the sides Of the day   that thou Mayest have  spiritual  joy
Quran Translation.2478: Nor strain thine eyes in longing For the things We have given For enjoyment to parties Of them  the splendour Of the life of this world  Through which We test them   But the provision of thy Lord Is better and more enduring
Quran Translation.2479: Enjoin prayer on thy people  And be constant therein  We ask thee not to provide Sustenance   We provide it For thee  But the  fruit of  The Hereafter is for Righteousness
Quran Translation.2480: They say     Why does he not Bring us a Sign from His Lord     Has not A Clear Sign come to them Of all that was In the former Books Of revelation
Quran Translation.2481: And if We had inflicted On them a penalty before this  They would have said     Our Lord   If only Thou Hadst sent us an apostle  We should certainly have followed Thy Signs before we were Humbled and put to shame
Quran Translation.2482: Say     Each one  of us  Is waiting   wait ye  therefore  And soon shall ye know Who it is that is On the straight and even Way  and who it is That has received guidance
Quran Translation.2483: Closer and closer to mankind Comes their Reckoning   yet they Heed not and they turn away
Quran Translation.2484: Never comes  aught  to them Of a renewed Message From their Lord  but they Listen to it as in jest
Quran Translation.2485: Their hearts toying as with Trifles  The wrong doers conceal Their private counsels   saying     Is this  one  more than A man like yourselves   Will ye go to witchcraft With your eyes open
Quran Translation.2486: Say     My Lord Knoweth  every  word  spoken  In the heavens and on earth   He is the One that heareth And knoweth  all things
Quran Translation.2487: Nay   they say     these are  Medleys of dreams   Nay  He forged it   Nay  He is  but  a poet   Let him then bring us A Sign like the ones That were sent to  Prophets  of old
Quran Translation.2488: As to those  before them  Not one of the populations Which We destroyed believed   Will these believe
Quran Translation.2489: Before thee  also  the apostles We sent were but men  To whom We granted inspiration   If ye realise this not  ask Of those who possess the Message
Quran Translation.2490: Nor did We give them Bodies that ate no food  Nor were they exempt from death
Quran Translation.2491: In the end We fulfilled To them Our promise  And We saved them And those whom We pleased  But We destroyed those Who transgressed beyond bounds
Quran Translation.2492: We have revealed for you  O men    a book in which Is a Message for you   Will ye not then understand
Quran Translation.2493: How many were the populations We utterly destroyed because Of their iniquities  setting up In their places other peoples
Quran Translation.2494: Yet  when they felt Our Punishment  coming   Behold  they  tried to  flee From it
Quran Translation.2495: Flee not  but return to The good things of this life Which were given you  And to your homes  In order that ye may Be called to account
Quran Translation.2496: They said     Ah   woe to us   We were indeed wrong doers
Quran Translation.2497: And that cry of theirs Ceased not  till We made Them as a field That is mown  as ashes Silent and quenched
Quran Translation.2498: Not for  idle  sport did We Create the heavens and the earth And all that is between
Quran Translation.2499: If it had been Our wish To take  just  a pastime  We should surely have taken It from the things nearest To Us  if We would Do  such a thing
Quran Translation.2500: Nay  We hurl the Truth Against falsehood  and it knocks Out its brain  and behold  Falsehood doth perish   Ah   woe be to you For the  false  things Ye ascribe  to Us
Quran Translation.2501: To Him belong all  creatures  In the heavens and on earth   Even those who are in His  Very  Presence are not Too proud to serve Him  Nor are they  ever  weary  Of His service
Quran Translation.2502: They celebrate His praises Night and day  nor do they Ever flag or intermit
Quran Translation.2503: Or have they taken  For worship  gods from the earth Who can raise  the dead
Quran Translation.2504: If there were  in the heavens And the earth  other gods Besides God  there would Have been confusion in both   But glory to God  The Lord of the Throne    High is He  above What they attribute to Him
Quran Translation.2505: He cannot be questioned For His acts  but they Will be questioned  for theirs
Quran Translation.2506: Or have they taken For worship  other  gods Besides Him   Say    Bring Your convincing proof   this Is the Message of those With me and the Message Of those before me   But most of them know not The Truth  and so turn away
Quran Translation.2507: Not an apostle did We Send before thee without This inspiration sent by Us To him   that there is No god but I   therefore Worship and serve Me
Quran Translation.2508: And they say      God  Most Gracious has begotten Offspring   Glory to Him   They are  but  servants raised To honour
Quran Translation.2509: They speak not before He speaks  and they act  In all things  by His command
Quran Translation.2510: He knows what is before them  And what is behind them  And they offer no intercession Except for those who are Acceptable  and they stand In awe and reverence Of His  glory
Quran Translation.2511: If any of them should say    I am a god besides Him    Such a one We should Reward with Hell   thus Do We reward those Who do wrong
Quran Translation.2512: Do not the Unbelievers see That the heavens and the earth Were joined together  as one Unit of Creation   before We clove them asunder   We made from water Every living thing  Will they Not then believe
Quran Translation.2513: And We have set on the earth Mountains standing firm  Lest it should shake with them  And We have made therein Broad highways  between mountains  For them to pass through   That they may receive guidance
Quran Translation.2514: And We have made The heavens as a canopy Well guarded   yet do they Turn away from the Signs Which these things  point to
Quran Translation.2515: It is He Who created The Night and the Day  And the sun and the moon   All  the celestial bodies  Swim along  each in its Rounded course
Quran Translation.2516: We granted not to any man Before thee permanent life  Here    if then thou shouldst die  Would they live permanently
Quran Translation.2517: Every soul shall have A taste of death   And We test you By evil and by good By way of trial  To Us must ye return
Quran Translation.2518: When the Unbelievers see thee  They treat thee not except With ridicule    Is this    They say     the one who talks Of your gods     And they Blaspheme at the mention Of  God  Most Gracious
Quran Translation.2519: Man is a creature of haste   Soon  enough  will I show You My Signs   then Ye will not ask Me To hasten them
Quran Translation.2520: They say     When will this Promise come to pass  If ye are telling the truth
Quran Translation.2521: If only the Unbelievers Knew  the time  when they Will not be able To ward off the Fire From their faces  nor yet From their backs  and  when  No help can reach them
Quran Translation.2522: Nay  it may come to them All of a sudden and confound Them   no power will they Have then to avert it  Nor will they  then  Get respite
Quran Translation.2523: Mocked were  many  Apostles before thee   But their scoffers Were hemmed in By the thing that they mocked
Quran Translation.2524: Say    Who can keep You safe by night and by day From  the Wrath of   God  Most Gracious     Yet they Turn away from the mention Of their Lord
Quran Translation.2525: Or have they gods that Can guard them from Us   They have no power to aid Themselves  nor can they Be defended from Us
Quran Translation.2526: Nay  We gave the good things Of this life to these men And their fathers until The period grew long for them   See they not that We Gradually reduce the land  In their control  from Its outlying borders   Is it Then they who will win
Quran Translation.2527: Say    I do but warn you According to revelation     But the deaf will not hear The call   even  when They are warned
Quran Translation.2528: If but a breath of the Wrath Of thy Lord do touch them  They will then say    Woe To us   we did wrong indeed
Quran Translation.2529: We shall set up scales Of justice for the Day Of Judgment  so that Not a soul will be dealt with Unjustly in the least  And if there be  No more than  the weight Of a mustard seed  We will bring it  to account    And enough are We To take account
Quran Translation.2530: In the past We granted To Moses and Aaron The Criterion  for judgment   And a Light and a Message For those who would do right
Quran Translation.2531: Those who fear their Lord In their most secret thoughts  And who hold the Hour  Of Judgment  in awe
Quran Translation.2532: And this is a blessed Message which We have Sent down   will ye then Reject it
Quran Translation.2533: We bestowed aforetime On Abraham his rectitude Of conduct  and well were We Acquainted with him
Quran Translation.2534: Behold   he said To his father and his people    What are these images  To which ye are  So assiduously  devoted
Quran Translation.2535: They said    We found Our fathers worshipping them
Quran Translation.2536: He said    Indeed ye Have been in manifest Error ye and your fathers
Quran Translation.2537: They said    Have you Brought us the Truth  Or are you one Of those who jest
Quran Translation.2538: He said    Nay  your Lord Is the Lord of the heavens And the earth  He Who Created them  from nothing    And I am a witness To this  truth
Quran Translation.2539: And by God  I have A plan for your idols  After ye go away And turn your backs
Quran Translation.2540: So he broke them to pieces   All  but the biggest of them  That they might turn  And address themselves  to it
Quran Translation.2541: They said    Who has Done this to our gods   He must indeed be Some man of impiety
Quran Translation.2542: They said    We heard A youth talk of them   He is called Abraham
Quran Translation.2543: They said    Then bring him Before the eyes of the people  That they may bear witness
Quran Translation.2544: They said    Art thou The one that did this With our gods  O Abraham
Quran Translation.2545: He said     Nay  this Was done by  This is their is their biggest one   Ask them  if they Can speak intelligently
Quran Translation.2546: So they turned to themselves And said    Surely ye Are the ones in the wrong
Quran Translation.2547: Then were they confounded With shame    they said     Thou knowest full well that These  idols  do not speak
Quran Translation.2548: Abraham  said    Do ye then Worship  besides God  Things that can neither Be of any good to you Nor do you harm
Quran Translation.2549: Fie upon you  and upon The things that ye worship Besides God   Have ye No sense
Quran Translation.2550: They said    Burn him And protect your gods  If ye do  anything at all
Quran Translation.2551: We said    O Fire   Be thou cool  And  a means of  safety For Abraham
Quran Translation.2552: Then they sought a stratagem Against him   but We Made them the ones That lost most
Quran Translation.2553: But We delivered him And  his nephew  Lūṭ  And directed them  to the land Which We have blessed For the nations
Quran Translation.2554: And We bestowed on him Isaac And  as an additional gift   A grandson   Jacob  and We Made righteous men of every one  Of them
Quran Translation.2555: And We made them Leaders  guiding  men  by Our Command  and We Sent them inspiration To do good deeds  To establish regular prayers  And to practice regular charity   And they constantly served Us  and Us only
Quran Translation.2556: And to Lūṭ  too  We gave Judgment and Knowledge  And We saved him From the town which practiced Abominations   truly they were A people given to Evil  A rebellious people
Quran Translation.2557: And We admitted him To Our Mercy   for he Was one of the Righteous
Quran Translation.2558: Remember  Noah  when He cried  to Us  aforetime   We listened to his  prayer  And delivered him and his Family from great distress
Quran Translation.2559: We helped him against People who rejected Our Signs   Truly they were a people Given to Evil   so We Drowned them  in the Flood  All together
Quran Translation.2560: And remember David And Solomon  when they Gave judgment in the matter Of the field into which The sheep of certain people Had strayed by night   We did witness their judgment
Quran Translation.2561: To Solomon We inspired The  right  understanding Of the matter   to each  Of them  We gave Judgment And Knowledge   it was Our power that made The hills and the birds Celebrate Our praises  With David   it was We Who did  all these things
Quran Translation.2562: It was We Who taught him The making of coats of mail For your benefit  to guard You from each other s violence   Will ye then be grateful
Quran Translation.2563: It was Our power that Made  the violent  unruly  Wind flow  tamely  for Solomon  To his order  to the land Which We had blessed   For We do know all things
Quran Translation.2564: And of the evil ones  Were some who dived For him  and did other work Besides   and lit was We Who guarded them
Quran Translation.2565: And  remember  Job  when He cried to his Lord    Truly distress has seized me  But Thou art the Most Merciful of those that are Merciful
Quran Translation.2566: So We listened to him   We removed the distress That was on him  And We restored his people To him  and doubled Their number  as a Grace From Ourselves  and a thing For commemoration  for all Who serve Us
Quran Translation.2567: And  remember  Ismā īl  Idrīs  and Ẓul kifl  all  Men  of constancy and patience
Quran Translation.2568: We admitted them to Our Mercy   for they Were of the Righteous ones
Quran Translation.2569: And remember Ẓun nūn  When he departed in wrath   He imagined that We Had no power over him   But he cried through the depths Of darkness    There is No god but Thou   Glory to Thee   I was Indeed wrong
Quran Translation.2570: So We listened to him   And delivered him from Distress   and thus do We Deliver those who have faith
Quran Translation.2571: And  remember  Zakarīyā  When he cried to his Lord     O my Lord   leave me not Without offspring  though Thou Art the best of inheritors
Quran Translation.2572: So We listened to him   And We granted him Yaḥyā   We cured his wife s  Barrenness  for him  These  three  Were ever quick in emulation In good works   they used To call on Us with love And reverence  and humble themselves Before Us
Quran Translation.2573: And  remember  her who Guarded her chastity   We breathed into her Of Our Spirit  and We Made her and her son A Sign for all peoples
Quran Translation.2574: Verily  this Brotherhood Of yours is a single Brotherhood  And I am your Lord And Cherisher   therefore Serve Me  and no other
Quran Translation.2575: But  later generations  cut off Their affair  of unity   One from another    yet  Will they all return to Us
Quran Translation.2576: Whoever works any act Of Righteousness and has Faith   His endeavour will not Be rejected   We shall Record it in his favour
Quran Translation.2577: But there is a ban On any population which We have destroyed   that they Shall not return
Quran Translation.2578: Until the Gog and Magog  people  Are let through  their barrier   And they swiftly swarm From every hill
Quran Translation.2579: Then will the True Promise Draw nigh  of fulfilment    Then behold   the eyes Of the Unbelievers will Fixedly stare in horror     Ah   Woe to us   we were indeed Heedless of this   nay   we Truly did wrong
Quran Translation.2580: Verily ye   Unbelievers   And the  false  gods that Ye worship besides God  Are  but  fuel for Hell   To it will ye  surely  come
Quran Translation.2581: If these had been gods  They would not have got there   But each one will abide Therein
Quran Translation.2582: There  sobbing will be Their lot  nor will they There hear  aught else
Quran Translation.2583: Those for whom The Good  Record  from Us Has gone before  will be Removed far therefrom
Quran Translation.2584: Not the slightest sound Will they hear of Hell   What their souls desired  In that will they dwell
Quran Translation.2585: The Great Terror will Bring them no grief   But the angels will meet them  With mutual greetings      This is your Day    The Day  that ye were promised
Quran Translation.2586: The Day that We roll up The heavens like a scroll Rolled up for books  completed    Even as We produced The first Creation  so Shall We produce A new one   a promise We have undertaken   Truly shall We fulfil it
Quran Translation.2587: Before this We wrote In the Psalms  after the Message  Given to Moses      My servants  The righteous  shall inherit The earth
Quran Translation.2588: Verily in the  Qur ān  Is a Message for people Who would  truly  worship God
Quran Translation.2589: We sent thee not  but As a mercy for all creatures
Quran Translation.2590: Say     What has come to me By inspiration is that Your God is One God   Will ye therefore bow To His Will  in Islām
Quran Translation.2591: But if they turn back  Say     I have proclaimed The Message to you all alike And in truth   but I Know not whether that Which ye are promised Is near or far
Quran Translation.2592: It is He Who knows What is open in speech And what ye hide  In your hearts
Quran Translation.2593: I know not but that It may be a trial For you  and a grant Of  worldly  livelihood  To you  for a time
Quran Translation.2594: Say     O my Lord   Judge Thou in truth       Our Lord Most Gracious Is the One Whose assistance Should be sought against The blasphemies ye utter
Quran Translation.2595: O mankind   Fear your Lord   For the convulsion of the Hour  Of Judgment  will be A thing terrible
Quran Translation.2596: The Day ye shall see it  Every mother giving suck Shall forget her suckling babe  And every pregnant female Shall drop her load  unformed    Thou shalt see mankind As in a drunken riot  Yet not drunk   but dreadful Will be the Wrath of God
Quran Translation.2597: And yet among men There are such as dispute About God  without knowledge  And follow every evil one Obstinate in rebellion
Quran Translation.2598: About the  Evil One  It is decreed that whoever Turns to him for friendship  Him will he lead astray  And he will guide him To the Penalty of the Fire
Quran Translation.2599: O mankind   if ye have A doubt about the Resur    Consider  that We created you Out of dust  then out of Sperm  then out of a leech like Clot  then out a morsel Of flesh  partly formed And partly unformed  in order That We may manifest  Our power  to you   And We cause whom We will To rest in the wombs For an appointed term  Then do We bring you out As babes  then  foster you  That ye may reach your age Of full strength   and some Of you are called to die  And some are sent back To the feeblest old age  So that they know nothing After having known  much   And  further   thou seest The earth barren and lifeless  But when We pour down Rain on it  it is stirred  To life   it swells  And it puts forth every kind Of beautiful growth  in pairs
Quran Translation.2600: This is so  because God Is the Reality   it is He Who gives life to the dead  And it is He Who has Power over all things
Quran Translation.2601: And verily the Hour will come   There can be no doubt About it  or about  the fact  That God will raise up All who are in the graves
Quran Translation.2602: Yet there is among men Such a one as disputes About God  without knowledge  Without guidance  and without A Book of Enlightenment
Quran Translation.2603: Disdainfully  bending his side  In order to lead  men  astray From the Path of God   For him there is disgrace In this life  and on the Day Of Judgment We shall Make him taste the Penalty Of burning  Fire
Quran Translation.2604: It will be said      This is Because of the deeds which Thy hands sent forth  For verily God is not Unjust to His servants
Quran Translation.2605: There are among men Some who serve God  As it were  on the verge   If good befalls them  they are  Therewith  well content   but If a trial comes to them  They turn on their faces   They lose both this world And the Hereafter   that Is loss for all to see
Quran Translation.2606: They call on such deities  Besides God  as can neither Hurt nor profit them   That is straying far indeed  From the Way
Quran Translation.2607: Perhaps  they call on one Whose hurt is nearer Than his profit   evil  indeed  Is the patron  and evil The companion  for help
Quran Translation.2608: Verily God will admit Those who believe and work Righteous deeds  to Gardens  Beneath which rivers flow   For God carries out All that He plans
Quran Translation.2609: If any think that God Will not help him  His Apostle  in this world And the Hereafter  let him Stretch out a rope To the ceiling and cut  himself  Off   then let him see Whether his plan will remove That which enrages  him
Quran Translation.2610: Thus have We sent down Clear Signs   and verily God doth guide whom He will
Quran Translation.2611: Those who believe  in the Qur ān   Those who follow the Jewish  scriptures   And the Sabians  Christians  Magians  and Polytheists   God will judge between them On the Day of Judgment   For God is witness Of all things
Quran Translation.2612: Seest thou not that To God bow down in worship All things that are In the heavens and on earth   The sun  the moon  the stars   The hills  the trees  the animals   And a great number among Mankind   But a great number Are  also  such as are Fit for Punishment   and such As God shall disgrace   None can raise to honour   For God carries out All that He wills
Quran Translation.2613: These two antagonists dispute With each other about their Lord   But those who deny  their Lord    For them will be cut out A garment of Fire   Over their heads will be Poured out boiling water
Quran Translation.2614: With it will be scalded What is within their bodies  As well as  their  skins
Quran Translation.2615: In addition there will be Maces of iron  to punish  them
Quran Translation.2616: Every time they wish To get away therefrom  From anguish  they will be Forced back therein  and  It will be said     Taste ye The Penalty of Burning
Quran Translation.2617: God will admit those Who believe and work righteous deeds  To Gardens beneath which Rivers flow   they shall be Adorned therein with bracelets Of gold and pearls   and Their garments there Will be of silk
Quran Translation.2618: For they have been guided  In this life  to the purest Of speeches   they have been Guided to the Path of Him Who is Worthy of  all  Praise
Quran Translation.2619: As to those who have rejected  God   and would keep back  men  From the Way of God  and From the Sacred Mosque  which We have made  open  to  all  men  Equal is the dweller there And the visitor from the country  And any whose purpose therein Is profanity or wrong doing  Them will We cause to taste Of a most grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.2620: Behold   We gave the site  To Abraham  of the  Sacred  House   Saying      Associate not anything  In worship  with Me   And sanctify My House For those who compass it round  Or stand up  Or bow  or prostrate themselves  Therein in prayer
Quran Translation.2621: And proclaim the Pilgrimage Among men   they will come To thee on foot and  mounted  On every kind of camel  Lean on account of journeys Through deep and distant Mountain highways
Quran Translation.2622: That they may witness The benefits  provided  for them  And celebrate the name Of God  through the Days Appointed  over the cattle Which He has provided for them  For sacrifice    then eat ye Thereof and feed the distressed Ones in want
Quran Translation.2623: Then let them complete The rites prescribed For them  perform their vows  And  again  circumambulate The Ancient House
Quran Translation.2624: Such  is the Pilgrimage    Whoever honours the sacred Rites of God  for him It is good in the sight Of his Lord  Lawful to you  For food in pilgrimage  are cattle  Except those mentioned to you  As exceptions    but shun The abomination of idols  And shun the word That is false
Quran Translation.2625: Being true in faith to God  And never assigning partners To Him   if anyone assigns Partners to God  he is As if he had fallen From heaven and been snatched up By birds  or the wind Had swooped  like a bird On its prey  and thrown him Into a far distant place
Quran Translation.2626: Such  is his state    and Whoever holds in honour The Symbols of God   In the sacrifice of animals   Such  honour  should come truly From piety of heart
Quran Translation.2627: In them ye have benefits For a term appointed   In the end their place Of sacrifice is near The Ancient House
Quran Translation.2628: To every people did We Appoint rites  of sacrifice   That they might celebrate The name of God over The sustenance He gave them From animals  fit for food   But your God is One God   Submit then your wills to Him  In Islam    and give thou The good news to those Who humble themselves
Quran Translation.2629: To those whose hearts  When God is mentioned  Are filled with fear  Who show patient perseverance Over their afflictions  keep up Regular prayer  and spend  In charity  out of what We have bestowed upon them
Quran Translation.2630: The sacrificial camels We have made for you As among the Symbols from God   in them is  much  Good for you   then pronounce The name of God over them As they line up  for sacrifice    When they are down On their sides  after slaughter   Eat ye thereof  and feed Such as  beg not but  Live in contentment  And such as beg With due humility   thus have We made animals subject To you  that ye May be grateful
Quran Translation.2631: It is not their meat Nor their blood  that reaches God   it is your piety That reaches Him   He Has thus made them subject To you  that ye may glorify God for His guidance to you   And proclaim the Good News To all who do right
Quran Translation.2632: Verily God will defend  From ill  those who believe   Verily  God loveth not Any that is a traitor To faith  or shows ingratitude
Quran Translation.2633: To those against whom War is made  permission Is given  to fight   because They are wronged   and verily  God is Most Powerful For their aid
Quran Translation.2634: They are  those who have Been expelled from their homes In defiance of right    For no cause  except That they say    Our Lord Is God    Did not God Check one set of people By means of another  There would surely have been Pulled down monasteries  churches  Synagogues  and mosques  in which The name of God is commemorated In abundant measure  God will Certainly aid those who Aid His  cause    for verily God is Full of Strength  Exalted in Might   Able to enforce His Will
Quran Translation.2635: They are  those who  If We establish them In the land  establish Regular prayer and give Regular charity  enjoin The right and forbid wrong   With God rests the end  And decision  of  all  affairs
Quran Translation.2636: If they treat thy  mission  As false  so did the Peoples Before them  with their Prophets    The People of Noah  And  Ād and Thamūd
Quran Translation.2638: And the Companions Of the Madyan people   And Moses was rejected  In the same way   But I Granted respite to the Unbelievers  And  only  after that Did I punish them   But how  terrible  was My re   of them
Quran Translation.2639: How many populations have We Destroyed  which were given To wrong doing   They tumbled down On their roofs  And how many Wells are lying idle and neglected  And castles lofty and well built
Quran Translation.2640: Do they not travel Through the land  so that Their hearts  and mind  May thus learn wisdom And their ears may Thus learn to hear   Truly it is not their eyes That are blind  but their Hearts which are In their breasts
Quran Translation.2641: Yet they ask thee To hasten on the Punishment   But God will not fail In His promise  Verily A Day in the sight of thy Lord Is like a thousand years Of your reckoning
Quran Translation.2642: And to how many populations Did I give respite  which Were given to wrong doing   In the end I punished them  To Me is the destination  of all
Quran Translation.2643: Say     O men   I am  Sent  to you only to give A clear warning
Quran Translation.2644: Those who believe and work Righteousness  for them Is forgiveness and a sustenance Most generous
Quran Translation.2645: But those who strive Against Our Signs  to frustrate Them  they will be Companions of the Fire
Quran Translation.2646: Never did We send An apostle or a prophet Before thee  but  when he Framed a desire  Satan Threw some  vanity  Into his desire   but God Will cancel anything  vain  That Satan throws in  And God will confirm  And establish  His Signs   For God is full of knowledge And wisdom
Quran Translation.2647: That He may make The suggestions thrown in By Satan  but a trial For those in whose hearts Is a disease and who are Hardened of heart   verily The wrong doers are in a schism Far  from the Truth
Quran Translation.2648: And that those on whom Knowledge has been bestowed may learn That the  Qur ān  is the Truth From thy Lord  and that they May believe therein  and their hearts May be made humbly  open  To it   for verily God is The Guide of those who believe  To the Straight Way
Quran Translation.2649: Those who reject Faith Will not cease to be In doubt concerning  Revelation  Until the Hour  of Judgment  Comes suddenly upon them  Or there comes to them The Penalty of a Day of Disaster
Quran Translation.2650: On that Day the Dominion Will be that of God   He will judge between them   So those who believe And work righteous deeds will be In Gardens of Delight
Quran Translation.2651: And for those who reject Faith And deny Our Signs  There will be a humiliating Punishment
Quran Translation.2652: Those who leave their homes In the cause of God  And are then slain or die   On them will God bestow verily A goodly Provision     God is He Who Bestows the best Provision
Quran Translation.2653: Verily He will admit them To a place with which They shall be well pleased   For God is All Knowing  Most Forbearing
Quran Translation.2654: That  is so   And if one Has retaliated to no greater Extent than the injury he received  And is again set upon Inordinately  God will help Him   for God is One That blots out  sins  And forgives  again and again
Quran Translation.2655: That is because God merges Night into Day  and He Merges Day into Night  and Verily it is God Who hears And sees  all things
Quran Translation.2656: That is because God He Is the Reality   and those Besides Him whom they invoke   They are but vain Falsehood   Verily God is He  Most High  Most Great
Quran Translation.2657: Seest thou not that God Sends down rain from the sky  And forthwith the earth Becomes clothed with green   For God is He Who understands The finest mysteries  and Is well acquainted  with them
Quran Translation.2658: To Him belongs all that is In the heavens and on earth   For verily God  He is Free of all wants  Worthy of all praise
Quran Translation.2659: Seest thou not that God Has made subject to you  men  All that is on the earth  And the ships that sail Through the sea by His command   He withholds the sky  rain  From falling on the earth Except by His leave   For God is Most Kind And Most Merciful to man
Quran Translation.2660: It is He Who gave you life  Will cause you to die  And will again give you Life   truly man is A most ungrateful creature
Quran Translation.2661: To every People have We Appointed rites and ceremonies Which they must follow   Let them not then dispute With thee on the matter  But do thou invite  them  To thy Lord   for thou art Assuredly on the Right Way
Quran Translation.2662: If they do wrangle with thee  Say    God knows best What it is ye are doing
Quran Translation.2663: God will judge between you On the Day of Judgment Concerning the matters in which Ye differ
Quran Translation.2664: Knowest thou not that God knows all that is In heaven and on earth   Indeed it is all In a record  and that Is easy for God
Quran Translation.2665: Yet they worship  besides God  Things for which no authority Has been sent down to them  And of which they have  Really  no knowledge   For those that do wrong There is no helper
Quran Translation.2666: When Our Clear Signs Are rehearsed to them  Thou wilt notice a denial On the faces of the Unbelievers   They nearly attack with violence Those who rehearse Our Signs To them  Say    Shall I Tell you of something  Far  worse than these Signs   It is the Fire  of Hell    God has promised it To the Unbelievers   And evil is that destination
Quran Translation.2667: O men   Here is A parable set forth   Listen to it   Those On whom  besides God  Ye call  cannot create  Even  a fly  if they all Met together for the purpose   And if the fly should snatch Away anything from them  They would have no power To release it from the fly  Feeble are those who petition And those whom they petition
Quran Translation.2668: No just estimate have they Made of God   for God Is He Who is strong And able to carry out His Will
Quran Translation.2669: God chooses Messengers From angels and from men For God is He Who hears And sees  all things
Quran Translation.2670: He knows what is before them And what is behind them   And to God go back All questions  for decision
Quran Translation.2671: O ye who believe   Bow down  prostrate yourselves  And adore your Lord   And do good   That ye may prosper
Quran Translation.2672: And strive in His cause As ye ought to strive   With sincerity and under discipline   He has chosen you  and has Imposed no difficulties on you In religion   it is the cult Of your father Abraham  It is He Who has named You Muslims  both before And in this  Revelation    That the Apostle may be A witness for you  and ye Be witnesses for mankind   So establish regular Prayer  Give regular Charity  And hold fast to God   He is your Protector  The Best to protect And the Best to help
Quran Translation.2673: The Believers must  Eventually  win through
Quran Translation.2674: Those who humble themselves In their prayers
Quran Translation.2676: Who are active in deeds Of charity
Quran Translation.2678: Except with those joined To them in the marriage bond  Or  the captives  whom Their right hands possess   For  in their case  they are Free from blame
Quran Translation.2679: But those whose desires exceed Those limits are transgressors
Quran Translation.2680: Those who faithfully observe Their trusts and their covenants
Quran Translation.2681: And who  strictly  guard Their prayers
Quran Translation.2683: Who will inherit Paradise   They will dwell therein  For ever
Quran Translation.2684: Man We did create From a quintessence  of clay
Quran Translation.2685: Then We placed him As  a drop of  sperm In a place of rest  Firmly fixed
Quran Translation.2686: Then We made the sperm Into a clot of congealed blood   Then of that clot We made A  fœtus  lump   then We Made out of that lump Bones and clothed the bones With flesh   then We developed Out of it another creature  So blessed be God  The Best to create
Quran Translation.2687: After that  at length Ye will die
Quran Translation.2688: Again  on the Day Of Judgment  will ye be Raised up
Quran Translation.2689: And We have made  above you  Seven tracts   and We Are never unmindful Of  Our  Creation
Quran Translation.2690: And We send down water From the sky according to  Due  measure  and We cause it To soak in the soil   And We certainly are able To drain it off  with ease
Quran Translation.2691: With it We grow for you Gardens of date palms And vines   in them have ye Abundant fruits   and of them Ye eat  and have enjoyment
Quran Translation.2692: Also a tree springing Out of Mount Sinai  Which produces oil  And relish for those Who use it for food
Quran Translation.2693: And in cattle  too  ye Have an instructive example   From within their bodies We produce  milk  for you To drink   there are  in them   Besides   numerous  other  Benefits for you   And of their  meat  ye eat
Quran Translation.2694: And on them  as well as In ships  ye ride
Quran Translation.2695: Further  We sent a long line Of prophets for your instruction   We sent Noah to his people   He said    O my people   Worship God   Ye have No other god but Him  Will ye not fear  Him
Quran Translation.2696: The chiefs of the Unbelievers Among his people said     He is no more than a man Like yourselves   his wish is To assert his superiority Over you   if God had wished  To send messengers   He could have sent down Angels   never did we hear Such a thing  as he says   Among our ancestors of old
Quran Translation.2697: And some said      He is Only a man possessed   Wait  and have patience  With him for a time
Quran Translation.2698: Noah  said     O my Lord   Help me   for that they Accuse me of falsehood
Quran Translation.2699: So We inspired him  With this message      Construct The Ark within Our sight And under Our guidance   then When comes Our command  And the fountains of the earth Gush forth  take thou on board Pairs of every species  male And female  and thy family  Except those of them Against whom the Word Has already gone forth   And address Me not In favour of the wrong doers   For they shall be drowned  In the Flood
Quran Translation.2700: And when thou hast embarked On the Ark thou and those With thee  say     Praise be To God  Who has saved us From the people who do wrong
Quran Translation.2701: And say     O my Lord   Enable me to disembark With Thy blessing   for Thou Art the Best to enable  us  To disembark
Quran Translation.2702: Verily in this there are Signs  for men to understand     Thus  do We try  men
Quran Translation.2703: Then We raised after them Another generation
Quran Translation.2704: And We sent to them An apostle from among themselves   Saying     Worship God   Ye have no other god But Him  Will ye not Fear  Him
Quran Translation.2705: And the chiefs Of his people  who disbelieved And denied the Meeting In the Hereafter  and on whom We had bestowed the good things Of this life  said     He is No more than a man Like yourselves   he eats Of that of which ye eat  And drinks of what ye drink
Quran Translation.2706: If ye obey a man Like yourselves  behold  It is certain ye will be lost
Quran Translation.2707: Does he promise that When ye die and become dust And bones  ye shall be Brought forth  again
Quran Translation.2708: Far  very far is that Which ye are promised
Quran Translation.2709: There is nothing but Our life in this world   We shall die and we live   But we shall never Be raised up again
Quran Translation.2710: He is only a man Who invents a lie Against God  but we Are not the ones To believe in him
Quran Translation.2711: The prophet  said     O my Lord   help me   For that they accuse me Of falsehood
Quran Translation.2712: God  said     In but A little while  they Are sure to be sorry
Quran Translation.2713: Then the Blast overtook them With justice  and We made them As rubbish of dead leaves  Floating on the stream of Time    So away with the people Who do wrong
Quran Translation.2714: Then We raised after them Other generations
Quran Translation.2715: No people can hasten Their term  nor can they Delay  it
Quran Translation.2716: Then sent We Our apostles In succession   every time There came to a people Their apostle  they accused him Of falsehood   so We made Them follow each other  In punishment    We made them As a tale  that is told    So away with a people That will not believe
Quran Translation.2717: Then We sent Moses And his brother Aaron  With Our Signs and Authority manifest
Quran Translation.2718: To Pharaoh and his Chiefs   But these behaved insolently   They were an arrogant people
Quran Translation.2719: They said     Shall we believe In two men like ourselves   And their people are subject To us
Quran Translation.2720: So they accused them Of falsehood  and they became Of those who were destroyed
Quran Translation.2721: And We gave Moses The Book  in order that They might receive guidance
Quran Translation.2722: And We made The son of Mary And his mother As a Sign   We gave them both Shelter on high ground  Affording rest and security And furnished with springs
Quran Translation.2723: O ye apostles   enjoy  All  things good and pure  And work righteousness   For I am well acquainted With  all  that ye do
Quran Translation.2724: And verily this Brotherhood Of yours is a single Brotherhood  And I am your Lord And Cherisher   therefore Fear Me  and no other
Quran Translation.2725: But people have cut off Their affair  of unity   Between them  into sects   Each party rejoices in that Which is with itself
Quran Translation.2726: But leave them In their confused ignorance For a time
Quran Translation.2727: Do they think that because We have granted them abundance Of wealth and sons
Quran Translation.2728: We would hasten them On in every good   Nay  They do not understand
Quran Translation.2729: Verily those who live In awe for fear of their Lord
Quran Translation.2730: Those who believe In the Signs of their Lord
Quran Translation.2731: Those who join not  in worship  Partners with their Lord
Quran Translation.2732: And those who dispense Their charity with their hearts Full of fear  because They will return to their Lord
Quran Translation.2733: It is these who hasten In every good work  And these who are Foremost in them
Quran Translation.2734: On no soul do We Place a burden greater Than it can bear   Before Us is a record Which clearly shows the truth   They will never be wronged
Quran Translation.2735: But their hearts are In confused ignorance Of this   and there are  Besides that  deeds of theirs  Which they will  continue  To do
Quran Translation.2736: Until  when We seize In Punishment those of them Who received the good things Of this world  behold  They will groan in supplication
Quran Translation.2737: It will be said      Groan not in supplication This day   for ye shall Certainly not be helped by Us
Quran Translation.2738: My Signs used to be Rehearsed to you  but ye Used to turn back On your heels
Quran Translation.2739: In arrogance   talking nonsense About the  Qur ān   like one Telling fables by night
Quran Translation.2740: Do they not ponder over The Word  of God   or Has anything  new  come To them that did not Come to their fathers of old
Quran Translation.2741: Or do they not recognise Their Apostle  that they Deny him
Quran Translation.2742: Or do they say    he is Possessed     Nay  he has Brought them the Truth  But most of them Hate the Truth
Quran Translation.2743: If the Truth had been In accord with their desires  Truly the heavens and the earth  And all beings therein Would have been in confusion And corruption   Nay  We Have sent them their admonition  But they turn away From their admonition
Quran Translation.2744: Or is it that thou Askest them for some Recompense   But the recompense Of thy Lord is best   He is the Best of those Who give sustenance
Quran Translation.2745: But verily thou callest them To the Straight Way
Quran Translation.2746: And verily those who Believe not in the Hereafter Are deviating from that Way
Quran Translation.2747: If We had mercy on them And removed the distress Which is on them  they Would obstinately persist In their transgression  Wandering in distraction To and fro
Quran Translation.2748: We inflicted Punishment On them  but they Humbled not themselves To their Lord  nor do they Submissively entreat  Him
Quran Translation.2749: Until We open on them A gate leading to A severe Punishment   then Lo   they will be plunged In despair therein
Quran Translation.2750: It is He Who has created For you  the faculties of  Hearing  sight  feeling And understanding   little thanks It is ye give
Quran Translation.2751: And He Has multiplied you Through the earth  and to Him Shall ye be gathered back
Quran Translation.2752: It is He Who gives Life and death  and to Him  Is due  the alternation Of Night and Day   Will ye not then understand
Quran Translation.2753: On the contrary they say Things similar to what The ancients said
Quran Translation.2754: They say     What   When we Die and become dust and bones  Could we really be Raised up again
Quran Translation.2755: Such things have been promised To us and to our fathers Before   They are nothing But tales of the ancients
Quran Translation.2756: Say     To whom belong The earth and all beings therein    Say  if ye know
Quran Translation.2757: They will say    To God     Say     Yet will ye not Receive admonition
Quran Translation.2758: Say     Who is the Lord Of the seven heavens  And the Lord of the Throne  Of Glory  Supreme
Quran Translation.2759: They will say     They belong  To God   Say     Will ye not Then be filled with awe
Quran Translation.2760: Say     Who is it in whose Hands is the governance Of all things  who protects  All   but is not protected  Of any     Say  if ye know
Quran Translation.2761: They will say     It belongs  To God   Say     Then how Are ye deluded
Quran Translation.2762: We have sent them the Truth   But they indeed practice Falsehood
Quran Translation.2763: No son did God beget  Nor is there any god Along with Him    if there were Many gods   behold  each god Would have taken away What he had created  And some would have Lorded it over others   Glory to God    He is free  From the  sort of  things They attribute to Him
Quran Translation.2764: He knows what is hidden And what is open   too high Is He for the partners They attribute to Him
Quran Translation.2765: Say     O my Lord   If Thou wilt show me  In my lifetime  that which They are warned against
Quran Translation.2766: Then  O my Lord   put me not Amongst the people Who do wrong
Quran Translation.2767: And We are certainly able To show thee  in fulfilment  That against which they are warned
Quran Translation.2768: Repel evil with that Which is best   We are Well acquainted with The things they say
Quran Translation.2769: And say   O my Lord   I seek refuge with Thee From the suggestions Of the Evil Ones
Quran Translation.2770: And I seek refuge with Thee O my Lord   lest they Should come near me
Quran Translation.2771: In Falsehood will they be  Until  when death comes To one of them  he says     O my Lord   send me back  To life
Quran Translation.2772: In order that I may Work righteousness in the things I neglected     By no means   It is but a word he says    Before them is a Partition Till the Day they are Raised up
Quran Translation.2773: Then when the Trumpet Is blown  there will be No more relationships Between them that day  Nor will one ask after another
Quran Translation.2774: Then those whose balance  Of good deeds  is heavy   They will attain salvation
Quran Translation.2775: But those whose balance Is light  will be those Who have lost their souls   In Hell will they abide
Quran Translation.2776: The Fire will burn their faces  And they will therein Grin  with their lips displaced
Quran Translation.2777: Were not My Signs rehearsed To you  and ye did but Treat them as falsehoods
Quran Translation.2778: They will say     Our Lord   Our misfortune overwhelmed us  And we became a people Astray
Quran Translation.2779: Our Lord   Bring us out Of this   if ever we return  To evil   then shall we be Wrong doers indeed
Quran Translation.2780: He will say     Be ye Driven into it  with ignominy    And speak ye not to Me
Quran Translation.2781: A part of My servants There was  who used to pray    Our Lord   we believe   Then do Thou forgive us  And have mercy upon us   For Thou art the Best Of those who show mercy
Quran Translation.2782: But ye treated them With ridicule  so much so That  ridicule of  them made you Forget My Message while Ye were laughing at them
Quran Translation.2783: I have rewarded them This day for their patience And constancy   they are indeed The ones that have achieved Bliss
Quran Translation.2784: He will say     What number Of years did ye stay On earth
Quran Translation.2785: They will say     We stayed A day or part of a day   But ask those who Keep account
Quran Translation.2786: He will say     Ye stayed Not but a little   If ye had only known
Quran Translation.2787: Did ye then think That We had created you In jest  and that ye Would not be brought back To Us  for account
Quran Translation.2788: Therefore exalted be God  The King  the Reality   There is no god but He  The Lord of the Throne Of Honour
Quran Translation.2789: If anyone invokes  besides God  Any other god  he has No authority therefor   And his reckoning will be Only with his Lord   And verily the Unbelievers Will fail to win through
Quran Translation.2790: So say     O my Lord   Grant Thou forgiveness and mercy   For Thou art the Best Of those who show mercy
Quran Translation.2791: A Sūra which We Have sent down and Which We have ordained   In it have We sent down Clear Signs  in order that Ye may receive admonition
Quran Translation.2792: The woman and the man Guilty of adultery or fornication   Flog each of them With a hundred stripes   Let not compassion move you In their case  in a matter Prescribed by God  if ye believe In God and the Last Day   And let a party Of the Believers Witness their punishment
Quran Translation.2793: Let no man guilty of Adultery or fornication marry Any but a woman Similarly guilty  or an Unbeliever   Nor let any but such a man Or an Unbeliever Marry such a woman   To the Believers such a thing Is forbidden
Quran Translation.2794: And those who launch A charge against chaste women  And produce not four witnesses  To support their allegation    Flog them with eighty stripes   And reject their evidence Ever after   for such men Are wicked transgressors
Quran Translation.2795: Unless they repent thereafter And mend  their conduct    For God is Oft Forgiving Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2796: And for those who launch A charge against their spouses  And have  in support  No evidence but their own   Their solitary evidence  Can be received  if they Bear witness four times  With an oath  by God That they are solemnly Telling the truth
Quran Translation.2797: And the fifth  oath   Should be  that they solemnly Invoke the curse of God On themselves if they Tell a lie
Quran Translation.2798: But it would avert The punishment from the wife  If she bears witness Four times  with an oath  By God  that  her husband  Is telling a lie
Quran Translation.2799: And the fifth  oath  Should be that she solemnly Invokes the wrath of God On herself if  her accuser  Is telling the truth
Quran Translation.2800: If it were not For God s grace and mercy On you  and that God Is Oft Returning  Full of wisdom    Ye would be ruined indeed
Quran Translation.2801: Those who brought forward The lie are a body Among yourselves   think it not To be an evil to you   On the contrary it is good For you   to every man Among them  will come The punishment  of the sin That he earned  and to him Who took on himself the lead Among them  will be A Penalty grievous
Quran Translation.2802: Why did not Believers  Men and women  when ye Heard of the affair  put The best construction on it In their own minds And say    This  charge  Is an obvious lie
Quran Translation.2803: Why did they not bring Four witnesses to prove it   When they have not brought The witnesses  such men  In the sight of God   Stand forth  themselves as liars
Quran Translation.2804: Were it not for the grace And mercy of God on you  In this world and the Hereafter  A grievous penalty would have Seized you in that ye rushed Glibly into this affair
Quran Translation.2805: Behold  ye received it On your tongues  And said out of your mouths Things of which ye had No knowledge   and ye thought It to be a light matter  While it was most serious In the sight of God
Quran Translation.2806: And why did ye not  When ye heard it  say      It is not right of us To speak of this   Glory to God   this is A most serious slander
Quran Translation.2807: God doth admonish you  That ye may never repeat Such  conduct   if ye Are  true  Believers
Quran Translation.2808: And God makes the Signs Plain to you   for God Is full of knowledge and wisdom
Quran Translation.2809: Those who love  to see  Scandal published broadcast Among the Believers  will have A grievous Penalty in this life And in the Hereafter   God Knows  and ye know not
Quran Translation.2810: Were it not for the grace And mercy of God on you  And that God is Full of kindness and mercy   Ye would be ruined indeed
Quran Translation.2811: O ye who believe   Follow not Satan s footsteps   If any will follow the footsteps Of Satan  he will  but  command What is shameful and wrong   And were it not for the grace And mercy of God on you  Not one of you would ever Have been pure   but God Doth purify whom He pleases   And God is One Who Hears and knows  all things
Quran Translation.2812: Let not those among you Who are endued with grace And amplitude of means Resolve by oath against helping Their kinsmen  those in want  And those who have left Their homes in God s cause   Let them forgive and overlook  Do you not wish That God should forgive you   For God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2813: Those who slander chaste women  Indiscreet but believing  Are cursed in this life And in the Hereafter   For them is a grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.2814: On the Day when their tongues  Their hands  and their feet Will bear witness against them As to their actions
Quran Translation.2815: On that Day God Will pay them back  All  their just dues  And they will realise That God is The  very  Truth  That makes all things manifest
Quran Translation.2816: Women impure are for men impure  And men impure are for women impure And women of purity Are for men of purity  And men of purity Are for women of purity   These are not affected By what people say   For them there is forgiveness  And a provision honourable
Quran Translation.2817: O ye who believe   Enter not houses other than Your own  until ye have Asked permission and saluted Those in them   that is Best for you  in order that Ye may heed  what is seemly
Quran Translation.2818: If ye find no one In the house  enter not Until permission is given To you   if ye are asked To go back  go back   That makes for greater purity For yourselves   and God Knows well all that ye do
Quran Translation.2819: It is no fault on your part To enter houses not used For living in  which serve Some  other  use for you   And God has knowledge Of what ye reveal And what ye conceal
Quran Translation.2820: Say to the believing men That they should lower Their gaze and guard Their modesty   that will make For greater purity for them   and God is well acquainted With all that they do
Quran Translation.2821: And say to the believing women That they should lower Their gaze and guard Their modesty   that they Should not display their Beauty and ornaments except What  must ordinarily  appear Thereof   that they should Draw their veils over Their bosoms and not display Their beauty except To their husbands  their fathers  Their husbands  fathers  their sons  Their husbands  sons  Their brothers or their brothers  sons  Or their sisters  sons  Or their women  or the slaves Whom their right hands Possess  or male servants Free of physical needs  Or small children who Have no sense of the shame Of sex   and that they Should not strike their feet In order to draw attention To their hidden ornaments  And O ye Believers   Turn ye all together Towards God  that ye May attain Bliss
Quran Translation.2822: Marry those among you Who are single  or The virtuous ones among Your slaves  male or female   If they are in poverty  God will give them Means out of His grace   For God encompasseth all  And He knoweth all things
Quran Translation.2823: Let those who find not The wherewithal for marriage Keep themselves chaste  until God gives them means Out of His grace  And if any of your slaves Ask for a deed in writing  To enable them to earn Their freedom for a certain sum   Give them such a deed If ye know any good In them   yea  give them Something yourselves Out of the means which God has given to you  But force not your maids To prostitution when they desire Chastity  in order that ye May make a gain In the goods of this life  But if anyone compels them  Yet  after such compulsion  Is God Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful  to them
Quran Translation.2824: We have already sent down To you verses making things Clear  an illustration from  the story Of  people who passed away Before you  and an admonition For those who fear  God
Quran Translation.2825: God is the Light Of the heavens and the earth  The parable of His Light Is as if there were a Niche And within it a Lamp   The Lamp enclosed in Glass   The glass as it were A brilliant star   Lit from a blessed Tree  An Olive  neither of the East Nor of the West  Whose Oil is well nigh Luminous  Though fire scarce touched it   Light upon Light   God doth guide Whom He will To His Light   God doth set forth Parables For men   and God Doth know all things
Quran Translation.2826: Lit is such a Light  In houses  which God Hath permitted to be raised To honour   for the celebration  In them  of His name   In them is He glorified In the mornings and In the evenings   again and again
Quran Translation.2827: By men whom neither Traffic nor merchandise Can divert from the Remembrance Of God  nor from regular Prayer  Nor from the practice Of regular Charity   Their  only  fear is For the Day when Hearts and eyes Will be transformed  In a world wholly new
Quran Translation.2828: That God may reward them According to the best Of their deeds  and add Even more for them Out of His Grace   For God doth provide For those whom He will  Without measure
Quran Translation.2829: But the Unbelievers   Their deeds are like a mirage In sandy deserts  which The man parched with thirst Mistakes for water   until When he comes up to it  He finds it to be nothing   But he finds God  Ever  with him  and God Will pay him his account   And God is swift In taking account
Quran Translation.2830: Or  the Unbelievers  state  Is like the depths of darkness In a vast deep ocean  Overwhelmed with billow Topped by billow  Topped by  dark  clouds   Depths of darkness  one Above another   if a man Stretches out his hand  He can hardly see it   For any to whom God Giveth not light  There is no light
Quran Translation.2831: Seest thou not that it is God Whose praises all beings In the heavens and on earth Do celebrate  and the birds  Of the air  with wings Outspread   Each one knows Its own  mode of  prayer And praise  And God Knows well all that they do
Quran Translation.2832: Yea  to God belongs The dominion of the heavens And the earth   and to God Is the final goal  of all
Quran Translation.2833: Seest thou not that God Makes the clouds move Gently  then joins them Together  then makes them Into a heap   then wilt thou See rain issue forth From their midst  And He Sends down from the sky Mountain masses  of clouds  Wherein is hail   He strikes Therewith whom He pleases And He turns it away From whom He pleases  The vivid flash of His lightning Well nigh blinds the sight
Quran Translation.2834: It is God Who alternates The Night and the Day   Verily in these things Is an instructive example For those who have vision
Quran Translation.2835: And God has created Every animal from water   Of them there are some That creep on their bellies   Some that walk on two legs   And some that walk on four  God creates what He wills   For verily God has power Over all things
Quran Translation.2836: We have indeed sent down Signs that make things manifest   And God guides whom He wills To a way that is straight
Quran Translation.2837: They say    We believe In God and in the Apostle  And we obey     but Even after that  some of them Turn away   they are not  Really  Believers
Quran Translation.2838: When they are summoned To God and His Apostle  In order that He may judge Between them  behold  some Of them decline  to come
Quran Translation.2839: But if the right is On their side  they come To him with all submission
Quran Translation.2840: Is it that there is A disease in their hearts   Or do they doubt  Or are they in fear  That God and His Apostle Will deal unjustly with them   Nay  it is they themselves Who do wrong
Quran Translation.2841: The answer of the Believers  When summoned to God And His Apostle  in order That He may judge between them  Is no other than this   They say    We hear and we obey     It is such as these That will attain felicity
Quran Translation.2842: It is such as obey God and His Apostle  And fear God and do Right  that will win  In the end
Quran Translation.2843: They swear their strongest oaths By God that  if only thou Wouldst command them  they Would leave  their homes   Say     Swear ye not   Obedience is  more  reasonable   Verily  God is well acquainted With all that ye do
Quran Translation.2844: Say     Obey God  and obey The Apostle     but if ye turn Away  he is only responsible For the duty placed on him And ye for that placed On you  If ye obey him  Ye shall be on right guidance  The Apostle s duty is only To preach the clear  Message
Quran Translation.2845: God has promised  to those Among you who believe And work righteous deeds  that He Will  of a surety  grant them In the land  inheritance  Of power   as He granted it To those before them   that He will establish in authority Their religion the one Which He has chosen for them   And that He will change  Their state   after the fear In which they  lived   to one Of security and peace     They will worship Me  alone  And not associate aught with Me   If any do reject Faith After this  they are Rebellious and wicked
Quran Translation.2846: So establish regular Prayer And give regular Charity   And obey the Apostle   That ye may receive mercy
Quran Translation.2847: Never think thou That the Unbelievers Are going to frustrate  God s Plan  on earth   Their abode is the Fire   And it is indeed An evil refuge
Quran Translation.2848: O ye who believe   Let those whom your right hands Possess  and the  children  among you Who have not come of age Ask your permission  before They come to your presence   On three occasions   before Morning prayer   the while Ye doff your clothes For the noonday heat   And after the late night prayer   These are your three times Of undress   outside those times It is not wrong for you Or for them to move about Attending to each other   Thus does God make clear The Signs to you   for God Is full of knowledge and wisdom
Quran Translation.2849: But when the children among you Come of age  let them  also  Ask for permission  as do those Senior to them  in age    Thus does God make clear His Signs to you   for God Is full of knowledge and wisdom
Quran Translation.2850: Such elderly women as are Past the prospect of marriage   There is no blame on them If they lay aside Their  outer  garments  provided They make not a wanton display Of their beauty   but It is best for them To be modest   and God Is One Who sees and knows All things
Quran Translation.2851: It is no fault in the blind Nor in one born lame  nor In one afflicted with illness  Nor in yourselves  that ye Should eat in your own houses  Or those of your fathers  Or your mothers  or your brothers  Or your sisters  or your father s brothers Or your father s sisters  Or your mother s brothers  Or your mother s sisters  Or in houses of which The keys are in your possession  Or in the house of a sincere Friend of yours   there is No blame on you  whether Ye eat in company or Separately  But if ye Enter houses  salute each other  A greeting of blessing And purity as from God  Thus does God make clear The Signs to you   that ye May understand
Quran Translation.2852: Only those are Believers  Who believe in God and His Apostle   when they are With him on a matter Requiring collective action  They do not depart until They have asked for his leave   Those who ask for thy leave Are those who believe in God And His Apostle   so when They ask for thy leave  For some business of theirs  Give leave to those of them Whom thou wilt  and ask God for their forgiveness   For God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2853: Deem not the summons Of the Apostle among yourselves Like the summons of one Of you to another   God Doth know those of you Who slip away under shelter Of some excuse   then Let those beware who Withstand the Apostle s order  Lest some trial befall them  Or a grievous Penalty Be inflicted on them
Quran Translation.2854: Be quite sure that To God doth belong Whatever is in the heavens And on earth  Well doth He Know what ye are intent upon   And one day they will be Brought back to Him  and He Will tell them the truth Of what they did   For God doth know All things
Quran Translation.2855: Blessed is He Who Sent down the Criterion To His Servant  that it May be an admonition To all creature
Quran Translation.2856: He to Whom belongs The dominion of the heavens And the earth   no son Has He begotten  nor has He A partner in His dominion   It is He Who created All things  and ordered them In due proportions
Quran Translation.2857: Yet have they taken  Besides Him  gods that can Create nothing but are themselves Created   that have no control Of hurt or good to themselves   Nor can they control Death Nor Life nor Resur
Quran Translation.2858: But the Misbelievers say     Naught is this but a lie Which he has forged  And others have helped him At it   In truth it is they Who have put forward An iniquity and a falsehood
Quran Translation.2859: And they say     Tales of The ancients  which he has caused To be written   and they Are dictated before him Morning and evening
Quran Translation.2860: Say     The  Qur ān  was sent down By Him Who knows The Mystery  that is  in the heavens And the earth   verily He Is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2861: And they say     What sort Of an apostle is this  Who eats food  and walks Through the streets   Why Has not an angel Been sent down to him To give admonition with him
Quran Translation.2862: Or  why  has not a treasure Been bestowed on him  or Why has he  not  a garden For enjoyment     The wicked Say     Ye follow none other Than a man bewitched
Quran Translation.2863: See what kinds of comparisons They make for thee   But they have gone astray  And never a way will they Be able to find
Quran Translation.2864: Blessed is He Who  If that were His Will  Could give thee better  things  Than those  Gardens beneath which Rivers flow   and He could Give thee Palaces  secure To dwell in
Quran Translation.2865: Nay  they deny the Hour  Of the Judgment to come    But We have prepared A Blazing Fire for such As deny the Hour
Quran Translation.2866: When it sees them From a place far off  They will hear its fury And its raging sigh
Quran Translation.2867: And when they are cast  Bound together  into a Constricted place therein  they Will plead for destruction There and then
Quran Translation.2868: This day plead not For a single destruction   Plead for destruction oft repeated
Quran Translation.2869: Say     Is that best  or The eternal Garden  promised To the righteous   For them  That is a reward as well As a goal  of attainment
Quran Translation.2870: For them there will be Therein all that they wish for   They will dwell  there  for aye   A promise to be prayed for From thy Lord
Quran Translation.2871: The Day He will gather Them together as well as Those whom they worship Besides God  He will ask     Was it ye who led These My servants astray  Or did they stray From the Path themselves
Quran Translation.2872: They will say     Glory to Thee   Not meet was it for us That we should take For protectors others besides Thee   But Thou didst bestow  On them and their fathers  Good things  in life   until They forgot the Message   For they were a people  Worthless and  lost
Quran Translation.2873: God will say      Now Have they proved you liars In what ye say   so Ye cannot avert  your penalty  Nor  get  help   And whoever Among you does wrong  Him shall We cause to taste Of a grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.2874: And the apostles whom We Sent before thee were all  Men  who ate food And walked through the streets   We have made some of you As a trial for others   Will ye have patience   For God is One Who Sees  all things
Quran Translation.2875: Such as fear not The meeting with Us  For Judgment  say     Why are not the angels Sent down to us  or  Why  do we not see Our Lord     Indeed they Have an arrogant conceit Of themselves  and mighty Is the insolence of their impiety
Quran Translation.2876: The Day they see the angels   No joy will there be To the sinners that Day   The  angels  will say     There is a barrier Forbidden  to you  altogether
Quran Translation.2877: And We shall turn To whatever deeds they did  In this life   and We shall Make such deeds as floating dust Scattered about
Quran Translation.2878: The Companions of the Garden Will be well  that Day  In their abode  and have The fairest of places for repose
Quran Translation.2879: The Day the heaven shall be Rent asunder with clouds  And angels shall be sent down  Descending  in ranks
Quran Translation.2880: That Day  the dominion As of right and truth  Shall be  wholly  for  God  Most Merciful   it will be A Day of dire difficulty For the Misbelievers
Quran Translation.2881: The Day that the wrong doer Will bite at his hands  He will say    Oh   would that I had taken a  straight  path With the Apostle
Quran Translation.2882: Ah   woe is me   Would that I had never Taken such a one For a friend
Quran Translation.2883: He did lead me astray From the Message  of God  After it had come to me   Ah   the Evil One is But a traitor to man
Quran Translation.2884: Then the Apostle will say     O my Lord   Truly My people took this Qur ān For just foolish nonsense
Quran Translation.2885: Thus have We made For every prophet an enemy Among the sinners   but enough Is thy Lord to guide And to help
Quran Translation.2886: Those who reject Faith Say     Why is not the Qur ān Revealed to him all at once     Thus  is it revealed   that We May strengthen thy heart Thereby  and We have Rehearsed it to thee in slow  Well arranged stages  gradually
Quran Translation.2887: And no question do they Bring to thee but We Reveal to thee the truth And the best explanation  thereof
Quran Translation.2888: Those who will be gathered To Hell  prone  on their faces   They will be in an evil Plight  and  as to Path  Most astray
Quran Translation.2889: Before this   We sent Moses The Book  and appointed His brother Aaron with him As Minister
Quran Translation.2890: And We commanded     Go ye Both  to the people who Have rejected our Signs     And those  people  We destroyed With utter destruction
