Quran Translation.2896: He indeed would well nigh Have misled us from Our gods  had it not been That we were constant To them     Soon will they Know  when they see The Penalty  who it is That is most misled In Path
Quran Translation.2897: Seest thou such a one As taketh for his god His own passion  or impulse    Couldst thou be a disposer Of affairs for him
Quran Translation.2898: Or thinkest thou that most Of them listen or understand   They are only like cattle    Nay  they are worse astray In Path
Quran Translation.2899: Hast thou not turned Thy vision to thy Lord    How He doth prolong The Shadow   If He willed  He could make it stationary   Then do We make The sun its guide
Quran Translation.2900: Then We draw it in Towards Ourselves   A contraction by easy stages
Quran Translation.2901: And He it is Who makes The Night as a Robe For you  and Sleep as Repose  And makes the Day  As it were  a Resur
Quran Translation.2902: And He it is Who sends The Winds as heralds Of glad tidings  going before His Mercy  and We send down Purifying water from the sky
Quran Translation.2903: That with it We may give Life to a dead land  And slake the thirst Of things We have created   Cattle and men in great numbers
Quran Translation.2904: And We have distributed The  water  amongst them  in order That they may celebrate  Our  praises  but most men Are averse  to aught  but  Rank  ingratitude
Quran Translation.2905: Had it been Our Will  We could have sent A warner to every centre Of population
Quran Translation.2906: Therefore listen not To the Unbelievers  but strive Against them with the utmost Strenuousness  with the  Qur ān
Quran Translation.2907: It is He Who has Let free the two bodies Of flowing water   One palatable and sweet  And the other salt And bitter   yet has He Made a barrier between them  A partition that is forbidden To be passed
Quran Translation.2908: It is He Who has Created man from water   Then has He established Relationships of lineage And marriage   for thy Lord Has power  over all things
Quran Translation.2909: Yet do they worship  Besides God  things that can Neither profit them nor Harm them   and the Misbeliever Is a helper  of Evil   Against his own Lord
Quran Translation.2910: But thee We only sent To give glad tidings And admonition
Quran Translation.2911: Say     No reward do I Ask of you for it but this   That each one who will May take a  straight  Path To his Lord
Quran Translation.2912: And put thy trust In Him Who lives And dies not   and celebrate His praise   and enough is He To be acquainted with The faults of His servants
Quran Translation.2913: He Who created the heavens And the earth and all That is between  in six days  And is firmly established On the Throne  of authority    God Most Gracious   Ask thou  then  about Him Of any acquainted  with such things
Quran Translation.2914: When it is said to them    Adore ye  God  Most Gracious      They say    And what is  God  Most Gracious   Shall we adore That which thou commandest us     And it increases their flight  From the Truth
Quran Translation.2915: Blessed is He Who made Constellations in the skies  And placed therein a Lamp And a Moon giving light
Quran Translation.2916: And it is He Who made The Night and the Day To follow each other   For such as have the will To celebrate His praises Or to show their gratitude
Quran Translation.2917: And the servants of  God  Most Gracious are those Who walk on the earth In humility  and when the ignorant Address them  they say    Peace
Quran Translation.2918: Those who spend the night In adoration of their Lord Prostrate and standing
Quran Translation.2919: Those who say    Our Lord   Avert from us the Wrath Of Hell  for its Wrath Is indeed an affliction grievous
Quran Translation.2920: Evil indeed is it As an abode  and as A place to rest in
Quran Translation.2921: Those who  when they spend  Are not extravagant and not Niggardly  but hold a just  balance  Between those  extremes
Quran Translation.2922: Those who invoke not  With God  any other god  Nor slay such life as God Has made sacred  except For just cause  not commit Fornication   and any that does This  not only  meets punishment
Quran Translation.2923: But  the Penalty on the Day Of Judgment will be doubled To him  and he will dwell Therein in ignominy
Quran Translation.2924: Unless he repents  believes  And works righteous deeds  For God will change The evil of such persons Into good  and God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2925: And whoever repents and does good Has truly turned to God With an  acceptable  conversion
Quran Translation.2926: Those who witness no falsehood  And  if they pass by futility  They pass by it With honourable  avoidance
Quran Translation.2927: Those who  when they are Admonished with the Signs Of their Lord  droop not down At them as if they were Deaf or blind
Quran Translation.2928: And those who pray    Our Lord   Grant unto us Wives and offspring who will be The comfort of our eyes  And give us  the grace  To lead the righteous
Quran Translation.2929: Those are the ones who Will be rewarded with The highest place in heaven  Because of their patient constancy   Therein shall they be met With salutations and peace
Quran Translation.2930: Dwelling therein   how beautiful An abode and place of rest
Quran Translation.2931: Say  to the Rejecters      My Lord is not uneasy Because of you if ye call not on Him   But ye have indeed rejected  Him   and soon will come The inevitable  punishment
Quran Translation.2933: These are Verses of the Book That makes  things  clear
Quran Translation.2934: It may be thou frettest Thy soul with grief  that they Do not become Believers
Quran Translation.2935: If  such  were Our Will  We could send down to them From the sky a Sign  To which they would bend Their necks in humility
Quran Translation.2936: But there comes not To them a newly revealed Message from  God  Most Gracious  But they turn away therefrom
Quran Translation.2937: They have indeed rejected  The Message    so they will Know soon  enough  the truth Of what they mocked at
Quran Translation.2938: Do they not look At the earth  how many Noble things of all kinds We have produced therein
Quran Translation.2939: Verily  in this is a Sign   But most of them Do not believe
Quran Translation.2940: And verily  thy Lord Is He  the Exalted in Might  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.2941: Behold  thy Lord called Moses     Go to the people Of iniquity
Quran Translation.2942: The people of Pharaoh   Will they not fear God
Quran Translation.2943: He said     O my Lord   I do fear that they Will charge me with falsehood
Quran Translation.2944: My breast will be straitened  And my speech may not go  Smoothly    so send unto Aaron
Quran Translation.2945: And  further   they have A charge of crime against me   And I fear they may Slay me
Quran Translation.2946: God said     By no means   Proceed then  both of you  With Our Signs   We Are with you  and will Listen  to your call
Quran Translation.2947: So go forth  both of you  To Pharaoh  and say     We have been sent By the Lord and Cherisher Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.2948: Send thou with us The Children of Israel
Quran Translation.2949: Pharaoh  said     Did we not Cherish thee as a child Among us  and didst thou not Stay in our midst Many years of thy life
Quran Translation.2950: And thou didst a deed Of thine which  thou knowest  Thou didst  and thou art An ungrateful  wretch
Quran Translation.2951: Moses     I did it Then  when I was In error
Quran Translation.2952: So I fled from you  all  When I feared you   But my Lord has  since  Invested me with judgment  And wisdom  and appointed me As one of the apostles
Quran Translation.2953: And this is the favour With which thou dost Reproach me  that thou Hast enslaved the Children Of Israel
Quran Translation.2954: Pharaoh said     And what Is the   Lord and Cherisher Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.2955: Moses  said     The Lord And Cherisher of the heavens And the earth  and all between  If ye want to be Quite sure
Quran Translation.2956: Pharaoh  said to those Around     Do ye not listen  To what he says
Quran Translation.2957: Moses  said     Your Lord And the Lord of your fathers From the beginning
Quran Translation.2958: Pharaoh  said     Truly Your apostle who has been Sent to you is A veritable madman
Quran Translation.2959: Moses  said     Lord of the East And the West  and all between   If ye only had sense
Quran Translation.2960: Pharaoh  said     If thou Dost put forward any god Other than me  I will Certainly put thee in prison
Quran Translation.2961: Moses  said     Even if I Showed you something Clear  and  convincing
Quran Translation.2962: Pharaoh  said     Show it then  If thou tellest the truth
Quran Translation.2963: So  Moses  threw his rod  And behold  it was A serpent  plain  for all to see
Quran Translation.2964: And he drew out his hand  And behold  it was white To all beholders
Quran Translation.2965: Pharaoh  said to the Chiefs Around him     This is indeed A sorcerer well versed
Quran Translation.2966: His plan is to get you out Of your land by his sorcery   Then what is it ye counsel
Quran Translation.2967: They said     Keep him And his brother in suspense  For a while   and dispatch To the Cities heralds to collect
Quran Translation.2968: And bring up to thee All  our  sorcerers well versed
Quran Translation.2969: So the sorcerers were got Together for the appointment Of a day well known
Quran Translation.2970: And the people were told     Are ye  now  assembled
Quran Translation.2971: That we may follow The sorcerers  in religion  If they win
Quran Translation.2972: So when the sorcerers arrived  They said to Pharaoh     Of course shall we have A  suitable  reward If we win
Quran Translation.2973: He said     Yea   and more    For ye shall in that case Be  raised to posts  Nearest  to my person
Quran Translation.2974: Moses said to them     Throw ye that which Ye are about to throw
Quran Translation.2975: So they threw their ropes And their rods  and said     By the might of Pharaoh  It is we who will Certainly win
Quran Translation.2976: Then Moses threw his rod When  behold  it straightway Swallows up all The falsehoods which they fake
Quran Translation.2977: Then did the sorcerers Fall down  prostrate in adoration
Quran Translation.2978: Saying     We believe In the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.2979: The Lord of Moses and Aaron
Quran Translation.2980: Said  Pharaoh      Believe ye In him before I give You permission   Surely he Is your leader  who has Taught you sorcery   But soon shall ye know   Be sure I will cut off Your hands and your feet On opposite sides  and I Will cause you all To die on the cross
Quran Translation.2981: They said     No matter   For us  we shall but Return to our Lord
Quran Translation.2982: Only  our desire is That our Lord will Forgive us our faults  That we may become Foremost among the Believers
Quran Translation.2983: By inspiration We told Moses     Travel by night with My servants   for surely Ye shall be pursued
Quran Translation.2984: Then Pharaoh sent heralds To  all  the Cities
Quran Translation.2985: Saying      These  Israelites  Are but a small band
Quran Translation.2986: And they are raging Furiously against us
Quran Translation.2987: But we are a multitude Amply fore warned
Quran Translation.2988: So We expelled them From gardens  springs
Quran Translation.2989: Treasures  and every kind Of honourable position
Quran Translation.2990: Thus it was  but We made the Children Of Israel inheritors Of such things
Quran Translation.2991: So they pursued them At sunrise
Quran Translation.2992: And when the two bodies Saw each other  the people Of Moses said     We are Sure to be overtaken
Quran Translation.2993: Moses  said     By no means   My Lord is with me   Soon will He guide me
Quran Translation.2994: Then We told Moses By inspiration     Strike The sea with thy rod   So it divided  and each Separate part become Like the huge  firm mass Of a mountain
Quran Translation.2995: And We made the other Party approach thither
Quran Translation.2996: We delivered Moses and all Who were with him
Quran Translation.2998: Verily in this is a Sign   But most of them Do not believe
Quran Translation.2999: And verily thy Lord Is He  the Exalted in Might  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3000: And rehearse to them  Something of  Abraham s story
Quran Translation.3001: Behold  he said To his father and his people     What worship ye

Quran Translation.3003: He said     Do they listen To you when ye call  on them
Quran Translation.3004: Or do you good or harm
Quran Translation.3005: They said     Nay  but we Found our fathers doing Thus  what we do
Quran Translation.3006: He said     Do ye then See whom ye have been Worshipping
Quran Translation.3007: Ye and your fathers before you
Quran Translation.3008: For they are enemies to me   Not so the Lord and Cherisher Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3009: Who created me  and It is He who guides me
Quran Translation.3010: Who gives me food and drink
Quran Translation.3011: And when I am ill  It is He who cures me
Quran Translation.3012: Who will cause me to die  And then to live  again
Quran Translation.3013: And who  I hope  Will forgive me my faults On the Day of Judgment

Quran Translation.3015: Grant me honourable mention On the tongue of truth Among the latest  generations
Quran Translation.3016: Make me one of the inheritors Of the Garden of Bliss
Quran Translation.3017: Forgive my father  for that He is among those astray
Quran Translation.3018: And let me not be In disgrace on the Day When  men  will be raised up

Quran Translation.3020: But only he  will prosper  That brings to God A sound heart
Quran Translation.3021: To the righteous  the Garden Will be brought near
Quran Translation.3022: And to those straying in Evil  The Fire will be placed In full view
Quran Translation.3023: And it shall be said To them     Where are The  gods  ye worshipped
Quran Translation.3024: Besides God   Can they Help you or help themselves
Quran Translation.3025: Then they will be thrown Headlong into the  Fire    They and those straying In Evil
Quran Translation.3026: And the whole hosts Of Iblīs together
Quran Translation.3027: They will say there In their mutual bickerings
Quran Translation.3028: By God  we were truly In an error manifest
Quran Translation.3029: When we held you as equals With the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3030: And our seducers were Only those who were Steeped in guilt
Quran Translation.3031: Now  then  we have none To intercede  for us
Quran Translation.3032: Nor a single friend To feel  for us
Quran Translation.3033: Now if we only had A chance of return  We shall truly be Of those who believe
Quran Translation.3034: Verily in this is a Sign But most of them Do not believe
Quran Translation.3035: And verily thy Lord Is He  the Exalted in Might  Most Merciful

Quran Translation.3121: Verily in that is a Sign   But most of them Do not believe

Quran Translation.3123: Verily this is a Revelation From the Lord of the Worlds

Quran Translation.3125: To thy heart and mind  That thou mayest admonish

Quran Translation.3128: Is it not a Sign To them that the Learned Of the Children of Israel Knew it  as true

Quran Translation.3130: And had he recited it To them  they would not Have believed in it

Quran Translation.3134: Then they will say     Shall we be respited

Quran Translation.3136: Seest thou   If We do Let them enjoy  this life  For a few years
Quran Translation.3137: Yet there comes to them At length the  Punishment  Which they were promised
Quran Translation.3138: It will profit them not That they enjoyed  this life
Quran Translation.3139: Never did We destroy A population  but had Its warners
Quran Translation.3140: By way of reminder   And We never are unjust
Quran Translation.3141: No evil ones have brought Down this  Revelation
Quran Translation.3142: It would neither suit them Nor would they be able  To produce it
Quran Translation.3143: Indeed they have been removed Far from even  a chance of  Hearing it
Quran Translation.3144: So call not on any Other god with God  Or thou wilt be among Those under the Penalty
Quran Translation.3146: And lower thy wing To the Believers who Follow thee
Quran Translation.3147: Then if they disobey thee  Say     I am free  of responsibility  For what ye do
Quran Translation.3148: And put thy trust On the Exalted in Might  The Merciful
Quran Translation.3149: Who seeth thee standing Forth  in prayer
Quran Translation.3150: And thy movements among Those who prostrate themselves
Quran Translation.3151: For it is He Who heareth and knoweth All things
Quran Translation.3152: Shall I inform you   O people     on whom it is That the evil ones descend
Quran Translation.3153: They descend on every Lying  wicked person
Quran Translation.3154: Into whose ears  they pour Hearsay vanities  and most Of them are liars
Quran Translation.3155: And the Poets   It is those straying in Evil  Who follow them
Quran Translation.3156: Seest thou not that they Wander distracted in every Valley
Quran Translation.3157: And that they say What they practice not
Quran Translation.3158: Except those who believe  Work righteousness  engage much In the remembrance of God  And defend themselves only after They are unjustly attacked  And soon will the unjust Assailants know what vicissitudes Their affairs will take
Quran Translation.3159: Tā  Sīn  These are verses Of the Qur ān  a Book That makes  things  clear
Quran Translation.3160: A Guide   and Glad Tidings For the Believers
Quran Translation.3161: Those who establish regular prayers And give in regular charity  And also have  full  assurance Of the Hereafter
Quran Translation.3162: As to those who believe not In the Hereafter  We have Made their deeds pleasing In their eyes   and so they Wander about in distraction
Quran Translation.3163: Such are they for whom A grievous Penalty is  waiting    And in the Hereafter theirs Will be the greatest loss
Quran Translation.3164: As to thee  the Qur ān Is bestowed upon thee From the presence of One Who is Wise and All Knowing
Quran Translation.3165: Behold   Moses said To his family     I perceive A fire   soon will I bring you From there some information  Or I will bring you A burning brand to light Our fuel  that ye may Warm yourselves
Quran Translation.3166: But when he came To the  Fire   a voice Was heard     Blessed are those In the Fire and those around   And Glory to God  The Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3167: O Moses   Verily  I am God  the Exalted In Might  the Wise
Quran Translation.3168: Now do thou throw thy rod     But when he saw it Moving  of its own accord  As if it had been a snake  He turned back in retreat  And retraced not his steps     O Moses      it was said     Fear not   truly  in My presence  Those called as apostles Have no fear
Quran Translation.3169: But if any have done wrong And have thereafter substituted Good to take the place of evil  Truly  I am Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3170: Now put thy hand into Thy bosom  and it will Come forth white without stain  Or harm     these are  among The nine Signs  thou wilt take  To Pharaoh and his people   For they are a people Rebellious in transgression
Quran Translation.3171: But when Our Signs came To them  that should have Opened their eyes  they said     This is sorcery manifest
Quran Translation.3172: And they rejected those Signs In iniquity and arrogance  Though their souls were convinced Thereof   so see what was The end of those Who acted corruptly
Quran Translation.3173: We gave  in the past  Knowledge to David and Solomon   And they both said     Praise be to God  Who Has favoured us above many Of His servants who believe
Quran Translation.3174: And Solomon was David s heir  He said     O ye people   We have been taught the speech Of Birds  and on us Has been bestowed  a little  Of all things   this is Indeed Grace manifest  from God
Quran Translation.3175: And before Solomon were marshalled His hosts  of Jinns and men And birds  and they were all Kept in order and ranks
Quran Translation.3176: At length  when they came To a  lowly  valley of ants  One of the ants said     O ye ants  get into Your habitations  lest Solomon And his hosts crush you  Under foot  without knowing it
Quran Translation.3177: So he smiled  amused At her speech   and he said    O my Lord   so order me That I may be grateful For Thy favours  which Thou Hast bestowed on me and On my parents  and that I may work the righteousness That will please Thee   And admit me  by Thy Grace  To the ranks of Thy Righteous Servants
Quran Translation.3178: And he took a muster Of the Birds   and he said     Why is it I see not The Hoopoe   Or is he Among the absentees
Quran Translation.3179: I will certainly punish him With a severe penalty  Or execute him  unless he Bring me a clear reason  For absence
Quran Translation.3180: But the Hoopoe tarried not Far   he  came up and  said     I have compassed  territory  Which thou hast not compassed  And I have come to thee From Sabā with tidings true
Quran Translation.3181: I found  there  a woman Ruling over them and provided With every requisite   and she Has a magnificent throne
Quran Translation.3182: I found her and her people Worshipping the sun besides God   Satan has made their deeds Seem pleasing in their eyes  And has kept them away From the Path  so They receive no guidance
Quran Translation.3183: Kept them away from the Path   That they should not worship God  Who brings to light What is hidden in the heavens And the earth  and knows What ye hide and what Ye reveal
Quran Translation.3184: God   there is no god But He   Lord of the Throne Supreme
Quran Translation.3185: Solomon  said     Soon shall we See whether thou hast told The truth or lied
Quran Translation.3186: Go thou  with this letter Of mine  and deliver it To them   then draw back From them  and  wait to  see What answer they return
Quran Translation.3187: The Queen  said     Ye chiefs   Here is delivered to me  A letter worthy of respect
Quran Translation.3188: It is from Solomon  and is  As follows      In the name Of God  Most Gracious  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3189: Be ye not arrogant Against me  but come To me in submission  To the true Religion
Quran Translation.3190: She said     Ye chiefs   Advise me in  this  My affair   no affair Have I decided Except in your presence
Quran Translation.3191: They said     We are endued With strength  and given To vehement war   But the command is With thee   so consider What thou wilt command
Quran Translation.3192: She said     Kings  when they Enter a country  despoil it  And make the noblest Of its people its meanest   Thus do they behave
Quran Translation.3193: But I am going to send Him a present  and  wait  To see with what  answer  Return  my  ambassadors
Quran Translation.3194: Now when  the embassy  came To Solomon  he said     Will ye give me abundance In wealth   But that which God has given me is better Than that which He has Given you   Nay it is ye Who rejoice in your gift
Quran Translation.3195: Go back to them  and be sure We shall come to them With such hosts as they Will never be able to meet   We shall expel them From there in disgrace  And they will feel Humbled  indeed
Quran Translation.3196: He said  to his own men      Ye Chiefs   which of you Can bring me her throne Before they come to me In submission
Quran Translation.3197: Said an  Ifrīt  of the Jinns     I will bring it to thee Before thou rise from thy Council   indeed I have Full strength for the purpose  And may be trusted
Quran Translation.3198: Said one who had knowledge Of the Book     I will Bring it to thee within The twinkling of an eye     Then when  Solomon  saw it Placed firmly before him  He said     This is By the grace of my Lord    To test me whether I am Grateful or ungrateful   And if any is grateful  Truly his gratitude is  a gain  For his own soul   but if Any is ungrateful  truly My Lord is Free of all Needs  Supreme in Honour
Quran Translation.3199: He said     Transform her throne Out of all recognition by her   Let us see whether she Is guided  to the truth  Or is one of those who Receive no guidance
Quran Translation.3200: So when she arrived  She was asked    Is this Thy throne     She said    It was just like this   And knowledge was bestowed On us in advance of this  And we have submitted To God  in Islām
Quran Translation.3201: And he diverted her From the worship of others Besides God   for she was  Sprung  of a people That had no faith
Quran Translation.3202: She was asked to enter That lofty Palace   but When she saw it  she Thought it was a lake Of water  and she  tucked up Her skirts   uncovering her legs  He said     This is But a palace paved Smooth with slabs of glass   She said     O my Lord   I have indeed wronged My soul   I do  now  Submit  in Islām   with Solomon  To the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3203: We sent  aforetime   To the Thamūd  their brother Ṣāliḥ  saying    Serve God     But behold  they became Two factions quarrelling With each other
Quran Translation.3204: He said     O my people   Why ask ye to hasten on The evil in preference to the good   If only ye ask God for forgiveness  Ye may hope to receive mercy
Quran Translation.3205: They said     Ill omen Do we augur from thee And those that are with thee    He said     Your ill omen Is with God   yea  ye are A people under trial
Quran Translation.3206: There were in the City Nine men of a family  Who made mischief in the land  And would not reform
Quran Translation.3207: They said     Swear A mutual oath by God That we shall make A secret night attack On him and his people  And that we shall then Say to his heir  when he Seeks vengeance      We were not Present at the slaughter Of his people  and we are Positively telling the truth
Quran Translation.3208: They plotted and planned  But We too planned  Even while they perceived it not
Quran Translation.3209: Then see what was the end Of their plot   this  That We destroyed them And their people  all  of them
Quran Translation.3210: Now such were their houses   In utter ruin  because They practiced wrong doing  Verily in this is a Sign For people of knowledge
Quran Translation.3211: And We saved those Who believed and practiced Righteousness
Quran Translation.3212: We also sent  Lūṭ  As an apostle    behold  He said to his people    Do ye do what is shameful Though ye see  its iniquity
Quran Translation.3213: Would ye really approach men In your lusts rather than Women   Nay  ye are A people  grossly  ignorant
Quran Translation.3214: But his people gave No other answer but this   They said    Drive out The followers of Lūṭ from Your city   these are Indeed men who want To be clean and pure
Quran Translation.3215: But We saved him And his family  except His wife   her We destined To be of those Who lagged behind
Quran Translation.3216: And We rained down on them A shower  of brimstone    And evil was the shower On those who were admonished  But heeded not
Quran Translation.3217: Say   Praise be to God  And Peace on His servants Whom He has chosen  For His Message    Who  Is better   God or The false gods they associate  With Him
Quran Translation.3218: Or  who has created The heavens and the earth  And who sends you down Rain from the sky   Yea  with it We cause To grow well planted orchards Full of beauty and delight   It is not in your power To cause the growth Of the trees in them   Can there be Another  god besides God   Nay  they are a people Who swerve from justice
Quran Translation.3219: Or  who has made the earth Firm to live in   made Rivers in its midst   set Thereon mountains immovable   And made a separating bar Between the two bodies Of flowing water    Can there be another  god Besides God   Nay  most Of them know not
Quran Translation.3220: Or  who listens to the  soul  Distressed when it calls On Him  and who relieves Its suffering  and makes you  Mankind  inheritors of the earth    Can there be another  god Besides God   Little it is That ye heed
Quran Translation.3221: Or  who guides you Through the depths of darkness On land and sea  and who Sends the winds as heralds Of glad tidings  going before His Mercy    Can there be Another  god besides God    High is God above what They associate with Him
Quran Translation.3222: Or  who originates Creation  Then repeats it  And who gives you sustenance From heaven and earth    Can there be another  god Besides God   Say    Bring forth Your argument  if ye Are telling the truth
Quran Translation.3223: Say   None in the heavens Or on earth  except God  Knows what is hidden   Nor can they perceive When they shall be raised Up  for Judgment
Quran Translation.3224: Still less can their knowledge Comprehend the Hereafter   nay They are in doubt and uncertainty Thereanent   nay  they are blind Thereunto
Quran Translation.3225: The Unbelievers say     What   When we become dust   We and our fathers  shall we Really be raised  from the dead
Quran Translation.3226: It is true we were promised This  we and our fathers Before  us    these are nothing But tales of the ancients
Quran Translation.3227: Say     Go ye through the earth And see what has been The end of those guilty  Of sin
Quran Translation.3228: But grieve not over them  Nor distress thyself Because of their plots
Quran Translation.3229: They also say     When will This promise  come to pass     Say  if ye are truthful
Quran Translation.3230: Say     It may be that Some of the events which Ye wish to hasten on May be  close  in your pursuit
Quran Translation.3231: But verily thy Lord is Full of grace to mankind   Yet most of them are ungrateful
Quran Translation.3232: And verily thy Lord knoweth All that their hearts do hide  As well as all that They reveal
Quran Translation.3233: Nor is there aught Of the Unseen  in heaven Or earth  but is  recorded  In a clear record
Quran Translation.3234: Verily this Qur ān doth explain To the Children of Israel Most of the matters In which they disagree
Quran Translation.3235: And it certainly is A Guide and a Mercy To those who believe
Quran Translation.3236: Verily thy Lord will decide Between them by His Decree   And He is Exalted in Might  All Knowing
Quran Translation.3237: So put thy trust in God   For thou art on  the Path Of  manifest Truth
Quran Translation.3238: Truly thou canst not cause The Dead to listen  nor Canst thou cause the Deaf To hear the call   Especially  when they Turn back in retreat
Quran Translation.3239: Nor canst thou be a guide To the Blind   to prevent them  From straying   only those Wilt thou get to listen Who believe in Our Signs  And they will bow in Islam
Quran Translation.3240: And when the Word is Fulfilled against them  the unjust   We shall produce from the earth A Beast to  face  them   He will speak to them  For that mankind did not Believe with assurance In Our Signs
Quran Translation.3241: One Day We shall gather Together from every people A troop of those who reject Our Signs  and they shall Be kept in ranks
Quran Translation.3242: Until  when they come  Before the Judgment seat    God  will say     Did ye Reject My Signs  though ye Comprehended them not In knowledge  or what Was it ye did
Quran Translation.3243: And the Word will be Fulfilled against them  because Of their wrong doing  and they Will be unable to speak  In plea
Quran Translation.3244: See they not that We Have made the Night For them to rest in And the Day to give Them light   Verily in this Are Signs for any people That believe
Quran Translation.3245: And the Day that the Trumpet Will be sounded then will be Smitten with terror those Who are in the heavens  And those who are on earth  Except such as God will please  To exempt    and all shall come To His  Presence  as beings Conscious of their lowliness
Quran Translation.3246: Thou seest the mountains And thinkest them firmly fixed   But they shall pass away As the clouds pass away    Such is  the artistry of God  Who disposes of all things In perfect order   for He is Wellacquainted with all that ye do
Quran Translation.3247: If any do good  good will  Accrue  to them therefrom   And they will be secure From terror that Day
Quran Translation.3248: And if any do evil  Their faces will be thrown Headlong into the Fire     Do ye receive a reward Other than that which ye Have earned by your deeds
Quran Translation.3249: For me  I have been Commanded to serve the Lord Of this City  Him Who has Sanctified it and to Whom  Belong  all things   And I am commanded To be of those who bow In Islam to God s Will
Quran Translation.3250: And to rehearse the Qur ān   And if any accept guidance  They do it for the good Of their own souls  And if any stray  say     I am only a Warner
Quran Translation.3251: And say     Praise be to God  Who will soon show you His Signs  so that ye Shall know them     and thy Lord Is not unmindful Of all that ye do
Quran Translation.3253: These are Verses of the Book That makes  things  clear
Quran Translation.3254: We rehearse to thee some Of the story of Moses And Pharaoh in Truth  For people who believe
Quran Translation.3255: Truly Pharaoh elated himself In the land and broke up Its people into  s  Depressing a small group Among them   their sons he slew  But he kept alive their females   For he was indeed A maker of mischief
Quran Translation.3256: And We wished to be Gracious to those who were Being depressed in the land  To make them leaders  in faith  And make them heirs
Quran Translation.3257: To establish a firm place For them in the land  And to show Pharaoh  Hāmān  And their hosts  at their hands  The very things against which They were taking precautions
Quran Translation.3258: So We sent this inspiration To the mother of Moses     Suckle  thy child   but when Thou hast fears about him  Cast him into the river  But fear not nor grieve   For We shall restore him To thee  and We shall make Him one of Our apostles
Quran Translation.3259: Then the people of Pharaoh Picked him up  from the river     It was intended  that  Moses  Should be to them an adversary And a cause of sorrow   For Pharaoh and Hāmān And  all  their hosts were Men of sin
Quran Translation.3260: The wife of Pharaoh said      Here is  a joy of the eye  For me and for thee   Slay him not  It may be That he will be of use To us  or we may adopt Him as a son   And they Perceived not  what they Were doing
Quran Translation.3261: But there came to be A void in the heart Of the mother of Moses   She was going almost to Disclose his  case   had We Not strengthened her heart  With faith   so that she Might remain a  firm  believer
Quran Translation.3262: And she said to the sister Of  Moses     Follow him    So she  the sister  watched him In the character of a stranger  And they knew not
Quran Translation.3263: And We ordained that he Refused suck at first  until  His sister came up And  said     Shall I Point out to you the people Of a house that will nourish And bring him up for you And be sincerely attached To him
Quran Translation.3264: Thus did We restore him To his mother  that her eye Might be comforted  that she Might not grieve  and that She might know that the promise Of God is true   but Most of them do not understand
Quran Translation.3265: When he reached full age  And was firmly established  In life   We bestowed on him Wisdom and knowledge   for thus Do We reward those Who do good
Quran Translation.3266: And he entered the City At a time when its people Were not watching   and he Found there two men fighting   One of his own religion  And the other  of his foes  Now the man of his own Religion appealed to him Against his foe  and Moses Struck him with his fist And made an end of him  He said     This is a work Of Evil  Satan    for he is An enemy that manifestly Misleads
Quran Translation.3267: He prayed     O my Lord   I have indeed wronged my soul   Do Thou then forgive me     So  God  forgave him   for He Is the Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3268: He said     O my Lord   For that Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace on me  never Shall I be a help To those who sin
Quran Translation.3269: So he saw the morning In the City  looking about  In a state of fear  when Behold  the man who had  The day before  sought his help Called aloud for his help  Again   Moses said to him     Thou art truly  it is clear  A quarrelsome fellow
Quran Translation.3270: Then  when he decided to lay Hold of the man who was An enemy to both of them  That man said     O Moses   Is it thy intention to slay me As thou slewest a man Yesterday   Thy intention is None other than to become A powerful violent man In the land  and not to be One who sets things right
Quran Translation.3271: And there came a man  Running  from the furthest end Of the City  He said     O Moses   the Chiefs Are taking counsel together About thee  to slay thee   So get thee away  for I Do give thee sincere advice
Quran Translation.3272: He therefore got away therefrom  Looking about  in a state Of fear  He prayed     O my Lord   save me From people given to wrong doing
Quran Translation.3273: Then  when he turned his face Towards  the land of  Madyan  He said     I do hope That my Lord will show me The smooth and straight Path
Quran Translation.3274: And when he arrived at The watering  place  in Madyan  He found there a group Of men watering  their flocks   And besides them he found Two women who were keeping Back  their flocks   He said     What is the matter with you     They said     We cannot water  Our flocks  until the shepherds Take back  their flocks    And our father is A very old man
Quran Translation.3275: So he watered  their flocks  For them   then he turned back To the shade  and said     O my Lord   Truly am I In  desperate  need Of any good That thou dost send me
Quran Translation.3276: Afterwards one of the  damsels  Came  back  to him  walking Bashfully  She said     My father Invites thee that he may Reward thee for having watered  Our flocks  for us   So when He came to him and narrated The story  he said     Fear thou not    well  hast thou Escaped from unjust people
Quran Translation.3277: Said one of the  damsels      O my  dear  father   engage Him on wages   truly the best Of men for thee to employ is The  man  who is strong and trusty
Quran Translation.3278: He said     I intended to wed One of these my daughters To thee  on condition that Thou serve me for eight years   But if thou complete ten years  It will be  grace  from thee  But I intend not to place Thee under a difficulty   Thou wilt find me  Indeed  if God wills  One of the righteous
Quran Translation.3279: He said     Be that  the agreement  Between me and thee   Whichever of the two terms I fulfil  let there be No ill will to me  Be God a witness To what we
Quran Translation.3280: Now when Moses had fulfilled The term  and was travelling With his family  he perceived A fire in the di  Of Mount Ṭūr  He said To his family     Tarry ye   I perceive a fire   I hope To bring you from there Some information  or a burning Firebrand  that ye may Warm yourselves
Quran Translation.3281: But when he came To the  Fire   a voice Was heard from the right bank Of the valley  from a tree In hallowed ground     O Moses   Verily I am God  the Lord Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3282: Now do thou throw thy rod     But when he saw it Moving  of its own accord  As if it had been a snake  He turned back in retreat  And retraced not his steps     O Moses      it was said     Draw near  and fear not   For thou art of those Who are secure
Quran Translation.3283: Move thy hand into Thy bosom  and it will Come forth white without stain  Or harm   and draw thy hand Close to thy side  To guard  against fear  Those are the two credentials From thy Lord to Pharaoh And his Chiefs   for truly They are a people Rebellious and wicked
Quran Translation.3284: He said     O my Lord   I have slain a man Among them  and I fear Lest they slay me
Quran Translation.3285: And my brother Aaron  He is more eloquent in speech Than I   so send him With me as a helper  To confirm  and strengthen  me   For I fear that they may Accuse me of falsehood
Quran Translation.3286: He said     We will certainly Strengthen thy arm through Thy brother  and invest you both With authority  so they Shall not be able to Touch you   with Our Signs Shall ye triumph  you two As well as those Who follow you
Quran Translation.3287: When Moses came to them With Our Clear Signs  they said     This is nothing but sorcery Faked up   never did we Hear the like among our fathers Of old
Quran Translation.3288: Moses said     My Lord Knows best who it is That comes with guidance From Him and whose End Will be best in the Hereafter   Certain it is that The wrong doers will not prosper
Quran Translation.3289: Pharaoh said     O Chiefs   No god do I know for you But myself   therefore  O Hāmān   light me a  kiln To bake bricks  out of clay  And build me a lofty Palace  that I may mount up To the god of Moses   But as far as I am concerned  I think  Moses  is a liar
Quran Translation.3290: And he was arrogant and insolent In the land  beyond reason   He and his hosts   they thought That they would not have To return to Us
Quran Translation.3291: So We seized him And his hosts  and We Flung them into the sea   Now behold what was the End Of those who did wrong
Quran Translation.3292: And We made them  but  Leaders inviting to the Fire   And on the Day of Judgment No help shall they find
Quran Translation.3293: In this world We made A Curse to follow them   And on the Day of Judgment They will be among The loathed  and despised
Quran Translation.3294: We did reveal to Moses The Book after We had Destroyed the earlier generations   To give  Insight to men  And Guidance and Mercy  That they might receive admonition
Quran Translation.3295: Thou wast not on the Western Side when We decreed The Commission to Moses  Nor wast thou a witness  Of those events
Quran Translation.3296: But We raised up  new  Generations  and long were the ages That passed over them   But thou wast not a dweller Among the people of Madyan  Rehearsing Our Signs to them   But it is We Who send Apostles  with inspiration
Quran Translation.3297: Nor wast thou at the side Of  the Mountain of  Ṭūr When We called  to Moses   Yet  art thou sent  As a Mercy from thy Lord  To give warning to a people To whom no warner had come Before thee   in order that They may receive admonition
Quran Translation.3298: If  We had  not  sent thee To the Quraish   in case A calamity should seize them For  the deeds  that their hands Have sent forth  they might say     Our Lord   why didst Thou not Send us an apostle   We Should then have followed Thy Signs and been amongst Those who believe
Quran Translation.3299: But  now   when the Truth Has come to them from Ourselves  They say    Why are not  Signs  sent to him  like Those which were sent to Moses     Do they not then reject  The Signs  which were formerly Sent to Moses   They say     Two kinds of sorcery  Each assisting the other     And they say     For us  We reject all  such things
Quran Translation.3300: Say     Then bring ye A Book from God  Which is a better Guide Than either of them  That I may follow it    Do   if ye are truthful
Quran Translation.3301: But if they hearken not To thee  know that they Only follow their own lusts   And who is more astray Than one who follows his own Lusts  devoid of guidance From God   For God guides not People given to wrong doing
Quran Translation.3302: Now have We caused The Word to reach them Themselves  in order that They may receive admonition
Quran Translation.3303: Those to whom We sent The Book before this  they Do believe in this  Revelation
Quran Translation.3304: And when it is recited To them  they say     We Believe therein  for it is The Truth from our Lord   Indeed we have been Muslims  Bowing to God s Will  From before this
Quran Translation.3305: Twice will they be given Their reward  for that they Have persevered  that they avert Evil with Good  and that They spend  in charity  out of What We have given them
Quran Translation.3306: And when they hear vain talk  They turn away therefrom And say     To us our deeds  And to you yours   Peace be to you   we Seek not the ignorant
Quran Translation.3307: It is true thou wilt not Be able to guide every one Whom thou lovest   but God Guides those whom He will  And He knows best those Who receive guidance
Quran Translation.3308: They say     If we were To follow the guidance with thee  We should be snatched away From our land   Have We not Established for them a secure Sanctuary  to which are brought As tribute fruits of all kinds   A provision from Ourselves   But most of them understand not
Quran Translation.3309: And how many populations We destroyed  which exulted In their life  of ease and plenty    Now those habitations of theirs  After them  are deserted   All but a  miserable  few   And We are their heirs
Quran Translation.3310: Nor was thy Lord the one To destroy a population until He had sent to its Center An apostle  rehearsing to them Our Signs   nor are We Going to destroy a population Except when its members Practice iniquity
Quran Translation.3311: The  material  things which Ye are given are but The conveniences of this life And the glitter thereof   But that which is with God Is better and more enduring   Will ye not then be wise
Quran Translation.3312: Are  these two  alike    One to whom We have made A goodly promise  and who Is going to reach its  fulfilment   And one to whom We have Given the good things of this Life  but who  on the Day Of Judgment  is to be among Those brought up  for punishment
Quran Translation.3313: That Day  God  will Call to them  and say     Where are My   partners      Whom ye imagined  to be such
Quran Translation.3314: Those against whom the charge Will be proved  will say     Our Lord   These are the ones Whom we led astray   We led them astray  as we Were astray ourselves   we free Ourselves  from them  in Thy presence   It was not us they worshipped
Quran Translation.3315: It will be said  to them      Call upon your   partners    For help      they will call Upon them  but they will not Listen to them   and they Will see the Penalty  before them     How they will wish    If only they had been Open to guidance
Quran Translation.3316: That Day  God  will Call to them  and say     What was the answer Ye gave to the apostles
Quran Translation.3317: Then the  whole  story that day Will seem obscure to them  Like light to the blind  And they will not be able  Even  to question each other
Quran Translation.3318: But any that  in this life  Had repented  believed  and worked Righteousness  will have hopes To be among those who Achieve salvation
Quran Translation.3319: Thy Lord does create and choose As He pleases   no choice Have they  in the matter    Glory to God   and far Is He above the partners They ascribe  to Him
Quran Translation.3320: And thy Lord knows all That their hearts conceal And all that they reveal
Quran Translation.3321: And He is God   there is No god but He  To Him Be praise  at the first And at the last   For Him is the Command  And to Him shall ye  All  be brought back
Quran Translation.3322: Say   See ye   If God Were to make the Night Perpetual over you to the Day Of Judgment  what god Is there other than God  Who can give you enlightenment   Will ye not then hearken
Quran Translation.3323: Say   See ye   If God Were to make the Day Perpetual over you to the Day Of Judgment  what god Is there other than God  Who can give you a Night In which ye can rest   Will ye not then see
Quran Translation.3324: It is out of His Mercy That He has made for you Night and Day  that ye May rest therein  and that Ye may seek of His Grace    And in order that ye May be grateful
Quran Translation.3325: The Day that He will Call on them  He will say     Where are My   partners      Whom ye imagined  to be such
Quran Translation.3326: And from each people Shall We draw a witness  And We shall say     Produce your Proof     then shall they Know that the Truth is in God  alone   and the  lies  Which they invented will Leave them in the lurch
Quran Translation.3327: Qārūn was doubtless  Of the people of Moses   but He acted insolently towards them   Such were the treasures We Had bestowed on him  that Their very keys would Have been a burden to A body of strong men  Behold  his people said to him     Exult not  for God loveth not Those who exult  in riches
Quran Translation.3328: But seek  with the  wealth  Which God has bestowed on thee  The Home of the Hereafter  Nor forget thy portion in this World   but do thou good  As God has been good To thee  and seek not  Occasions for  mischief in the land   For God loves not those Who do mischief
Quran Translation.3329: He said     This has been given To me because of a certain Knowledge which I have   Did he not know that God Had destroyed  before him   Whole  generations  which were Superior to him in strength And greater in amount  Of riches  they had collected   But the wicked are not Called  immediately  to account For their sins
Quran Translation.3330: So he went forth among His people in the  pride Of his worldly  glitter  Said those whose aim is The Life of this World     Oh   that we had the like Of what Qārūn has got   For he is truly a lord Of mighty good fortune
Quran Translation.3331: But those who had been granted  True  knowledge said     Alas For you   The reward of God  In the Hereafter  is best For those who believe And work righteousness   but this None shall attain  save those Who steadfastly persevere  in good
Quran Translation.3332: Then We caused the earth To swallow up him and His house   and he had not  The least little  party To help him against God  Nor could he defend himself
Quran Translation.3333: And those who had envied His position the day before Began to say on the morrow     Ah   It is indeed God Who enlarges the provision Or restricts it  to any Of His servants He pleases   Had it not been that God Was gracious to us  He Could have caused the earth To swallow us up   Ah   those who reject God Will assuredly never prosper
Quran Translation.3334: That Home of the Hereafter We shall give to those Who intend not high handedness Or mischief on earth   And the End is  best  For the righteous
Quran Translation.3335: If any does good  the reward To him is better than His deed   but if any Does evil  the doers of evil Are only punished  to the extent  Of their deeds
Quran Translation.3336: Verily He Who ordained The Qur ān for thee  will bring Thee back to the Place Of Return  Say     My Lord Knows best who it is That brings true guidance  And who is in manifest error
Quran Translation.3337: And thou hadst not expected That the Book would be Sent to thee except as A Mercy from thy Lord   Therefore lend not thou support In any way to those Who reject  God s Message
Quran Translation.3338: And let nothing keep thee Back from the Signs of God After they have been revealed To thee   and invite  men  To thy Lord  and be not Of the company of those Who join gods with God
Quran Translation.3339: And call not  besides God  On another god  There is No god but He  Everything  That exists  will perish Except His own Face  To Him belongs the Command  And to Him will ye  All  be brought back
Quran Translation.3341: Do men think that They will be left alone On saying    We believe    And that they will not Be tested
Quran Translation.3342: We did test those Before them  and God will Certainly know those who are True from those who are false
Quran Translation.3343: Do those who practice Evil think that they Will get the better of us   Evil is their judgment
Quran Translation.3344: For those whose hopes are In the meeting with God  In the Hereafter  let them strive    For the Term  appointed  By God is surely coming   And He hears and knows  All things
Quran Translation.3345: And if any strive  with might And main   they do so For their own souls   For God is free of all Needs from all creation
Quran Translation.3346: Those who believe and work Righteous deeds  from them Shall We blot out all evil  That may be  in them  And We shall reward Them according to The best of their deeds
Quran Translation.3347: We have enjoined on man Kindness to parents   but if They  either of them  strive  To force  thee to join With Me  in worship  Anything of which thou hast No knowledge  obey them not  Ye have  all  to return To Me  and I will Tell you  the truth  Of all that ye did
Quran Translation.3348: And those who believe And work righteous deeds   Them shall We admit To the company of the Righteous
Quran Translation.3349: Then there are among men Such as say    We believe In God     but when they suffer Affliction in  the cause of  God  They treat men s oppression As if it were the Wrath of God   And if help Comes  to thee  from thy Lord  They are sure to say    We have  always  been With you     Does not God Know best all that is In the hearts of all Creation
Quran Translation.3350: And God most certainly knows Those who believe  and as certainly Those who are Hypocrites
Quran Translation.3351: And the Unbelievers say To those who believe     Follow our path  and we Will bear  the consequences  Of your faults   Never In the least will they Bear their faults   in fact They are liars
Quran Translation.3352: They will bear their own Burdens  and  other  burdens Along with their own  And on the Day of Judgement They will be called to account For their falsehoods
Quran Translation.3353: We  once  sent Noah To his people  and he tarried Among them a thousand years Less fifty   but the Deluge Overwhelmed them while they  Persisted in  sin
Quran Translation.3354: But We saved him And the Companions Of the Ark  and We made The  Ark  a Sign For all Peoples
Quran Translation.3355: And  We also saved  Abraham   behold  he said To his people    Serve God And fear Him   that Will be best for you  If ye understand
Quran Translation.3356: For ye do worship idols Besides God  and ye invent Falsehood  The things that ye Worship besides God have No power to give you sustenance   Then seek ye sustenance From God  serve Him  And be grateful to Him   To Him will be your return
Quran Translation.3357: And if ye reject  the Message   So did generations before you   And the duty of the apostle Is only to preach publicly  And clearly
Quran Translation.3358: See they not how God Originates creation  then Repeats it   truly that Is easy for God
Quran Translation.3359: Say     Travel through the earth And see how God did Originate creation   so will God produce a later creation   For God has power Over all things
Quran Translation.3360: He punishes whom He pleases  And He grants mercy to whom He pleases  and towards Him Are ye turned
Quran Translation.3361: Not on earth nor in heaven Will ye be able  fleeing  To frustrate  His Plan   Nor have ye  besides God  Any protector or helper
Quran Translation.3362: So naught was the answer Of  Abraham s  people except That they said     Slay him Or burn him   But God Did save him from the Fire  Verily in this are Signs For people who believe
Quran Translation.3363: And He said     For you  Ye have taken  for worship  Idols besides God  out of Mutual love and regard Between yourselves in this life   But on the Day of Judgement Ye shall disown each other And curse each other   And your abode will be The Fire  and ye shall have None to help
Quran Translation.3364: But Lūṭ had faith in Him   He said     I will leave Home for the sake of My Lord   for He is Exalted in Might  and Wise
Quran Translation.3365: And We gave  Abraham  Isaac and Jacob  and ordained Among his progeny Prophethood And Revelation  and We Granted him his reward In this life   and he was In the Hereafter  of the company  Of the Righteous
Quran Translation.3366: And  remember  Lūṭ   behold  He said to his people     Ye do commit lewdness  Such as no people in Creation  Ever  committed before you
Quran Translation.3367: Do ye indeed approach men  And cut off the highway    And practice wickedness  Even  in your councils     But his people gave no answer But this   they said     Bring us the Wrath of God If thou tellest the truth
Quran Translation.3368: He said     O my Lord   Help Thou me against people Who do mischief
Quran Translation.3369: When Our Messengers came To Abraham with the good news  They said     We are indeed Going to destroy the people Of this township   for truly They are  addicted to  crime
Quran Translation.3370: He said     But there is Lūṭ there   They said     Well do we know who Is there   we will certainly Save him and his following   Except his wife   she is Of those who lag behind
Quran Translation.3371: And when Our Messengers Came to Lūṭ  he was grieved on their account  And felt himself powerless  To protect  them   but they said     Fear thou not  nor grieve   We are  here  to save thee And thy following  except Thy wife   she is Of those who lag behind
Quran Translation.3372: For we are going to Bring down on the people Of this township a Punishment From heaven  because they Have been wickedly rebellious
Quran Translation.3373: And We have left thereof An evident Sign  For any people who  Care to  understand
Quran Translation.3374: To the Madyan  people   We sent  their brother Shu aib  Then he said     O my people   Serve God  and fear the Last Day   nor commit evil On the earth  with intent To do mischief
Quran Translation.3375: But they rejected him   Then the mighty Blast Seized them  and they lay Prostrate in their homes By the morning
Quran Translation.3376: Remember also  the  Ād And the Thamūd  people    Clearly will appear to you From  the traces  of their buildings  Their fate    the Evil One Made their deeds alluring To them  and kept them back From the Path  though they Were gifted with Intelligence And Skill
Quran Translation.3377: Remember also  Qārūn  Pharaoh  and Hāmān   there came To them Moses with Clear Signs  But they behaved with insolence On the earth   yet they Could not overreach  Us
Quran Translation.3378: Each one of them We seized For his crime   of them  Against some We sent A violent tornado  with showers Of stones    some were caught By a  mighty  Blast   some We caused the earth To swallow up   and some We drowned  in the waters    It was not God Who Injured  or oppressed  them   They injured  and oppressed  Their own souls
Quran Translation.3379: The parable of those who Take protectors other than God Is that of the Spider  Who builds  to itself  A house   but truly The flimsiest of houses Is the Spider s house    If they but knew
Quran Translation.3380: Verily God doth know Of  every thing  whatever That they call upon Besides Him   and He is Exalted  in power   Wise
Quran Translation.3381: And such are the Parables We set forth for mankind  But only those understand them Who have Knowledge
Quran Translation.3382: God created the heavens And the earth in true  proportions    Verily in that is a Sign For those who believe
Quran Translation.3383: Recite what is sent Of the Book by inspiration To thee  and establish Regular Prayer   for Prayer Restrains from shameful And unjust deeds   And remembrance of God Is the greatest  thing in life  Without doubt  And God knows The  deeds  that ye do
Quran Translation.3384: And dispute ye not With the People of the Book  Except with means better  Than mere disputation   unless It be with those of them Who inflict wrong  and injury    But say    We believe In the Revelation which has Come down to us and in that Which came down to you   Our God and your God Is one   and it is to Him We bow  in Islam
Quran Translation.3385: And thus  it is  that We Have sent down the Book To thee  So the People Of the Book believe therein  As also do some of these  Pagan Arabs    and none But Unbelievers reject Our Signs
Quran Translation.3386: And thou wast not  able  To recite a Book before This  Book came   nor art thou  Able  to transcribe it With thy right hand   In that case  indeed  would The talkers of vanities Have doubted
Quran Translation.3387: Nay  here are Signs Self evident in the hearts Of those endowed with knowledge   And none but the unjust Reject Our Signs
Quran Translation.3388: Yet they say     Why Are not Signs sent down To him from his Lord     Say     The Signs are indeed With God   and I am Indeed a clear Warner
Quran Translation.3389: And is it not enough For them that We have Sent down to thee The Book which is rehearsed To them   Verily  in it Is Mercy and a Reminder To those who believe
Quran Translation.3390: Say     Enough is God For a Witness between me And you   He knows What is in the heavens And on earth  And it is Those who believe in vanities And reject God  that Will perish  in the end
Quran Translation.3391: They ask thee To hasten on the Punishment  For them    had it not been For a term  of respite  Appointed  the Punishment Would certainly have come To them   and it will Certainly reach them   Of a sudden  while they Perceive not
Quran Translation.3392: They ask thee To hasten on the Punishment   But  of a surety  Hell will encompass The rejecters of Faith
Quran Translation.3393: On the Day that The Punishment shall cover them From above them and From below them  And  a Voice  shall say     Taste ye  the fruits  Of your deeds
Quran Translation.3394: O My servants who believe   Truly  spacious is My Earth   Therefore serve ye Me   And Me alone
Quran Translation.3395: Every soul shall have A taste of death   In the end to Us Shall ye be brought back
Quran Translation.3396: But those who believe And work deeds of righteousness  To them shall We give A Home in Heaven   Lofty mansions beneath which flow rivers  to dwell therein For aye    an excellent reward For those who do  good
Quran Translation.3397: Those who persevere in patience  And put their trust In their Lord and Cherisher
Quran Translation.3398: How many are the creatures That carry not their own Sustenance   It is God Who feeds  both  them and you   For He hears and knows  All things
Quran Translation.3399: If indeed thou ask them Who has created the heavens And the earth and subjected The sun and the moon  To His Law   they will Certainly reply    God    How are they then deluded Away  from the truth
Quran Translation.3400: God enlarges the sustenance  Which He gives  to whichever Of His servants He pleases   And He  similarly  grants By  strict  measure   as He pleases    For God has full knowledge Of all things
Quran Translation.3401: And if indeed thou ask them Who it is that sends down Rain from the sky  And gives life therewith To the earth after its death  They will certainly reply    God     Say    Praise be To God     But most Of them understand not
Quran Translation.3402: What is the life of this world But amusement and play   But verily the Home In the Hereafter  that is Life indeed  if they but knew
Quran Translation.3403: Now if they embark On a boat  they call On God  making their devotion Sincerely  and exclusively  to Him   But when He has delivered Them safely to  dry  land  Behold  they give a share  Of their worship to others
Quran Translation.3404: Disdaining ungratefully Our gifts  And giving themselves up To  worldly  enjoyment   But soon Will they know
Quran Translation.3405: Do they not then see That We have made A Sanctuary secure  and that Men are being snatched away From all around them   Then  do they believe in that Which is vain and reject The Grace of God
Quran Translation.3406: And who does more wrong Than he who invents A lie against God Or rejects the Truth When it reaches Him   Is there not a home In Hell for those who Reject Faith
Quran Translation.3407: And those who strive In Our  Cause   We will Certainly guide them To Our Paths   For verily God Is with those Who do right
Quran Translation.3409: The Roman Empire Has been defeated
Quran Translation.3410: In a land close by   But they   even  after  This  defeat of theirs  Will soon be victorious
Quran Translation.3411: Within a few years  With God is the Decision  In the Past And in the Future   On that Day shall The Believers rejoice
Quran Translation.3412: With the help of God  He helps whom He will  And He is Exalted in Might  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3413: It is  the promise of God  Never does God depart From His promise   But most men understand not
Quran Translation.3414: They know but the outer  Things  in the life Of this world   but Of the End of things They are heedless
Quran Translation.3415: Do they not reflect In their own minds   Not but for just ends And for a term appointed  Did God create the heavens And the earth and all Between them   yet are there Truly many among men Who deny the meeting With their Lord  At the Resur
Quran Translation.3416: Do they not travel Through the earth  and see What was the End Of those before them   They were superior to them In strength   they tilled The soil and populated it In greater numbers than these Have done   there came to them Their apostles with Clear  Signs    which they rejected  to their Own destruction    it was not God Who wronged them  but They wronged their own souls
Quran Translation.3417: In the long run Evil in the extreme Will be the End of those Who do evil   for that They rejected the Signs Of God  and held them up To ridicule
Quran Translation.3418: It is God Who begins  The process of  creation   Then repeats it   then Shall ye be brought back To Him
Quran Translation.3419: On the Day that The Hour will be established  The guilty will be Struck dumb with despair
Quran Translation.3420: No intercessor will they have Among their   Partners    And they will  themselves  Reject their   Partners
Quran Translation.3421: On the Day that The Hour will be established  That Day shall  all men  Be sorted out
Quran Translation.3422: Then those who have believed And worked righteous deeds  Shall be made happy In a Mead of Delight
Quran Translation.3423: And those who have rejected Faith and falsely denied Our Signs and the meeting Of the Hereafter  such Shall be brought forth to Punishment
Quran Translation.3424: So  give  glory to God  When ye reach eventide And when ye rise In the morning
Quran Translation.3425: Yea  To Him be praise  In the heavens and on earth   And in the late afternoon And when the day Begins to decline
Quran Translation.3426: It is He Who brings out The living from the dead  And brings out the dead From the living  and Who Gives life to the earth After it is dead   And thus shall ye be Brought out  from the dead
Quran Translation.3427: Among His Signs is this  That He created you From dust   and then   Behold  ye are men Scattered  far and wide
Quran Translation.3428: And among His Signs Is this  that He created For you mates from among Yourselves  that ye may Dwell in tranquillity with them  And He has put love And mercy between your  hearts    Verily in that are Signs For those who reflect
Quran Translation.3429: And among His Signs Is the creation of the heavens And the earth  and the variations In your languages And your colours   verily In that are Signs For those who know
Quran Translation.3430: And among His Signs Is the sleep that ye take By night and by day  And the quest that ye  Make for livelihood  Out of His Bounty   verily In that are Signs For those who hearken
Quran Translation.3431: And among His Signs  He shows you the lightning  By way both of fear And of hope  and He sends Down rain from the sky And with it gives life to The earth after it is dead   Verily in that are Signs For those who are wise
Quran Translation.3432: And among His Signs is this  That heaven and earth Stand by His Command   Then when He calls you  By a single call  from the earth  Behold  ye  straightway  come forth
Quran Translation.3433: To Him belongs every being That is in the heavens And on earth   all are Devoutly obedient to Him
Quran Translation.3434: It is He Who begins  The process of  creation   Then repeats it   and For Him it is most easy  To Him belongs the loftiest Similitude  We can think of  In the heavens and the earth   For He is Exalted in Might  Full of wisdom
Quran Translation.3435: He does propound To you a similitude From your own  experience    Do ye have partners Among those whom your right hands Possess  to share as equals In the wealth We have Bestowed on you   Do ye Fear them as ye fear Each other   Thus do We Explain the Signs in detail To a people that understand
Quran Translation.3436: Nay  the wrong doers  merely  Follow their own lusts  Being devoid of knowledge  But who will guide those Whom God leaves astray   To them there will be No helpers
Quran Translation.3437: So set thou thy face Steadily and truly to the Faith    Establish  God s handiwork according To the pattern on which He has made mankind   No change  let there be  In the work  wrought  By God   that is The standard Religion   But most among mankind Understand not
Quran Translation.3438: Turn ye back in repentance To Him  and fear Him   Establish regular prayers  And be not ye among those Who join gods with God
Quran Translation.3439: Those who split up Their Religion  and become  Mere  Sects  each party Rejoicing in that which Is with itself
Quran Translation.3440: When trouble touches men  They cry to their Lord  Turning back to Him In repentance   but when He gives them a taste Of Mercy as from Himself  Behold  some of them Pay part worship to Other gods besides their Lord
Quran Translation.3441: As if  to show their ingratitude For the  favours  We have Bestowed on them   Then enjoy  your brief day    but soon Will ye know  your folly
Quran Translation.3442: Or have We sent down Authority to them  which Points out to them The things to which They pay part worship
Quran Translation.3443: When We give men A taste of Mercy  They exult thereat   And when some evil Afflicts them because of What their  own  hands Have sent forth  behold  They are in despair
Quran Translation.3444: See they not that God Enlarges the provision and Restricts it  to whomsoever He pleases   Verily in that Are Signs for those who believe
Quran Translation.3445: So give what is due To kindred  the needy  And the wayfarer  That is best for those Who seek the Countenance  Of God  and it is they Who will prosper
Quran Translation.3446: That which ye lay out For increase through the property Of  other  people  will have No increase with God   But that which ye lay out For charity  seeking The Countenance of God   Will increase    it is These who will get A recompense multiplied
Quran Translation.3447: It is God Who has created you   further  He has Provided for your Sustenance   then He will cause you To die   and again He will Give you life  Are there Any of your  false    Partners   Who can do any single One of these things   Glory to Him   and High Is He above the partners they attribute  to Him
Quran Translation.3448: Mischief has appeared On land and sea because Of  the meed  that the hands Of men have earned  That  God  may give them A taste of some of their Deeds   in order that they May turn back  from Evil
Quran Translation.3449: Say     Travel through the earth And see what was the End Of those before  you    Most of them worshipped Others besides God
Quran Translation.3450: But set thou thy face To the right Religion  Before there come from God The Day which there is No chance of averting   On that Day shall men Be divided  in two
Quran Translation.3451: Those who reject Faith Will suffer from that re    And those who work righteousness Will spread their couch  Of repose  for themselves  In heaven
Quran Translation.3452: That He may reward those Who believe and work righteous Deeds  out of His Bounty  For He loves not those Who reject Faith
Quran Translation.3453: Among His Signs is this  That He sends the Winds  as heralds of Glad Tidings  Giving you a taste Of His  Grace and  Mercy   That the ships may sail  Majestically  by His Command And that ye may seek Of His Bounty   in order That ye may be grateful
Quran Translation.3454: We did indeed send  Before thee  apostles To their  respective  peoples  And they came to them With Clear Signs   then  To those who transgressed  We meted out Retribution   And it was due from us To aid those who believed
Quran Translation.3455: It is God Who sends the Winds  and they raise The Clouds   then does He Spread them in the sky As He wills  and break them Into fragments  until thou seest Rain drops issue from the midst Thereof   then when He has Made them reach such Of His servants as He wills  Behold  they do rejoice
Quran Translation.3456: Even  though before they received  The rain  just before this  They were dumb with despair
Quran Translation.3457: Then contemplate  O man    The memorials of God s Mercy    How He gives life To the earth after Its death   verily the Same Will give life to the men Who are dead   for He Has power over all things
Quran Translation.3458: And if We  but  send A Wind from which They see  their tilth  Turn yellow  behold  They become  thereafter  Ungrateful  Unbelievers
Quran Translation.3459: So verily thou canst not Make the dead to hear  Nor canst thou make The deaf to hear The call  when they show Their backs and turn away
Quran Translation.3460: Nor canst thou lead back The blind from their straying   Only those wilt thou make To hear  who believe In Our Signs and submit  Their wills in Islam
Quran Translation.3461: It is God Who Created you in a state Of  helpless  weakness  then Gave  you  strength after weakness  Then  after strength  gave  you  Weakness and a hoary head   He creates as He wills  And it is He Who has All knowledge and power
Quran Translation.3462: On the Day that The Hour  of reckoning  Will be established  The transgressors will swear That they tarried not But an hour   thus were They used to being deluded
Quran Translation.3463: But those endued with knowledge And faith will say     Indeed ye did tarry  Within God s Decree  To the Day of Resur   And this is the Day Of Resur    but ye  Ye were not aware
Quran Translation.3464: So on that Day no excuse Of theirs will Avail the Transgressors  Nor will they be invited  then  To seek grace  by repentance
Quran Translation.3465: Verily We have propounded For men  in this Qur ān  Every kind of Parable   But if thou bring to them Any Sign  the Unbelievers Are sure to say    Ye Do nothing but talk vanities
Quran Translation.3466: Thus does God seal up The hearts of those Who understand not
Quran Translation.3467: So patiently persevere   for Verily the promise of God Is true   nor let those Shake thy firmness  who have  Themselves  no certainty of faith
Quran Translation.3469: These are Verses Of the Wise Book
Quran Translation.3470: A Guide and a Mercy To the Doers of Good
Quran Translation.3471: Those who establish regular Prayer  And give regular Charity  And have  in their hearts  The assurance of the Hereafter
Quran Translation.3472: These are on  true  guidance From their Lord   and these Are the ones who will prosper
Quran Translation.3473: But there are  among men  Those who purchase idle tales  Without knowledge  or meaning   To mislead  men  from the Path Of God and throw ridicule  On the Path    for such There will be a humiliating Penalty
Quran Translation.3474: When Our Signs are rehearsed To such a one  he turns Away in arrogance  as if He heard them not  as if There were deafness in both His ears   announce to him A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.3475: For those who believe And work righteous deeds  There will be Gardens Of Bliss
Quran Translation.3476: To dwell therein  The promise Of God is true   and He Is Exalted in power  Wise
Quran Translation.3477: He created the heavens Without any pillars that ye Can see   He set On the earth mountains Standing firm  lest it Should shake with you   And He scattered through it Beasts of all kinds  We send down rain From the sky  and produce On the earth every kind Of noble creature  in pairs
Quran Translation.3478: Such is the Creation of God   Now show Me what is there That others besides Him Have created   nay  but The Transgressors are In manifest error
Quran Translation.3479: We bestowed  in the past  Wisdom on Luqmān     Show  thy  gratitude to God   Any who is  so  grateful Does so to the profit Of his own soul   but if Any is ungrateful  verily God is free of all wants  Worthy of all praise
Quran Translation.3480: Behold  Luqmān said To his son by way of Instruction     O my son   Join not in worship  Others  with God   for False worship is indeed The highest wrong doing
Quran Translation.3481: And We have enjoined on man  To be good  to his parents   In travail upon travail Did his mother bear him  And in years twain Was his weaning    hear The command     Show gratitude To Me and to thy parents   To Me is  thy final  Goal
Quran Translation.3482: But if they strive To make the join In worship with Me Things of which thou hast No knowledge  obey them not   Yet bear them company In this life with justice  And consideration   and follow The way of those who Turn to Me  in love    In the End the return Of you all is to Me  And I will tell you The truth  and meaning  Of all that ye did
Quran Translation.3483: O my son      said Luqmān     If there be  but  the weight Of a mustard seed and It were  hidden  in a rock  Or  anywhere  in the heavens or On earth  God will bring it Forth   for God understands The finest mysteries   and  Is well acquainted  with them
Quran Translation.3484: O my son   establish Regular prayer enjoin what is Just  and forbid what is wrong   And bear with patient constancy Whate er betide thee   for this Is firmness  of purpose  In  the conduct of  affairs
Quran Translation.3485: And swell not thy cheek  for pride  at men  Nor walk in insolence Through the earth   For God loveth not Any arrogant boaster
Quran Translation.3486: And be moderate In thy pace  and lower Thy voice   for the harshest Of sounds without doubt Is the braying of the ass
Quran Translation.3487: Do ye not see That God has subjected To your  use  all things In the heavens and on earth  And has made His bounties Flow to you in exceeding Measure   both  seen and unseen   Yet there are among men Those who dispute about God  Without knowledge and without Guidance and without a Book To enlighten them
Quran Translation.3488: When they are told to follow The  Revelation  that God Has sent down  they say     Nay  we shall follow The ways that we found Our fathers  following    What   even if it is Satan beckoning them To the Penalty Of the  Blazing  Fire
Quran Translation.3489: Whoever submits His whole self to God  And is a doer of good  Has grasped indeed The most trustworthy hand hold   And with God rests the End And Decision of  all  affairs
Quran Translation.3490: But if any reject Faith  Let not his re  Grieve thee   to Us Is their Return and We Shall tell them the truth Of their deeds   for God Knows well all that is In  men s  hearts
Quran Translation.3491: We grant them their pleasure For a little while   In the end shall We Drive them to A chastisement unrelenting
Quran Translation.3492: If thou ask them  Who it is that created The heavens and the earth  They will certainly say    God    Say     Praise be to God     But most of them Understand not
Quran Translation.3493: To God belong all things In heaven and earth   verily God is He  that is  Free of all wants  Worthy of all praise
Quran Translation.3494: And if all the trees On earth were pens And the Ocean  were ink   With seven Oceans behind it To add to its  supply   Yet would not the Words Of God be exhausted  In the writing    for God Is Exalted in power  Full of Wisdom
