Quran Translation.3495: And your creation Or your resur  Is in no wise but As an individual soul   For God is He Who Hears and sees  all things
Quran Translation.3496: Seest thou not that God merges Night into Day And He merges Day into Night   That He has subjected the sun And the moon  to His Law   Each running its course For a term appointed   and That God is well acquainted With all that ye do
Quran Translation.3497: That is because God is The  only  Reality  and because Whatever else they invoke Besides Him is Falsehood   And because God  He is The Most High  Most Great
Quran Translation.3498: Seest thou not that The ships sail through The Ocean by the grace Of God   that He may Show you of His Signs   Verily in this are Signs For all who constantly persevere And give thanks
Quran Translation.3499: When a wave covers them Like the canopy  of clouds   They call to God  Offering Him sincere devotion  But when He has delivered them Safely to land  there are Among them those that halt Between  right and wrong   But none reject Our Signs Except only a perfidious Ungrateful  wretch
Quran Translation.3500: O mankind   do your duty To your Lord  and fear  the coming of  a Day When no father can avail Aught for his son  nor A son avail aught For his father  Verily  the promise of God Is true   let not then This present life deceive you  Nor let the Chief Deceiver Deceive you about God
Quran Translation.3501: Verily the knowledge Of the Hour is With God  alone   It is He Who sends down Rain  and He Who knows What is in the wombs  Nor does anyone know What it is that he will Earn on the morrow   Nor does anyone know In what land he is To die  Verily with God Is full knowledge and He is acquainted  with all things
Quran Translation.3503: This is  the revelation Of the Book in which There is no doubt   From the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3504: Or do they say    He has forged it     Nay  it is the Truth From thy Lord  that thou Mayest admonish a people To whom no warner Has come before thee   In order that they May receive guidance
Quran Translation.3505: It is God Who has Created the heavens And the earth  and all Between them  in six Days  And is firmly established On the Throne  of authority    Ye have none  besides Him  To protect or intercede  for you    Will ye not then Receive admonition
Quran Translation.3506: He rules  all  affairs From the heavens To the earth   in the end Will  all affairs  go up To Him  on a Day  The space whereof will be  As  a thousand years Of your reckoning
Quran Translation.3507: Such is He  the Knower Of all things  hidden And open  the Exalted  In power   the Merciful
Quran Translation.3508: He Who has made Everything which He has created Most Good   He began The creation of man With  nothing more than  clay
Quran Translation.3509: And made his progeny From a quintessence Of the nature of A fluid despised
Quran Translation.3510: But He fashioned him In due proportion  and breathed Into him something of His spirit  And He gave You  the faculties of  hearing And sight and feeling  And understanding    Little thanks do ye give
Quran Translation.3511: And they say     What   When we lie hidden And lost  in the earth  Shall we indeed be In a Creation renewed     Nay  they deny the Meeting With their Lord
Quran Translation.3512: Say     The Angel of Death  Put in charge of you  Will  duly  take your souls   Then shall ye be brought Back to your Lord
Quran Translation.3513: If only thou couldst see When the guilty ones Will bend low their heads Before their Lord  saying &colon     Our Lord   We have seen And we have heard   Now then send us back  To the world    we will Work righteousness   for we Do indeed  now  believe
Quran Translation.3514: If We had so willed  We could certainly have brought Every soul its true guidance   But the Word from Me Will come true    I will Fill Hell with Jinns And men all together
Quran Translation.3515: Taste ye then for ye Forgot the Meeting Of this Day of yours  And We too will Forget you taste ye The Penalty of Eternity For your  evil  deeds
Quran Translation.3516: Only those believe In Our Signs  who  when They are recited to them  Fall down in adoration  And celebrate the praises Of their Lord  nor are they  Ever  puffed up with pride
Quran Translation.3517: Their limbs do forsake Their beds of sleep  the while They call on their Lord In Fear and Hope   And they spend  in charity  Out of the sustenance which We have bestowed on them
Quran Translation.3518: Now no person knows What delights of the eye Are kept hidden  in reserve  For them as a reward For their  good  Deeds
Quran Translation.3519: Is then the man Who believes no better Than the man who is Rebellious and wicked   Not equal are they
Quran Translation.3520: For those who believe And do righteous deeds  Are Gardens as hospitable Homes  for their  good  deeds
Quran Translation.3521: As to those who are Rebellious and wicked  their abode Will be the Fire   every time They wish to get away Therefrom  they will be forced Thereinto  and it will be said To them     Taste ye The Penalty of the Fire  The which ye were wont To reject as false
Quran Translation.3522: And indeed We will make Them taste of the Penalty Of this  life  prior to The supreme Penalty  in order That they may  repent and  return
Quran Translation.3523: And who does more wrong Than one to whom are recited The Signs of his Lord  And who then turns away Therefrom   Verily from those Who transgress We shall exact  Due  Retribution
Quran Translation.3524: We did indeed aforetime Give the Book to Moses   Be not then in doubt of its reaching  thee    And We made it A guide to the Children Of Israel
Quran Translation.3525: And We appointed  from among Them  Leaders  giving guidance Under Our command  so long As they persevered with patience And continued to have faith In Our Signs
Quran Translation.3526: Verily thy Lord will judge Between them on the Day Of Judgement  in the matters Wherein they differ  among themselves
Quran Translation.3527: Does it not teach them A lesson  how many generations We destroyed before them  In whose dwellings they  now  go to and fro   Verily in that are Signs   Do they not then listen
Quran Translation.3528: And do they not see That We do drive Rain To parched soil  bare Of herbage   and produce therewith Crops  providing food For their cattle and themselves   Have they not the vision
Quran Translation.3529: They say     When will This Decision be  if ye Are telling the truth
Quran Translation.3530: Say     On the Day Of Decision  no profit Will it be to Unbelievers If they  then  believe   Nor will they be granted A respite
Quran Translation.3531: So turn away from them  And wait   they too Are waiting
Quran Translation.3532: O Prophet   Fear God  And hearken not To the Unbelievers And the Hypocrites   Verily God is full Of knowledge and wisdom
Quran Translation.3533: But follow that which Comes to thee by inspiration From thy Lord   for God Is well acquainted With  all  that ye do
Quran Translation.3534: And put thy trust In God  and enough is God As a Disposer of affairs
Quran Translation.3535: God has not made For any man two hearts In his  one  body   nor has He made your wives whom Ye divorce by Ẓihār Your mothers   nor has He Made your adopted sons Your sons  Such is  only  Your  manner of  speech By your mouths  But God Tells  you  the Truth  and He Shows the  right  Way
Quran Translation.3536: Call them by  the names Of  their fathers   that is Juster in the sight of God  But if ye know not Their father s  names  call Them  your Brothers in faith  Or your Maulās  But there is no blame On you if ye make A mistake therein    What counts is  The intention of your hearts   And God is Oft Returning  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3537: The Prophet is closer To the Believers than Their own selves  And his wives are Their mothers  Blood relations Among each other have Closer personal ties  In the Decree of God  Than  the Brotherhood of  Believers and Muhājirs   Nevertheless do ye What is just to your Closest friends   such is The writing in the Decree  Of God
Quran Translation.3538: And remember We took From the Prophets their Covenant   As  We did  from thee   From Noah  Abraham  Moses  And Jesus the son of Mary   We took from them A solemn Covenant
Quran Translation.3539: That  God  may question The  Custodians  of Truth concerning The Truth they  were charged with    And He has prepared For the Unbelievers A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.3540: O ye who believe   Remember the Grace of God   Bestowed  on you  when There came down on you Hosts  to overwhelm you    But We sent against them A hurricane and forces That ye saw not   But God sees  clearly  All that ye do
Quran Translation.3541: Behold   they came on you From above you and from Below you  and behold  The eyes became dim And the hearts gaped Up to the throats  And ye imagined various  Vain  thoughts about God
Quran Translation.3542: In that situation Were the Believers tried   They were shaken as by A tremendous shaking
Quran Translation.3543: And behold   The Hypocrites And those in whose hearts Is a disease  even  say     God And His Apostle promised us Nothing but delusions
Quran Translation.3544: Behold   A party among them Said     Ye men of Yathrib   Ye cannot stand  the attack    Therefore go back     And a band of them Ask for leave of the Prophet  Saying    Truly our houses Are bare and exposed   though They were not exposed   They intended nothing but To run away
Quran Translation.3545: And if an entry had Been effected to them From the sides of the  City   And they had been Incited to sedition  They would certainly have Brought it to pass  with None but a brief delay
Quran Translation.3546: And yet they had already Covenanted with God not to turn Their backs  and a covenant With God must  surely  Be answered for
Quran Translation.3547: Say     Running away will not Profit you if ye are Running away from death Or slaughter   and even if  Ye do escape   no more Than a brief  respite  Will ye be allowed to enjoy
Quran Translation.3548: Say     Who is it that can Screen you from God If it be His wish To give you Punishment Or to give you Mercy     Nor will they find for themselves  Besides God  any protector Or helper
Quran Translation.3549: Verily God knows those Among you who keep back  Men  and those who say To their brethren    Come along to us    but come not To the fight except For just a little while
Quran Translation.3550: Covetous over you  Then when fear comes  Thou wilt see them looking To thee  their eyes revolving  Like  those of  one over whom Hovers death   but when The fear is past  They will smite you With sharp tongues  covetous Of goods  Such men have No faith  and so God Has made their deeds Of none effect   and that Is easy for God
Quran Translation.3551: They think that the Confederates Have not withdrawn   and if The Confederates should come  again   They would wish they were In the deserts  wandering  Among the Bedouins  and Seeking news about you  From a safe distance    And if they were In your midst  they Would fight but little
Quran Translation.3552: Ye have indeed In the Apostle of God A beautiful pattern  of conduct  For anyone whose hope is In God and the Final Day  And who engages much In the praise of God
Quran Translation.3553: When the Believers saw The Confederate forces  They said     This is What God and His Apostle Had promised us  and God And His Apostle told us What was true   And it Only added to their faith And their zeal in obedience
Quran Translation.3554: Among the Believers are men Who have been true to Their Covenant with God   Of them some have completed Their vow  to the extreme   And some  still  wait   But they have never changed  Their determination  in the least
Quran Translation.3555: That God may reward The men of Truth for Their Truth  and punish The Hypocrites if that be His Will  or turn to them In Mercy   for God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3556: And God turned back The Unbelievers for  all  Their fury   no advantage Did they gain   and enough Is God for the Believers In their fight  And God Is full of Strength  Able To enforce His Will
Quran Translation.3557: And those of the people Of the Book who aided Them  God did take them Down from their strongholds And cast terror into Their hearts   so that  Some ye slew  and some Ye made prisoners
Quran Translation.3558: And He made you heirs Of their lands  their houses  And their goods  And of a land which Ye had not frequented  Before   And God has Power over all things
Quran Translation.3559: O Prophet   say To thy Consorts     If it be that ye desire The life of this world  And its glitter   then come   I will provide for your Enjoyment and set you free In a handsome manner
Quran Translation.3560: But if ye seek God And His Apostle  and The Home of the Hereafter  Verily God has prepared For the well doers amongst you A great reward
Quran Translation.3561: O Consorts of the Prophet If any of you were guilty Of evident unseemly conduct  The Punishment would be Doubled to her  and that Is easy for God
Quran Translation.3562: But any of you that is Devout in the service of God and His Apostle  And works righteousness   To her shall We grant Her reward twice   and We Have prepared for her A generous Sustenance
Quran Translation.3563: O Consorts of the Prophet   Ye are not like any Of the  other  women   If ye do fear  God   Be not too complaisant Of speech  lest one In whose heart is A disease should be moved With desire   but speak ye A speech  that is  just
Quran Translation.3564: And stay quietly in Your houses  and make not A dazzling display  like That of the former Times Of Ignorance   and establish Regular Prayer  and give Regular Charity   and obey God and His Apostle  And God only wishes To remove all abomination From you  ye Members Of the Family  and to make You pure and spotless
Quran Translation.3565: And recite what is Rehearsed to you in your Homes  of the Signs of God And His Wisdom   For God understands The finest mysteries and Is well acquainted  with them
Quran Translation.3566: For Muslim men and women   For believing men and women  For devout men and women  For true men and women  For men and women who are Patient and constant  for men And women who humble themselves  For men and women who give In charity  for men and women Who fast  and deny themselves   For men and women who Guard their chastity  and For men and women who Engage much in God s praise   For them has God prepared Forgiveness and great reward
Quran Translation.3567: It is not fitting For a Believer  man or woman  When a matter has been decided By God and His Apostle  To have any option About their decision   If anyone disobeys God And His Apostle  he is indeed On a clearly wrong Path
Quran Translation.3568: Behold   thou didst say To one who had received The grace of God And thy   Retain thou  In wedlock  thy wife  And fear God   But thou Didst hide in thy heart That which God was about To make manifest   thou didst Fear the people  but it is More fitting that thou shouldst Fear God  Then when Zaid Had dissolved  his marriage  With her  with the necessary  Formality   We joined her In marriage to thee   In order that  in future  There may be no difficulty To the Believers in  the matter Of  marriage with the wives Of their adopted sons  when The latter have dissolved With the necessary  formality   Their marriage  with them  And God s command must Be fulfilled
Quran Translation.3569: There can be no difficulty To the Prophet in what God has indicated to him As a duty  It was The practice  approved  of God Amongst those of old That have passed away  And the command of God Is a decree determined
Quran Translation.3570: It is the practice of those  Who preach the Messages Of God  and fear Him And fear none but God  And enough is God To call  men  to account
Quran Translation.3571: Muhammad is not The father of any Of your men  but  he is  The Apostle of God  And the Seal of the Prophets   And God has full knowledge Of all things
Quran Translation.3572: O ye who believe   Celebrate the praises of God  And do this often
Quran Translation.3573: And glorify Him Morning and evening
Quran Translation.3574: He it is Who sends Blessings on you  as do His angels  that He may Bring you out from the depths Of Darkness into Light   And He is Full of Mercy To the Believers
Quran Translation.3575: Their salutation on the Day They meet Him will be   peace       and He has Prepared for them A generous Reward
Quran Translation.3576: O Prophet   Truly We Have sent thee as A Witness  a Bearer Of Glad Tidings  And a Warner
Quran Translation.3577: And as one who invites To God s  Grace  by His leave  And as a Lamp Spreading Light
Quran Translation.3578: Then give the glad tidings To the Believers  that They shall have from God A very great Bounty
Quran Translation.3579: And obey not  the behests  Of the Unbelievers And the Hypocrites  And heed not their annoyances  But put thy trust in God For enough is God As a Disposer of affairs
Quran Translation.3580: O ye who believe   When ye marry believing women  And then divorce them Before ye have touched them  No period of  Iddat Have ye to count In respect of them   So give them a present  And set them free In a handsome manner
Quran Translation.3581: O Prophet   We have Made lawful to thee Thy wives to whom thou Hast paid their dowers   And those whom thy Right hand possesses out of The prisoners of war whom God has assigned to thee   And daughters of thy paternal Uncles and aunts  and daughters Of thy maternal uncles And aunts  who migrated  From Mecca  with thee   And any believing woman Who dedicates her soul To the Prophet if the Prophet Wishes to wed her    this Only for thee  and not For the Believers  at large    We know what We have Appointed for them as to Their wives and the captives Whom their right hands Possess    in order that There should be no difficulty For thee  And God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3582: Thou mayest defer  the turn Of  any of them that thou Pleasest  and thou mayest receive Any thou pleasest   and there Is no blame on thee if Thou invite one whose  turn  Thou hadst set aside  This were nigher to The cooling of their eyes  The prevention of their grief  And their satisfaction  That of all of them  With that which thou Hast to give them   And God knows  all  That is in your hearts   And God is All Knowing  Most Forbearing
Quran Translation.3583: It is not lawful for thee  To marry more  women After this  nor to change Them for  other  wives  Even though their beauty Attract thee except any Thy right hand should Possess  as handmaidens    And God doth watch Over all things
Quran Translation.3584: O ye who Believe   Enter not the Prophet s houses   Until leave is given you   for a meal   and then  Not  so early as  to wait For its preparation   but when Ye are invited  enter   And when ye have taken Your meal  disperse  Without seeking familiar talk  Such  behaviour  annoys The Prophet   he is ashamed To dismiss you but God is not ashamed  to tell you  the truth  And when ye Ask  his ladies  For anything ye want  Ask them from before A screen   that makes For greater purity for Your hearts and for theirs  Nor is it right for you That ye should annoy God s Apostle  or that Ye should marry his widows After him at any time  Truly such a thing is In God s sight an enormity
Quran Translation.3585: Whether ye reveal anything Or conceal it  verily God has full knowledge Of all things
Quran Translation.3586: There is no blame  On these ladies if they Appear  before their fathers Or their sons  their brothers  Or their brothers  sons  Or their sisters  sons  Or their women  Or the  slaves  whom Their right hands possess  And   ladies   fear God   For God is Witness To all things
Quran Translation.3587: God and His Angels Send blessings on the Prophet   O ye that believe   Send ye blessings on him  And salute him With all respect
Quran Translation.3588: Those who annoy God and His Apostle  God has cursed them In this world and In the Hereafter  And has prepared for them A humiliating Punishment
Quran Translation.3589: And those who annoy Believing men and women Undeservedly  bear  on themselves  A calumny and a glaring sin
Quran Translation.3590: O Prophet   Tell Thy wives and daughters  And the believing women  That they should cast Their outer garments over Their persons  when abroad    That is most convenient  That they should be known  as such  and not molested  And God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3591: Truly  if the Hypocrites  And those in whose hearts Is a disease  and those who Stir up sedition in the City  Desist not  We shall certainly Stir thee up against them   Then will they not be Able to stay in it As thy neighbours For any length of time
Quran Translation.3592: They shall have a curse On them   wherever they Are found  they shall be Seized and slain  Without mercy
Quran Translation.3593: Such was  the practice  Approved  of God among those Who lived aforetime   No change wilt thou find In the practice  approved  Of God
Quran Translation.3594: Men ask thee concerning The Hour   say    The knowledge Thereof is with God  alone      And what will make thee Understand   Perchance The Hour is nigh
Quran Translation.3595: Verily God has cursed The Unbelievers and prepared For them a Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.3596: To dwell therein for ever   No protector will they find  Nor helper
Quran Translation.3597: The Day that their faces Will be turned upside down In the Fire  they will say     Woe to us   would that We had obeyed God And obeyed the Apostle
Quran Translation.3598: And they would say     Our Lord   We obeyed Our chiefs and our great ones  And they misled us As to the  right  path
Quran Translation.3599: Our Lord   Give them Double Penalty And curse them With a very great Curse
Quran Translation.3600: O ye who believe   Be ye not like those Who vexed and insulted Moses  But God cleared him Of the  calumnies  they Had uttered   and he Was honourable in God s sight
Quran Translation.3601: O ye who believe   Fear God  and  always  say A word directed to the Right
Quran Translation.3602: That He may make Your conduct whole and sound And forgive you your sins   He that obeys God And His Apostle  has already Attained the highest Achievement
Quran Translation.3603: We did indeed offer The Trust to the Heavens And the Earth And the Mountains   But they refused To undertake it  Being afraid thereof   But man undertook it    He was indeed unjust And foolish
Quran Translation.3604: With the result  that God has to punish The Hypocrites  men and women  And the Unbelievers  men And women  and God turns In Mercy to the Believers  Men and women   for God Is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3605: Praise be to God  To Whom belong all things In the heavens and on earth   To Him be Praise In the Hereafter   And He is Full of Wisdom  Acquainted with all things
Quran Translation.3606: He knows all that goes Into the earth  and all that Comes out thereof   all that Comes down from the sky And all that ascends thereto   And He is the Most Merciful  The Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.3607: The Unbelievers say    Never to us will come The Hour     say    Nay   But most surely  By my Lord  it will come Upon you   by Him Who knows the unseen   From Whom is not hidden The least little atom In the Heavens or on earth   Nor is there anything less Than that  or greater  but Is in the Record Perspicuous
Quran Translation.3608: That He may reward Those who believe and work Deeds of righteousness   for such Is Forgiveness and a Sustenance Most Generous
Quran Translation.3609: But those who strive Against Our Signs  to frustrate Them  for such will be A Penalty  a Punishment Most humiliating
Quran Translation.3610: And those to whom Knowledge has come see That the  Revelation  sent down To thee from thy Lord  That is the Truth  And that it guides To the Path of the Exalted  In Might   Worthy Of all praise
Quran Translation.3611: The Unbelievers say  In ridicule      Shall we Point out to you a man That will tell you  When ye are all scattered To pieces in disintegration  That ye shall  then be Raised  in a New Creation
Quran Translation.3612: Has he invented a falsehood Against God  or has A spirit  seized  him     Nay  it is those who Believe not in the Hereafter  That are in  real  Penalty  And in farthest Error
Quran Translation.3613: See they not what is Before them and behind them  Of the sky and the earth   If We wished  We could Cause the earth to swallow Them up  or cause a piece Of the sky to fall upon them  Verily in this is a Sign For every devotee that Turns to God  in repentance
Quran Translation.3614: We bestowed Grace aforetime On David from Ourselves     O ye Mountains   sing ye Back the Praises of God With him   and ye birds  Also    And We made The iron soft for him
Quran Translation.3615: Commanding     Make thou Coats of mail  balancing well The rings of chain armour  And work ye righteousness   For be sure I see  Clearly  all that ye do
Quran Translation.3616: And to Solomon  We Made  the Wind  obedient    Its early morning  stride  Was a month s  journey   And its evening  stride  Was a month s  journey    And We made a Font Of molten brass to flow For him   and there were Jinns that worked in front Of him  by the leave Of his Lord  and if any Of them turned aside From Our command  We Made Him taste Of the Penalty Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.3617: They worked for him As he desired   making  Arches  Images  Basons As large as Reservoirs  And  cooking  Cauldrons fixed  In their places      Work ye  Sons of David  with thanks   But few of My servants Are grateful
Quran Translation.3618: Then  when We decreed  Solomon s  death  nothing showed them His death except a little Worm of the earth  which Kept  slowly  gnawing away At his staff   so when he Fell down  the Jinns saw Plainly that if they had Known the unseen  they Would not have tarried In the humiliating Penalty  Of their Task
Quran Translation.3619: There was  for Sabā  Aforetime  a Sign in their Home land two Gardens To the right and to the left    Eat of the Sustenance  provided  By your Lord  and be grateful To Him   a territory fair and happy  And a Lord Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.3620: But they turned away  From God   and We sent Against them the flood  Released  from the Dams  And We converted their two Garden  rows  into   gardens   Producing bitter fruit  And tamarisks  and some few  Stunted  Lote trees
Quran Translation.3621: That was the Requital We gave them because They ungratefully rejected Faith   And never do We give  Such  requital except to such As are ungrateful rejecters
Quran Translation.3622: Between them and the Cities On which We had poured Our blessings  We had placed Cities in prominent positions  And between them We had Appointed stages of journey In due proportion     Travel therein  Secure  by night and by day
Quran Translation.3623: But they said     Our Lord   Place longer distances Between our journey stages     But they wronged themselves  therein   At length We made them As a tale  that is told   And We dispersed them All in scattered fragments  Verily in this are Signs For every  soul that is  Patiently constant and grateful
Quran Translation.3624: And on them did Satan Prove true his idea  And they followed him  all But a Party that believed
Quran Translation.3625: But he had no authority Over them  except that We Might test the man who Believes in the Hereafter From him who is in doubt Concerning it   and thy Lord Doth watch over all things
Quran Translation.3626: Say     Call upon other  gods  Whom ye fancy  besides God   They have no power   Not the weight of an atom   In the heavens or on earth   No  sort of  share have they Therein  nor is any of them A helper to God
Quran Translation.3627: No intercession can avail In His Presence  except for those For whom He has granted Permission  So far  is this The case  that  when terror Is removed from their hearts  At the Day of Judgement  then  Will they say    What is it That your Lord commanded    They will say    That which is True and just   and He is The Most High  Most Great
Quran Translation.3628: Say     Who gives you Sustenanc  from the heavens And the earth    Say     It is God   and certain it is That either we or ye Are on right guidance Or in manifest error
Quran Translation.3629: Say     Ye shall not be Questioned as to our sins  Nor shall we be questioned As to what ye do
Quran Translation.3630: Say     Our Lord will gather us Together and will in the end Decide the matter between us  And you  in truth and justice   And He is the One to decide  The One Who knows all
Quran Translation.3631: Say     Show me those whom Ye have joined with Him As partners   by no means  Can ye   Nay  He is God  The Exalted in Power  The Wise
Quran Translation.3632: We have not sent thee But as a universal  Messenger  To men  giving them Glad tidings  and warning them  Against sin   but most men Understand not
Quran Translation.3633: They say     When will this Promise  come to pass  If ye are telling the truth
Quran Translation.3634: Say     The appointment to you Is for a Day  which ye Cannot put back for an hour Nor put forward
Quran Translation.3635: The Unbelievers say     We shall neither believe In this scripture nor in  any  That  came  before it   Couldst thou but see when The wrong doers will be made To stand before their Lord  Throwing back the word  of blame  On one another   Those who Had been despised will say To the arrogant ones     Had it not been for you  We should certainly Have been believers
Quran Translation.3636: The arrogant ones will say To those who had been despised     Was it we who kept you Back from Guidance after It reached you   Nay  rather  It was ye who transgressed
Quran Translation.3637: Those who had been despised Will say to the arrogant ones     Nay   it was a plot  Of yours  by day and by night   Behold   ye  constantly  ordered us To be ungrateful to God And to attribute equals to Him    They will declare  their  repentance When they see the Penalty   We shall put yokes On the necks of the Unbelievers   It would only be a requital For their  ill  Deeds
Quran Translation.3638: Never did We send A Warner to a population  But the wealthy ones among them Said     We believe not In the  Message  with which Ye have been sent
Quran Translation.3639: They said     We have more In wealth and in sons  And we cannot be punished
Quran Translation.3640: Say     Verily my Lord enlarges And restricts the Provision To whom He pleases  but Most men understand not
Quran Translation.3641: It is not your wealth Nor your sons  that will Bring you nearer to Us In degree   but only Those who believe and work Righteousness these are The ones for whom there is A multiplied Reward For their deeds  while Secure they  reside  In the dwellings on high
Quran Translation.3642: Those who strive against Our Signs  to frustrate them  Will be given over Into Punishment
Quran Translation.3643: Say     Verily my Lord enlarges And restricts the Sustenance To such of His servants As He pleases   and nothing Do ye spend in the least  In His Cause  but He Replaces it   for He is The Best of those who Grant Sustenance
Quran Translation.3644: One day He will Gather them all together  And say to the angels    Was it you that these Men used to worship
Quran Translation.3645: They will say    Glory to Thee   Our  tie  is with Thee  As Protector not with them  Nay  but they worshipped The Jinns   most of them Believed in them
Quran Translation.3646: So on that Day No power shall they have Over each other  for profit Or harm   and We shall Say to the wrong doers    Taste ye the Penalty Of the Fire  the which Ye were wont to deny
Quran Translation.3647: When Our Clear Signs Are rehearsed to them  They say    This is only A man who wishes To hinder you from the  worship  Which your fathers practiced   And they say    This is Only a falsehood invented    And the Unbelievers say Of the Truth when it comes To them    This is nothing But evident magic
Quran Translation.3648: But We had not given Them Books which they could Study  nor sent apostles To them before thee As Warners
Quran Translation.3649: And their predecessors rejected  The Truth    these have Not received a tenth Of what We had granted To those   yet when they rejected My apostles  how  terrible  Was My re   of them
Quran Translation.3650: Say     I do admonish you On one point   that ye Do stand up before God   It may be  in pairs  Or  it may be  singly   And reflect  within yourselves    Your Companion is not Possessed   he is no less Than a Warner to you  In face of a terrible Penalty
Quran Translation.3651: Say     No reward do I Ask of you   it is  all  In your interest   my reward Is only due from God   And He is Witness To all things
Quran Translation.3652: Say     Verily my Lord Doth cast the  mantle Of  Truth  over His servants    He that has full knowledge Of  all  that is hidden
Quran Translation.3653: Say     The Truth has arrived  And Falsehood neither creates Anything new  nor restores Anything
Quran Translation.3654: Say     If I am astray  I only stray to the loss Of my own soul   but if I receive guidance  it is Because of the inspiration Of my Lord to me   It is He Who hears All things  and is  ever  near
Quran Translation.3655: If thou couldst but see When they will quake With terror   but then There will be no escape  For them   and they will be Seized from a position  Quite  near
Quran Translation.3656: And they will say    We do believe  now  In the  Truth      but how Could they receive  Faith  From a position  so  far off
Quran Translation.3657: Seeing that they did reject Faith  entirely  before  and That they  continually  cast  Slanders  on the Unseen From a position far off
Quran Translation.3658: And between them And their desires  Is placed a barrier  As was done in the past With their partisans   For they were indeed In suspicious  disquieting  doubt
Quran Translation.3659: Praise be to God  Who created  out of nothing  The heavens and the earth  Who made the angels Messengers with wings   Two  or three  or four  Pairs    He adds to Creation As He pleases   for God Has power over all things
Quran Translation.3660: What God out of His Mercy Doth bestow on mankind There is none can withhold   What He doth withhold  There is none can grant  Apart from Him   And He is the Exalted In Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.3661: O men  call to mind The grace of God unto you   Is there a Creator  other Than God  to give you Sustenance from heaven Or earth   There is No god but He   how Then are ye deluded Away from the Truth
Quran Translation.3662: And if they reject thee  So were apostles rejected Before thee   to God Go back for decision All affairs
Quran Translation.3663: O men   certainly The promise of God Is true  Let not then This present life deceive you  Nor let the Chief Deceiver Deceive you about God
Quran Translation.3664: Verily Satan is an enemy To you   so treat him As an enemy  He only Invites his adherents  That they may become Companions of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.3665: For those who reject God  Is a terrible Penalty   but For those who believe And work righteous deeds  Is Forgiveness  and A magnificent Reward
Quran Translation.3666: Is he  then  to whom The evil of his conduct Is made alluring  so That he looks upon it As good   equal to one Who is rightly guided    For God leaves to stray Whom He wills  and guides Whom He wills  So Let not thy soul go out In  vainly  sighing after them   For God knows well All that they do
Quran Translation.3667: It is God Who sends Forth the Winds  so that They raise up the Clouds  And We drive them To a Land that is dead  And revive the earth therewith After its death   even so  Will be  the Resur
Quran Translation.3668: If any do seek For glory and power   To God belong All glory and power  To Him mount up  All  Words of Purity   It is He Who exalts Each Deed of Righteousness  Those that lay Plots Of Evil   for them Is a Penalty terrible   And the plotting of such Will be void  of result
Quran Translation.3669: And God did create You from dust   Then from a sperm drop   Then He made you In pairs  And no female Conceives  or lays down  Her load   but with His Knowledge  Nor is a man Long lived granted length Of days  nor is a part Cut off from his life  But is in a Decree  Ordained   All this Is easy to God
Quran Translation.3670: Nor are the two bodies Of flowing water alike   The one palatable  sweet  And pleasant to drink  And the other  salt And bitter  Yet from each  Kind of water  do ye Eat flesh fresh and tender  And ye extract ornaments To wear   and thou seest The ships therein that plough The waves  that ye may Seek  thus  of the Bounty Of God that ye May be grateful
Quran Translation.3671: He merges Night into Day  And He merges Day Into Night  and He has Subjected the sun and The moon  to His Law    Each one runs its course For a term appointed  Such is God your Lord   To Him belongs all Dominion  And those whom ye invoke Besides Him have not The least power
Quran Translation.3672: If ye invoke them  They will not listen To your call  and if They were to listen  They cannot answer Your  prayer   On the Day Of Judgement they will reject Your  Partnership   And none   O man    can tell thee  The Truth  like the One Who is acquainted with all things
Quran Translation.3673: O ye men   It is Ye that have need Of God   but God is The One Free of all wants  Worthy of all praise
Quran Translation.3674: If He so pleased  He Could blot you out And bring in A New Creation
Quran Translation.3675: Nor is that  at all  Difficult for God
Quran Translation.3676: Nor can a bearer of burdens Bear another s burden  If one heavily laden should Call another to  bear  his load  Not the least portion of it Can be carried  by the other   Even though he be nearly Related  Thou canst but Admonish such as fear Their Lord unseen And establish regular Prayer  And whoever purifies himself Does so for the benefit Of his own soul   and The destination  of all  Is to God
Quran Translation.3677: The blind and the seeing Are not alike
Quran Translation.3678: Nor are the depths Of Darkness and the Light
Quran Translation.3679: Nor are the  chilly  shade And the  genial  heat of the sun
Quran Translation.3680: Nor are alike those That are living and those That are dead  God can Make any that He wills To hear   but thou Canst not make those To hear who are  Buried  in graves
Quran Translation.3681: Thou art no other Than a warner
Quran Translation.3682: Verily We have sent thee In truth  as a bearer Of glad tidings  And as a warner   And there never was A people  without a warner Having lived among them  In the past
Quran Translation.3683: And if they reject thee  So did their predecessors  To whom came their apostles With Clear Signs  Books Of dark prophecies  And the Book Of Enlightenment
Quran Translation.3684: In the end did I Punish those who rejected Faith   and how  terrible  Was My re   of them
Quran Translation.3685: Seest thou not that God sends down rain From the sky   With it We then bring out produce Of various colours  And in the mountains Are tracts white and red  Of various shades of colour  And black intense in hue
Quran Translation.3686: And so amongst men And crawling creatures and cattle  Are they of various colours  Those truly fear God  Among His Servants  Who have knowledge   For God is Exalted in Might  Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.3687: Those who rehearse the Book Of God  establish regular Prayer  And spend  in Charity  Out of what We have provided For them  secretly and openly  Hope for a Commerce That will never fail
Quran Translation.3688: For He will pay them Their meed  nay  He will Give them  even  more Out of His Bounty   For He is Oft Forgiving  Most Ready to appreciate  service
Quran Translation.3689: That which We have revealed To thee of the Book Is the Truth   confirming What was  revealed  before it   For God is assuredly  With respect to His servants  Well acquainted and Fully Observant
Quran Translation.3690: Then We have given the Book for inheritance To such of Our servants As We have chosen   But there are among them Some who wrong their own Souls   some who follow A middle course   and some Who are by God s leave Foremost in good deeds   That is the highest Grace
Quran Translation.3691: Gardens of Eternity will they Enter   therein will they Be adorned with bracelets Of gold and pearls   And their garments there Will be of silk
Quran Translation.3692: And they will say     Praise be to God  Who has removed from us  All  sorrow   for our Lord is indeed Oft Forgiving Ready to appreciate  service
Quran Translation.3693: Who has  out of His Bounty  Settled us in a Home That will last   no toil nor sense of weariness Shall touch us therein
Quran Translation.3694: But those who reject  God   For them will be The Fire of Hell   No term shall be determined For them  so they should die  Nor shall its Penalty Be lightened for them  Thus do We reward Every ungrateful one
Quran Translation.3695: Therein will they cry Aloud  for assistance      Our Lord   Bring us out   We shall work righteousness  Not the  deeds  we used To do       Did We not Give you long enough life So that he that would Should receive admonition   And  moreover  the warner Came to you  So taste ye  The fruit of your deeds    For the Wrong doers There is no helper
Quran Translation.3696: Verily God knows  All  the hidden things Of the heavens and the earth   Verily He has full knowledge Of all that is In  men s  hearts
Quran Translation.3697: He it is that has made You inheritors in the earth   If  then  any do reject  God   their re   works  Against themselves   their re  But adds to the odium For the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord   Their re  but adds To  their own  undoing
Quran Translation.3698: Say     Have ye seen  These    Partners   of yours Whom ye call upon Besides God     Show me What it is they have created In the  wide  earth  Or have they a share In the heavens   Or Have We given them a Book From which they  can derive  Clear  evidence    Nay  the wrong doers promise Each other nothing but delusions
Quran Translation.3699: It is God Who sustains The heavens and the earth  Lest they cease  to function    And if they should fail  There is none not one  Can sustain them thereafter   Verily He is Most Forbearing  Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.3700: They swore their strongest oaths By God that if a warner Came to them  they would Follow his guidance better Than any  other  of the Peoples   But when a warner came To them  it has only Increased their flight  From righteousness
Quran Translation.3701: On account of their arrogance In the land and their Plotting of Evil  But the plotting of Evil Will hem in only The authors thereof  Now Are they but looking for The way the ancients Were dealt with   But No change wilt thou find In God s way  of dealing    No turning off wilt thou Find in God s way  of dealing
Quran Translation.3702: Do they not travel Through the earth  and see What was the End Of those before them   Though they were superior To them in strength   Nor is God to be frustrated By anything whatever In the heavens Or on earth   for He Is All Knowing  All Powerful
Quran Translation.3703: If God were to punish Men according to what They deserve  He would not Leave on the back Of the  earth  a single Living creature   but He Gives them respite For a stated Term   When their Term expires  Verily God has in His sight All His servants
Quran Translation.3705: By the Qur ān  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.3706: Thou art indeed One of the apostles
Quran Translation.3708: It is a Revelation Sent down by  Him  The Exalted in Might  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3709: In order that thou mayest Admonish a people  Whose fathers had received No admonition  and who Therefore remain heedless  Of the Signs of God
Quran Translation.3710: The Word is proved true Against the greater part of them   For they do not believe
Quran Translation.3711: We have put yokes Round their necks Right up to their chins  So that their heads are Forced up  and they cannot see
Quran Translation.3712: And We have put A bar in front of them And a bar behind them  And further  We have Covered them up   so that They cannot see
Quran Translation.3713: The same is it to them Whether thou admonish them Or thou do not admonish Them   they will not believe
Quran Translation.3714: Thou canst but admonish Such a one as follows The Message and fears The  Lord  Most Gracious  unseen   Give such a one  therefore  Good tidings  of Forgiveness And a Reward most generous
Quran Translation.3715: Verily We shall give life To the dead  and We record That which they send before And that which they leave Behind  and of all things Have We taken account In a clear Book  Of evidence
Quran Translation.3716: Set forth to them  By way of a parable  The  story of  the Companions Of the City  Behold  There came apostles to it
Quran Translation.3717: When We  first  sent To them two apostles  They rejected them   But We strengthened them With a third   they said    Truly  we have been sent On a mission to you
Quran Translation.3718: The  people  said     Ye are Only men like ourselves   And  God  Most Gracious Sends no sort of revelation   Ye do nothing but lie
Quran Translation.3719: They said     Our Lord doth Know that we have been sent On a mission to you
Quran Translation.3720: And Our duty is only To proclaim the clear Message
Quran Translation.3721: The  people  said     For us  We augur an evil omen From you   if ye desist not  We will certainly stone you  And a grievous punishment Indeed will be inflicted On you by us
Quran Translation.3722: They said     Your evil omens Are with yourselves    Deem ye this an evil omen   If ye are admonished   Nay  but ye are a people Transgressing all bounds
Quran Translation.3723: Then there came running  From the farthest part Of the City  a man  Saying    O my People  Obey the apostles
Quran Translation.3724: Obey those who ask No reward of you  For themselves   and who have Themselves received Guidance
Quran Translation.3725: It would not be reasonable In me if I did not Serve Him Who created me  And to Whom ye shall  All  be brought back
Quran Translation.3726: Shall I take  other  gods Besides Him   If  God  Most Gracious should Intend some adversity for me  Of no use whatever Will be their intercession For me nor  can they Deliver me
Quran Translation.3727: I would indeed  If I were to do so  Be in manifest Error
Quran Translation.3728: For me  I have faith In the Lord of you  all    Listen  then  to me
Quran Translation.3729: It was said     Enter thou The Garden   He said     Ah me   Would that My People knew  what I know
Quran Translation.3730: For that my Lord Has granted me Forgiveness And has enrolled me Among those held in honour
Quran Translation.3731: And We sent not down Against his People  after him  Any hosts from heaven  Nor was it needful For Us so to do
Quran Translation.3732: It was no more than A single mighty Blast  And behold   they were  like ashes  Quenched and silent
Quran Translation.3733: Ah   alas for  My  servants   There comes not an apostle To them but they mock him
Quran Translation.3734: See they not how many Generations before them We destroyed   Not to them Will they return
Quran Translation.3735: But each one of them All will be Brought before Us  for judgment
Quran Translation.3736: A Sign for them Is the earth that is dead   We do give it life  And produce grain therefrom  Of which ye do eat
Quran Translation.3737: And We produce therein Orchards with date palms And vines  and We cause Springs to gush forth therein
Quran Translation.3738: That they may enjoy The fruits of this  artistry    It was not their hands That made this   Will they not then give thanks
Quran Translation.3739: Glory to God  Who created In pairs all things that The earth produces  as well as Their own  human  kind And  other  things of which They have no knowledge
Quran Translation.3740: And a Sign for them Is the Night   We withdraw Therefrom the Day  and behold They are plunged in darkness
Quran Translation.3741: And the Sun Runs his course For a period determined For him   that is The decree of  Him  The Exalted in Might The All Knowing
Quran Translation.3742: And the Moon   We have measured for her Mansions  to traverse  Till she returns Like the old  and withered  Lower part of a date stalk
Quran Translation.3743: It is not permitted To the Sun to catch up The Moon  nor can The Night outstrip the Day   Each  just  swims along In  its own  orbit  According to Law
Quran Translation.3744: And a Sign for them Is that We bore Their race  through the flood  In the loaded Ark
Quran Translation.3745: And We have created For them similar  vessels  On which they ride
Quran Translation.3746: If it were Our Will  We could drown them   Then would there be No helper  to hear Their cry   nor could They be delivered
Quran Translation.3747: Except by way of Mercy From Us  and by way Of  worldly  convenience  To serve them  for a time
Quran Translation.3748: When they are told    Fear ye that which is Before you and that which Will be after you  in order That ye may receive Mercy    They turn back
Quran Translation.3749: Not a Sign comes to them From among the Signs Of their Lord  but they Turn away therefrom
Quran Translation.3750: And when they are told    Spend ye of  the bounties  With which God Has provided you   the Unbelievers Say to those who believe     Shall we then feed those Whom  if God had so willed  He would have fed   himself     Ye are in nothing But manifest error
Quran Translation.3751: Further  they say    When Will this promise  come to pass   If what ye say is true
Quran Translation.3752: They will not  have To  wait for aught But a single Blast   It will seize them while They are yet disputing Among themselves
Quran Translation.3753: No  chance  will they then Have  by will  to dispose  Of their affairs   nor To return to their own people
Quran Translation.3754: The trumpet shall be Sounded  when behold   From the sepulchres  men  Will rush forth To their Lord
Quran Translation.3755: They will say     Ah   Woe unto us   Who Hath raised us up From our beds of repose      A voice will say &colon     This is what  God  Most Gracious had promised  And true was the word Of the apostles
Quran Translation.3756: It will be no more Than a single Blast  When lo   they will all Be brought up before Us
Quran Translation.3757: Then  on that Day  Not a soul will be Wronged in the least  And ye shall but Be repaid the meeds Of your past Deeds
Quran Translation.3758: Verily the Companions Of the Garden shall That Day have joy In all that they do
Quran Translation.3759: They and their associates Will be in groves Of  cool  shade  reclining On Thrones  of dignity
Quran Translation.3760: Every  fruit  enjoyment  Will be there for them   They shall have whatever They call for
Quran Translation.3761: Peace    a Word  of salutation  from a Lord Most Merciful
Quran Translation.3762: And O ye in sin   Get ye apart this Day
Quran Translation.3763: Did I not enjoin On you  O ye children Of Adam  that ye Should not worship Satan   For that he was to you An enemy avowed
Quran Translation.3764: And that ye should Worship Me   for that  this Was the Straight Way
Quran Translation.3765: But he did lead astray A great multitude of you  Did ye not  then  understand
Quran Translation.3766: This is the Hell Of which ye were  Repeatedly  warned
Quran Translation.3767: Embrace ye the  Fire  This Day  for that ye  Persistently  rejected  Truth
Quran Translation.3768: That Day shall We set A seal on their mouths  But their hands will speak To Us  and their feet Bear witness  to all That they did
Quran Translation.3769: If it had been Our Will  We could surely have Blotted  out their eyes   Then should they have Run about groping for the Path  But how could they have seen
Quran Translation.3770: And if it had been Our Will  We could Have transformed them  To remain  in their places   Then should they have been Unable to move about  Nor could they have returned  After error
Quran Translation.3771: If We grant long life To any  We cause him To be reversed in nature   Will they not then understand
Quran Translation.3772: We have not instructed The  Prophet  in Poetry  Nor is it meet for Him   This is no less than A Message and a Qur ān Making things clear
Quran Translation.3773: That it may give admonition To any  who are  alive  And that the charge May be proved against those Who reject  Truth
Quran Translation.3774: See they not that it is We Who have created For them among the things Which Our hands have fashioned Cattle  which are under Their dominion
Quran Translation.3775: And that We have Subjected them to their  use    Of them some do carry them And some they eat
Quran Translation.3776: And they have  other  profits From them  besides   and they Get  milk  to drink  Will they not then Be grateful
Quran Translation.3777: Yet they take  for worship  Gods other than God   Hoping  that they might Be helped
Quran Translation.3778: They have not the power To help them   but they Will be brought up  Before Our Judgment seat  As a troop  to be condemned
Quran Translation.3779: Let not their speech  then  Grieve thee  Verily We know What they hide as well as What they disclose
Quran Translation.3780: Doth not man see That it is We Who Created Him from sperm   Yet behold   he  stands forth  As an open adversary
Quran Translation.3781: And he makes comparisons For Us  and forgets his own  Origin and  Creation   He says    Who can give Life to  dry  bones And decomposed ones  at that
Quran Translation.3782: Say    He will give them Life Who created them For the first time   For He is well versed In every kind of creation
Quran Translation.3783: The same Who produces For you fire out of The green tree  when behold   Ye kindle therewith  Your own fires
Quran Translation.3784: Is not He Who created The heavens and the earth Able to create the like Thereof    Yea  indeed   For He is the Creator Supreme  Of skill and knowledge  infinite
Quran Translation.3785: Verily  when He intends A thing  His Command is    Be    and it is
Quran Translation.3786: So glory to Him In Whose hands is The dominion of all things   And to Him will ye Be all brought back
Quran Translation.3787: By those who range Themselves in ranks
Quran Translation.3788: And so are strong In repelling  evil
Quran Translation.3789: And thus proclaim The Message  of God
Quran Translation.3790: Verily  verily  your God Is One
Quran Translation.3791: Lord of the heavens And of the earth  And all between them  And Lord of every point At the rising of the sun
Quran Translation.3792: We have indeed decked The lower heaven with beauty  In  the stars
Quran Translation.3793: For beauty  and for guard Against all obstinate Rebellious evil spirits
Quran Translation.3794: So  they should not strain Their ears in the di  Of the Exalted Assembly But be cast away From every side
Quran Translation.3795: Repulsed  for they are Under a perpetual penalty
Quran Translation.3796: Except such as snatch away Something by stealth  and they Are pursued by a flaming Fire  of piercing brightness
Quran Translation.3797: Just ask their opinion   Are they the more difficult To create  or the  other  beings We have created   Them have We created Out of a sticky clay
Quran Translation.3798: Truly dost thou marvel  While they ridicule
Quran Translation.3799: And  when they are Admonished  pay no heed
Quran Translation.3800: And  when they see A Sign  turn it To mockery
Quran Translation.3801: And say    This is nothing But evident sorcery
Quran Translation.3802: What   when we die  And become dust and bones  Shall we  then  be Raised up  again
Quran Translation.3803: And also our fathers Of old
Quran Translation.3804: Say thou     Yea  and ye shall Then be humiliated  On account of your evil
Quran Translation.3805: Then it will be a single  Compelling  cry   And behold  they will Begin to see
Quran Translation.3806: They will say    Ah   Woe to us   this is The Day of Judgement
Quran Translation.3807: A voice will say     This is the Day Of Sorting Out  whose Truth ye  once  denied
Quran Translation.3808: Bring ye up   It shall be said    The wrong doers And their wives  And the things they worshipped
Quran Translation.3809: Besides God  And lead them to the Way To the  Fierce  Fire
Quran Translation.3810: But stop them  For they must be asked
Quran Translation.3811: What is the matter With you that ye Help not each other
Quran Translation.3812: Nay  but that day they Shall submit  to Judgment
Quran Translation.3813: And they will turn to One another  and question One another
Quran Translation.3814: They will say     It was ye Who used to come to us From the right hand  Of power and authority
Quran Translation.3815: They will reply     Nay  ye Yourselves had no Faith
Quran Translation.3816: Nor had we any authority Over you  Nay  it was Ye who were a people In obstinate rebellion
Quran Translation.3817: So now has been proved true  Against us  the Word Of our Lord that we Shall indeed  have to  taste  The punishment of our sins
Quran Translation.3818: We led you astray   for truly We were ourselves astray
Quran Translation.3819: Truly  that Day  they will  All  share in the Penalty
Quran Translation.3820: Verily that is how We Shall deal with Sinners
Quran Translation.3821: For they  when they were Told that there is No god except God  would Puff themselves up with Pride
Quran Translation.3822: And say     What   Shall we Give up our gods  For the sake of A Poet possessed
Quran Translation.3823: Nay   he has come With the  very  Truth  And he confirms  the Message Of  the apostles  before him
Quran Translation.3824: Ye shall indeed taste Of the Grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.3825: But it will be no more Than the retribution Of  the Evil  that ye Have wrought
Quran Translation.3826: But the sincere  and devoted  Servants of God
Quran Translation.3827: For them is a Sustenance Determined
Quran Translation.3828: Fruits  Delights    and they  Shall enjoy  honour and dignity
Quran Translation.3830: Facing each other On Thrones  of dignity
Quran Translation.3831: Round will be passed To them a Cup From a clear flowing fountain
Quran Translation.3832: Crystal white  of a taste Delicious to those Who drink  thereof
Quran Translation.3833: Free from headiness   Nor will they suffer Intoxication therefrom
Quran Translation.3834: And besides them will be Chaste women  restraining Their glances  with big eyes  Of wonder and beauty
Quran Translation.3835: As if they were  Delicate  eggs closely guarded
Quran Translation.3836: Then they will turn to One another and question One another
Quran Translation.3837: One of them will start The talk and say     I had an intimate Companion  on the earth
Quran Translation.3838: Who used to say    What   art thou amongst those Who bear witness to The truth  of the Message
Quran Translation.3839: When we die and become Dust and bones  shall we Indeed receive rewards And punishments
Quran Translation.3840: A voice  said     Would ye Like to look down
Quran Translation.3841: He looked down And saw him In the midst of the Fire
Quran Translation.3842: He said     By God   Thou wast little short Of bringing me to perdition
Quran Translation.3843: Had it not been for The Grace of my Lord  I should certainly have been Among those brought  there
Quran Translation.3844: Is it  the case  that We shall not die
Quran Translation.3845: Except our first death  And that we Shall not be punished
Quran Translation.3846: Verily this is The supreme achievement
Quran Translation.3847: For the like of this Let all strive  Who wish to strive
Quran Translation.3848: Is that the better entertainment Or the Tree of Zaqqūm
Quran Translation.3849: For We have truly Made it  as  a trial For the wrong doers
Quran Translation.3850: For it is a tree That springs out Of the bottom of Hell fire
Quran Translation.3851: The shoots of its fruit stalks Are like the heads Of devils
Quran Translation.3852: Truly they will eat thereof And fill their bellies therewith
Quran Translation.3853: Then on top of that They will be given A mixture made of Boiling water
Quran Translation.3854: Then shall their return Be to the  Blazing  Fire
Quran Translation.3855: Truly they found their fathers On the wrong Path
Quran Translation.3856: So they  too  were rushed Down on their footsteps
Quran Translation.3857: And truly before them  Many of the ancients Went astray
Quran Translation.3858: But We sent aforetime  Among them   apostles  To admonish them
Quran Translation.3859: Then see what was The End of those who Were admonished  but heeded not
Quran Translation.3860: Except the sincere  and devoted  Servants of God
Quran Translation.3861: In the days of old   Noah cried to Us  And We are the Best To hear prayer
Quran Translation.3862: And We delivered him And his people from The Great Calamity
Quran Translation.3863: And made his progeny To endure  on this earth
Quran Translation.3864: And We left  this blessing  For him among generations To come in later times
Quran Translation.3865: Peace and salutation to Noah Among the nations
Quran Translation.3866: Thus indeed do We reward Those who do right
Quran Translation.3867: For he was one Of Our believing Servants
Quran Translation.3868: Then the rest We overwhelmed In the Flood
Quran Translation.3869: Verily among those Who followed his Way Was Abraham
Quran Translation.3870: Behold  He approached his Lord With a sound heart
Quran Translation.3871: Behold  he said to his father And to his people    What Is that which ye worship
Quran Translation.3872: Is it a Falsehood  Gods other than God  That ye desire
Quran Translation.3873: Then what is your idea About the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3874: Then did he cast A glance at the Star
Quran Translation.3875: And he said    I am Indeed sick  at heart
Quran Translation.3876: So they turned away From him  and departed
Quran Translation.3877: Then did he turn To their gods and said    Will ye not eat  Of the offerings before you
Quran Translation.3878: What is the matter With you that ye Speak not  intelligently
Quran Translation.3879: Then did he turn Upon them  striking  them  With the right hand
Quran Translation.3880: Then came  the worshippers  With hurried steps  And faced  him
Quran Translation.3881: He said     Worship ye That which ye have  Yourselves  carved
Quran Translation.3882: But God has created you And your handiwork
Quran Translation.3883: They said    Build him A furnace  and throw him Into the blazing fire
Quran Translation.3884: This failing   they then Sought a stratagem against him  But We made them the ones Most humiliated
Quran Translation.3885: He said     I will go To my Lord   He Will surely guide me
Quran Translation.3886: O my Lord   grant me A righteous  son
Quran Translation.3887: So We gave him The good news Of a boy ready To suffer and forbear
Quran Translation.3888: Then  when  the son  Reached  the age of   Serious  work with him  He said     O my son   I see in vision That I offer thee in sacrifice   Now see what is Thy view     The son  said     O my father   Do As thou art commanded   Thou will find me  If God so wills one Practicing Patience and Constancy
Quran Translation.3889: So when they had both Submitted their wills  to God   And he had laid him Prostrate on his forehead  For sacrifice
Quran Translation.3890: We called out to him    O Abraham
Quran Translation.3891: Thou hast already fulfilled The vision    thus indeed Do We reward Those who do right
Quran Translation.3892: For this was obviously A trial
Quran Translation.3893: And We ransomed him With a momentous sacrifice
Quran Translation.3894: And We left  this blessing  For him among generations  To come  in later times
Quran Translation.3896: Thus indeed do We reward Those who do right
Quran Translation.3897: For he was one Of Our believing Servants
Quran Translation.3898: And We gave him The good news Of Isaac a prophet   One of the Righteous
Quran Translation.3899: We blessed him and Isaac   But of their progeny Are  some  that do right  And  some  that obviously Do wrong  to their own souls
Quran Translation.3900: Again   of old   We bestowed Our favour On Moses and Aaron
Quran Translation.3901: And We delivered them And their people from  Their  Great Calamity
Quran Translation.3902: And We helped them  So they overcame  their troubles
Quran Translation.3903: And We gave them The Book which helps To make things clear
Quran Translation.3904: And We guided them To the Straight Way
Quran Translation.3905: And We left  this blessing  For them among generations  To come  in later times
Quran Translation.3906: Peace and salutation To Moses and Aaron
Quran Translation.3907: Thus indeed do We reward Those who do right
Quran Translation.3908: For they were two Of Our believing Servants
Quran Translation.3909: So also was Elias Among those sent  by Us
Quran Translation.3910: Behold  he said To his people    Will ye not fear  God
Quran Translation.3911: Will ye call upon Baal And forsake the Best Of Creators
Quran Translation.3912: God  your Lord and Cherisher And the Lord and Cherisher Of your fathers of old
Quran Translation.3913: But they rejected him  And they will certainly Be called up  for punishment
Quran Translation.3914: Except the sincere and devoted Servants of God  among them
Quran Translation.3915: And We left  this blessing  For him among generations  To come  in later times
Quran Translation.3916: Peace and salutation To such as Elias
Quran Translation.3917: Thus indeed do We reward Those who do right
Quran Translation.3918: For He was one Of Our believing Servants
Quran Translation.3919: So also was Lūt Among those sent  by Us
Quran Translation.3920: Behold  We delivered him And his adherents  all
Quran Translation.3921: Except an old woman Who was among those Who lagged behind
Quran Translation.3923: Verily  ye pass By their  sites   By day
Quran Translation.3924: And by night   Will ye not understand
Quran Translation.3925: So also was Jonah Among those sent  by Us
Quran Translation.3926: When he ran away  Like a slave from captivity  To the ship  fully  laden
Quran Translation.3927: He  agreed to  cast lots  And he was condemned
Quran Translation.3928: Then the big Fish Did swallow him  And he had done Acts worthy of blame
Quran Translation.3929: Had it not been That he  repented and  Glorified God
Quran Translation.3930: He would certainly have Remained inside the Fish Till the Day of Resur
Quran Translation.3931: But We cast him forth On the naked shore In a state of sickness
Quran Translation.3932: And We caused to grow  Over him  a spreading plant Of the Gourd kind
Quran Translation.3933: And We sent him  On a mission  To a hundred thousand  Men  or more
Quran Translation.3934: And they believed   So We permitted them To enjoy  their life  For a while
Quran Translation.3935: Now ask them their opinion   Is it that thy Lord Has  only  daughters  and they Have sons
Quran Translation.3936: Or that We created The angels female  and they Are witnesses  thereto
Quran Translation.3937: Is it not that they Say  from their own invention
Quran Translation.3938: God has begotten children    But they are liars
Quran Translation.3939: Did He  then  choose Daughters rather than sons
Quran Translation.3940: What is the matter With you   How judge ye
Quran Translation.3941: Will ye not then Receive admonition
Quran Translation.3942: Or have ye An authority manifest
Quran Translation.3943: Then bring ye your Book  Of authority  if ye be Truthful
Quran Translation.3944: And they have invented A blood relationship Between Him and the Jinns   But the Jinns know  Quite well  that they Have indeed to appear  Before His Judgment seat
Quran Translation.3945: Glory to God    He is free  From the things they ascribe  To Him
Quran Translation.3946: Not  so do  the Servants Of God  sincere and devoted
Quran Translation.3947: For  verily  neither ye Nor those ye worship
Quran Translation.3948: Can lead  any  Into temptation Concerning God
Quran Translation.3949: Except such as are  Themselves  going to The blazing Fire
Quran Translation.3950: Those ranged in ranks say      Not one of us but has A place appointed
Quran Translation.3951: And we are verily Ranged in ranks  for service
Quran Translation.3952: And we are verily those Who declare  God s  glory
Quran Translation.3953: And there were those Who said
Quran Translation.3954: If only we had had Before us a Message From those of old
Quran Translation.3955: We should certainly have Been Servants of God  Sincere  and devoted
Quran Translation.3956: But  now that the Qur ān Has come   they reject it   But soon will they know
Quran Translation.3957: Already has Our Word Been passed before  this  To Our Servants sent  by Us
Quran Translation.3958: That they would certainly Be assisted
Quran Translation.3959: And that Our forces   They surely must conquer
Quran Translation.3960: So turn thou away From them for a little while
Quran Translation.3961: And watch them  how They fare   and they soon Shall see  how thou farest
Quran Translation.3962: Do they wish  indeed  To hurry on Our Punishment
Quran Translation.3963: But when it descends Into the open space Before them  evil will be The morning for those who Were warned  and heeded not
Quran Translation.3964: So turn thou away From them for a little while
Quran Translation.3965: And watch  how they fare  And they soon shall see  How thou farest
Quran Translation.3966: Glory to thy Lord  The Lord of Honour And Power    He is free  From what they ascribe  To Him
Quran Translation.3968: And Praise to God  The Lord and Cherisher Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.3969: Sād   By the Qur ān  Full of Admonition    This is the Truth
Quran Translation.3970: But the Unbelievers  Are steeped  in Self glory And Separatism
Quran Translation.3971: How many generations Before them did We destroy   In the end they cried  For mercy  when There was no longer time For being saved
Quran Translation.3972: So they wonder That a Warner has come To them from among themselves   And the Unbelievers say    This is a sorcerer Telling lies
Quran Translation.3973: Has he made the gods  All  into one God   Truly this is A wonderful thing
Quran Translation.3974: And the leaders among them Go away  impatiently    saying     Walk ye away  and remain Constant to your gods   For this is truly A thing designed  against you
Quran Translation.3975: We never heard  the like  Of this among the people Of these latter days   This is nothing but A made up tale
Quran Translation.3976: What   Has the Message Been sent to him   Of all persons  among us     But they are in doubt Concerning My  own  Message   Nay  they have not yet Tasted My Punishment
Quran Translation.3977: Or have they the Treasures Of the Mercy of thy Lord   The Exalted in Power  The Grantor of Bounties Without measure
Quran Translation.3978: Or have they the dominion Of the heavens and the earth And all between   If so  Let them mount up With the ropes and means  To reach that end
Quran Translation.3979: But there will be Put to flight even a host Of confederates
Quran Translation.3980: Before them  were many Who  rejected apostles   The People of Noah  And  Ad  and Pharaoh The Lord of Stakes
Quran Translation.3981: And Thamūd  and the People Of Lūt  and the Companions Of the Wood   such were The Confederates
Quran Translation.3982: Not one  of them  but Rejected the apostles  But My Punishment Came justly and inevitably  On them
Quran Translation.3983: These  to day  only wait For a single mighty Blast  Which  when it comes  Will brook no delay
Quran Translation.3984: They say     Our Lord   Hasten to us our sentence  Even  before the Day Of Account
Quran Translation.3985: Have patience at what they Say  and remember Our Servant David  the man of strength   For he ever turned  to God
Quran Translation.3986: It was We that made The hills declare  In unison with him  Our Praises  at eventide And at break of day
Quran Translation.3987: And the birds gathered  In assemblies    all with him Did turn  to God
Quran Translation.3988: We strengthened his kingdom  And gave him wisdom And sound judgment In speech and decision
Quran Translation.3989: Has the Story of The Disputants reached thee   Behold  they climbed over The wall of the private chamber
Quran Translation.3990: When they entered The presence of David  And he was terrified Of them  they said     Fear not   We are two Disputants  one of whom Has wronged the other   Decide now between us With truth  and treat us not With unjustice  but guide us To the even Path
Quran Translation.3991: This man is my brother   He has nine and ninety Ewes  and I have  but  one   Yet he says    Commit her To my care    and is  moreover  Harsh to me in speech
Quran Translation.3992: David  said     He has Undoubtedly wronged thee In demanding thy  single  ewe To be added to his  flock Of  ewes   truly many Are the Partners  in business  Who wrong each other   Not so do those who believe And work deeds of righteousness  And how few are they      And David gathered that We Had tried him   he asked Forgiveness of his Lord  Fell down  bowing  In prostration   and turned  To God in repentance
Quran Translation.3993: So We forgave him This  lapse    he enjoyed  Indeed  a Near Approach to Us  And a beautiful Place Of  final  Return
Quran Translation.3994: O David   We did indeed Make thee a vicegerent On earth   so judge thou Between men in truth  and justice    Nor follow thou the lusts  Of thy heart   for they will Mislead thee from the Path Of God   for those who Wander astray from the Path Of God  is a Penalty Grievous  For that they forget The Day of Account
Quran Translation.3995: Not without purpose did We Create heaven and earth And all between   That Were the thought of Unbelievers   But woe to the Unbelievers Because of the Fire  of Hell
Quran Translation.3996: Shall We treat those Who believe and work deeds Of righteousness  the same As those who do mischief On earth   Shall We treat Those who guard against evil  The same as those who Turn aside from the right
Quran Translation.3997: Here is  a Book which We have sent down Unto thee  full of blessings  That they may meditate On its Signs  and that Men of understanding may Receive admonition
Quran Translation.3998: To David We gave Solomon  for a son    How excellent in Our service   Ever did he turn  to Us
Quran Translation.3999: Behold  there were brought Before him at eventide  Coursers of the highest breeding  And swift of foot
Quran Translation.4000: And he said    Truly Do I love the love Of Good with a view To the glory of my Lord     Until  the sun  was hidden In the veil  of Night
Quran Translation.4001: Bring them back to me   Then began he to pass His hand over  their  legs And their necks
Quran Translation.4002: And We did try Solomon   We placed On his throne a body  Without life    but he did turn  To Us in true devotion
Quran Translation.4003: He said    O my Lord   Forgive me  and grant me A Kingdom which   It may be   suits not Another after me   For Thou art the Grantor Of Bounties  without measure
Quran Translation.4004: Then We subjected the Wind To his power  to flow Gently to his order  Whithersoever he willed
Quran Translation.4005: As also the evil ones   Including  every kind Of builder and diver
Quran Translation.4006: As also others bound Together in fetters
Quran Translation.4007: Such are Our Bounties   Whether thou bestow them  On others  or withhold them  No account will be asked
Quran Translation.4008: And he enjoyed  indeed  A Near Approach to Us  And a beautiful Place Of  final  Return
Quran Translation.4009: Commemorate Our Servant Job  Behold he cried to his Lord     The Evil One has afflicted Me with distress and suffering
Quran Translation.4010: The command was given     Strike with thy foot   Here is  water  wherein To wash  cool and refreshing  And  water  to drink
Quran Translation.4011: And We gave him  back  His people and doubled Their number  as a Grace From Ourselves  and a thing For commemoration  for all Who have Understanding
Quran Translation.4012: And take in thy hand A little grass  and strike Therewith   and break not  Thy oath    Truly We found Him full of patience and constancy  How excellent in Our service   Ever did he turn  to Us
Quran Translation.4013: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham  Isaac  and Jacob  Possessors of Power and Vision
Quran Translation.4014: Verily We did chose them For a special  purpose   Proclaiming the Message Of the Hereafter
Quran Translation.4015: They were  in Our sight  Truly  of the company Of the Elect and the Good
Quran Translation.4016: And commemorate Ismā īl  Elisha  and Zul Kifl   Each of them was Of the company of the Good
Quran Translation.4017: This is a Message  Of admonition    and verily  For the Righteous  Is a beautiful place Of  final  Return
Quran Translation.4018: Gardens of Eternity  Whose doors will  ever  Be open to them
Quran Translation.4019: Therein will they Recline  at ease    Therein can they Call  at pleasure  For fruit in abundance  And  delicious  drink
Quran Translation.4020: And beside them will be Chaste women restraining Their glances   companions  Of equal age
Quran Translation.4021: Such is the Promise Made to you For the Day of Account
Quran Translation.4022: Truly such will be Our Bounty  to you    It will never fail
Quran Translation.4023: Yea  such   But  For the wrong doers Will be an evil place Of  final  Return
Quran Translation.4024: Hell   they will burn Therein  an evil bed  Indeed  to lie on
Quran Translation.4025: Yea  such   Then Shall they taste it   A boiling fluid  and a fluid Dark  murky  intensely cold
Quran Translation.4026: And other Penalties Of a similar kind  To match them
Quran Translation.4027: Here is a troop Rushing headlong with you   No welcome for them   Truly  they shall burn In the Fire
Quran Translation.4028: The followers shall cry To the misleaders &colon     Nay  ye  too    No welcome For you   It is ye who Have brought this upon us   Now evil is  this  place To stay in
Quran Translation.4029: They will say     Our Lord   Whoever brought this upon   us Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire
Quran Translation.4030: And they will say     What has happened to us That we see not men Whom we used to number Among the bad ones
Quran Translation.4031: Did we treat them  As such  in ridicule  Or have  our  eyes Failed to perceive them
Quran Translation.4032: Truly that is just and fitting   The mutual recriminations Of the People of the Fire
Quran Translation.4033: Say     Truly am I A Warner   no god Is there but the One God  Supreme and Irresistible
Quran Translation.4034: The Lord of the heavens And the earth  and all Between  Exalted in Might  Able to enforce His Will  Forgiving again and again
Quran Translation.4035: Say     That is a Message Supreme  above all
Quran Translation.4036: From which ye Do turn away
Quran Translation.4037: No knowledge have I Of the Chiefs on high  When they discuss  Matters  among themselves
Quran Translation.4038: Only this has been revealed To me   that I am To give warning Plainly and publicly
Quran Translation.4039: Behold  thy Lord said To the angels     I am About to create man From clay
