Quran Translation.4040: When I have fashioned him  In due proportion  and breathed Into him of My spirit  Fall ye down in obeisance Unto him
Quran Translation.4041: So the angels prostrated themselves  All of them together
Quran Translation.4042: Not so Iblīs   he Was haughty  and became One of those who reject Faith
Quran Translation.4043: God  said     O Iblīs   what prevents thee from Prostrating thyself to one Whom I have created With My hands   Art thou haughty   Or art thou one Of the high  and mighty  ones
Quran Translation.4044: Iblīs  said     I am better Than he   Thou createdst Me from fire  and him Thou createdst from clay
Quran Translation.4045: God  said     Then get thee Out from here   for thou Art rejected  accursed
Quran Translation.4046: And My Curse shall be On thee till the Day of Judgement
Quran Translation.4047: Iblīs  said     O my Lord   Give me then respite Till the Day The  dead  are raised
Quran Translation.4048: God  said     Respite then Is granted thee
Quran Translation.4049: Till the Day of the Time Appointed
Quran Translation.4050: Iblīs  said     Then  By Thy Power  I will Put them all in the wrong
Quran Translation.4051: Except Thy Servants Amongst them  sincere And purified  by Thy grace
Quran Translation.4052: God  said     Then It is just And fitting  and I say what is Just and fitting
Quran Translation.4053: That I will certainly fill Hell with thee And those that follow thee   Every one
Quran Translation.4054: Say     No reward do I ask Of you for this  Qur ān   Nor am I a pretender
Quran Translation.4055: This is no less than A Message to  all  The Worlds
Quran Translation.4056: And ye shall certainly Know the truth of it  all  After a while
Quran Translation.4057: The revelation Of this Book Is from God  The Exalted in Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4058: Verily it is We Who have Revealed the Book to thee In Truth   so serve God  Offering Him sincere devotion
Quran Translation.4059: Is it not to God That sincere devotion Is due   But those who Take for protectors other Than God  say      We only Serve them in order that They may bring us nearer To God   Truly God Will judge between them In that wherein they differ  But God guides not Such as are false And ungrateful
Quran Translation.4060: Had God wished To take to Himself A son  He could have Chosen whom He pleased Out of those whom He Doth create   but Glory Be to Him    He is above Such things   He is God  The One  the Irresistible
Quran Translation.4061: He created the heavens And the earth In true  proportions    He makes the Night Overlap the Day  and the Day Overlap the Night   He has subjected The sun and the moon  To His law    Each one follows a course For a time appointed  Is not He the Exalted In Power He Who forgives Again and again
Quran Translation.4062: He created you  all  From a single Person   Then created of like nature  His mate   and He Sent down for you eight head Of cattle in pairs   He makes you  In the wombs Of your mothers  In stages  one after another  In three veils of darkness  Such is God  your Lord And Cherisher   to Him belongs  All  dominion  There is No god but He   then How are ye turned away  From your true Center
Quran Translation.4063: If ye reject  God   Truly God hath no need Of you   but He liketh not Ingratitude from His servants   If ye are grateful  He Is pleased with you  No bearer of burdens Can bear the burden Of another  In the End  To your Lord is your Return  When He will tell you The truth of all That ye did  in this life   For He knoweth well All that is in  men s  hearts
Quran Translation.4064: When some trouble toucheth man  He crieth unto his Lord  Turning to Him in repentance   But when He bestoweth A favour upon him As from Himself   man  Doth forget what he cried And prayed for before  And he doth set up Rivals unto God  Thus misleading others From God s Path  Say    Enjoy thy blasphemy For a little while   Verily thou art  one  Of the Companions of the Fire
Quran Translation.4065: Is one who worships devoutly During the hours of the night Prostrating himself or standing  In adoration   who takes heed Of the Hereafter  and who Places his hope in the Mercy Of his Lord  like one Who does not    Say     Are those equal  those who know And those who do not know   It is those who are Endued with understanding That receive admonition
Quran Translation.4066: Say     O ye My servants who believe   Fear your Lord  Good is  the reward  For those who do good In this world  Spacious is God s earth   Those who patiently persevere Will truly receive A reward without measure
Quran Translation.4067: Say     Verily  I am commanded To serve God With sincere devotion
Quran Translation.4068: And I am commanded To be the first Of those who bow To God in Islam
Quran Translation.4069: Say     I would  if I Disobeyed my Lord  Indeed have fear Of the Penalty Of a Mighty Day
Quran Translation.4070: Say     It is God I serve  With my sincere  And exclusive  devotion
Quran Translation.4071: Serve ye what ye will Besides Him   Say     Truly  those in loss Are those who lose Their own souls And their People On the Day of Judgement   Ah   that is indeed The  real and  evident Loss
Quran Translation.4072: They shall have Layers Of Fire above them  And Layers  of Fire  Below them   with this Doth God warn off His Servants     O My Servants   Then fear ye Me
Quran Translation.4073: Those who eschew Evil   And fall not into Its worship  and turn To God  in repentance    For them is Good News   So announce the Good News To My Servants
Quran Translation.4074: Those who listen To the Word  And follow The best  meaning  in it   Those are the ones Whom God has guided  and those Are the ones endued With understanding
Quran Translation.4075: Is  then  one against whom The decree of Punishment Is justly due  equal to one who eschews evil    Wouldst thou  then  deliver One  who is  in the Fire
Quran Translation.4076: But it is for those Who fear their Lord  That lofty mansions  One above another  Have been built   Beneath them flow Rivers  of delight     such is  The Promise of God   Never doth God fail in  His  promise
Quran Translation.4077: Seest thou not that God Sends down rain from The sky  and leads it Through springs in the earth   Then He causes to grow  Therewith  produce of various Colours   then it withers   Thou wilt see it grow yellow   Then He makes it Dry up and crumble away  Truly  in this  is A Message of remembrance to Men of understanding
Quran Translation.4078: Is one whose heart God has opened to Islam  So that he has received Enlightenment from God   No better than one hard hearted    Woe to those whose hearts Are hardened against celebrating The praises of God   They Are manifestly wandering  In error
Quran Translation.4079: God has revealed  From time to time  The most beautiful Message In the form of a Book  Consistent with itself   Yet  repeating  its teaching In various aspects    The skins of those who Fear their Lord tremble thereat   then their skins And their hearts do soften To the celebration of God s praises  Such is The guidance of God   He guides therewith Whom He pleases  but such As God leaves to stray  Can have none to guide
Quran Translation.4080: Is  then  one who Has to fear the brunt Of the Penalty on the Day of Judgement  and receive it  On his face   like one Guarded therefrom    It will Be said to the wrong doers     Taste ye  the fruits Of  what ye earned
Quran Translation.4081: Those before them  also  Rejected  revelation   and so The Punishment came to them From di s they did not Perceive
Quran Translation.4082: So God gave them A taste of humiliation In the present life  But greater is the Punishment Of the Hereafter  If they only knew
Quran Translation.4083: We have put forth For men  in this Qur ān Every kind of Parable  In order that they May receive admonition
Quran Translation.4084: It is  A Qur ān In Arabic  without any Crookedness  therein    In order that they May guard against Evil
Quran Translation.4085: God puts forth a Parable  A man belonging to many Partners at variance with each other  And a man belonging entirely To one master   are those two Equal in comparison   Praise be to God   But most of them Have no knowledge
Quran Translation.4086: Truly thou wilt die  One day   and truly they  Too  will die  one day
Quran Translation.4087: In the End will ye  All   on the Day Of Judgement  settle your disputes In the presence of your Lord
Quran Translation.4088: Who  then  doth more wrong Than one who utters A lie concerning God  And rejects the Truth When it comes to him Is there not in Hell An abode for blasphemers
Quran Translation.4089: And he who brings the Truth And he who confirms  And supports  it  such are the men who do right
Quran Translation.4090: They shall have all That they wish for  In the presence of their Lord   Such is the reward Of those who do good
Quran Translation.4091: So that God will Turn off from them  Even  the worst in their deeds And give them their reward According to the best Of what they have done
Quran Translation.4092: Is not God enough For His servant   But They try to frighten thee With other  gods  besides Him   For such as God leaves To stray  there can be No guide
Quran Translation.4093: And such as God doth Guide there can be None to lead astray  Is not God Exalted In Power   Able to enforce His Will   Lord of Retribution
Quran Translation.4094: If indeed thou ask them Who it is that created The heavens and the earth  They would be sure to say    God    Say     See ye then   The things that ye invoke Besides God  can they  If God wills some Penalty For me  remove His Penalty    Or if He wills some Grace For me  can they keep back His Grace     Say     Sufficient Is God for me   In Him trust those Who put their trust
Quran Translation.4095: Say     O my people   Do whatever ye can   I will do  my part    But soon will ye know
Quran Translation.4096: Who it is to whom Comes a Penalty of ignominy  and on whom Descends a Penalty that abides
Quran Translation.4097: Verily We have revealed The Book to thee In Truth  for  instructing  mankind  He  then  that receives guidance Benefits his own soul   But he that strays Injures his own soul  Nor art thou set Over them to dispose Of their affairs
Quran Translation.4098: It is God that takes The souls  of men  at death   And those that die not  He takes  during their sleep   Those on whom He Has passed the decree Of death  He keeps back  from returning to life   But the rest He sends  To their bodies  For a term appointed  Verily in this are Signs for those who reflect
Quran Translation.4099: What   Do they take For intercessors others Besides God   Say     Even if They have no power whatever And no intelligence
Quran Translation.4100: Say     To God belongs Exclusively  the right To grant  Intercession   To Him belongs the dominion Of the heavens and the earth   In the End  it is to Him That ye shall be Brought back
Quran Translation.4101: When God  the One and Only  Is mentioned  the hearts Of those who believe not In the Hereafter are filled With disgust and horror   But when  gods  other than He Are mentioned  behold  They are filled with joy
Quran Translation.4102: Say     O God   Creator of the heavens And the earth   Knower of all that is Hidden and open   It is Thou that wilt Judge between Thy Servants In those matters about which They have differed
Quran Translation.4103: Even if the wrong doers Had all that there is On earth  and as much more   In vain  would they offer it For ransom from the pain Of the Penalty on the Day Of Judgement   but something Will confront them from God  which they could never Have counted upon
Quran Translation.4104: For the evils of their Deeds Will confront them  And they will be  completely  Encircled by that which They used to mock at
Quran Translation.4105: Now  when trouble touches man  He cries to Us   But when We bestow A favour upon him As from Ourselves  He says    This has been Given to me because of A certain knowledge  I have      Nay  but this is But a trial  but most Of them understand not
Quran Translation.4106: Thus did the  generations  Before them say   But All that they did Was of no profit to them
Quran Translation.4107: Nay  the evil results Of their deeds overtook them  And the wrong doers Of this  generation  the evil results of their deeds Will soon overtake them  too   And they will never be Able to frustrate  Our Plan
Quran Translation.4108: Know they not that God enlarges the provision Or restricts it  for any He pleases   Verily  in this are Signs for those who believe
Quran Translation.4109: Say     O my Servants who Have transgressed against their souls   Despair not of the Mercy Of God   for God forgives All sins   for He is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.4110: Turn ye to your Lord  In repentance  and bow To His  Will  Before The Penalty comes on you   After that ye shall not Be helped
Quran Translation.4111: And follow the Best Of  the courses  revealed To you from your Lord  before the Penalty comes On you of a sudden  While ye perceive not
Quran Translation.4112: Lest the soul should  then  Say     Ah   woe is me   In that I neglected  My Duty  towards God  And was but among those Who mocked
Quran Translation.4113: Or  lest  it should say     If only God had guided Me  I should certainly Have been among the righteous
Quran Translation.4114: Or  lest  it should say When it  actually  sees the Penalty     If only I had another chance  I should certainly be Among those who do good
Quran Translation.4115: The reply will be &colon     Nay  But there came to thee My Signs and thou didst Reject them   thou wast Haughty  and became one Of those who reject Faith
Quran Translation.4116: On the Day of Judgement Wilt thou see those Who told lies against God    Their faces will be turned Black   is there not In Hell an abode For the Haughty
Quran Translation.4117: But God will deliver The righteous to their place Of salvation   no evil Shall touch them  Nor shall they grieve
Quran Translation.4118: God is the Creator Of all things  and He Is the Guardian and Disposer Of all affairs
Quran Translation.4119: To Him belong the keys Of the heavens And the earth   And those who reject The Signs of God   It is they who will Be in loss
Quran Translation.4120: Say     Is it Some one other than God That ye order me To worship  O ye Ignorant ones
Quran Translation.4121: But it has already Been revealed to thee   As it was to those Before thee    If thou Wert to join  gods with God   truly fruitless Will be thy work  in life  And thou wilt surely Be in the ranks of those Who lose  all spiritual good
Quran Translation.4122: Nay  but worship God And be of those who Give thanks
Quran Translation.4123: No just estimate Have they made of God Such as is due to Him   On the Day of Judgement The whole of the earth Will be but His handful  and the heavens will be Rolled up in His right hand   Glory to Him   High is He above The Partners they attribute To Him
Quran Translation.4124: The Trumpet will  just  Be sounded  when all That are in the heavens And on earth will swoon  Except such as it will Please God  to exempt   Then will a second one Be sounded  when  behold  They will be standing And looking on
Quran Translation.4125: And the Earth will shine With the glory of its Lord   The Record  of Deeds  Will be placed  open    The prophets and the witnesses Will be brought forward   And a just decision Pronounced between them   And they will not Be wronged  in the least
Quran Translation.4126: And to every soul will be Paid in full  the fruit  Of its deeds   and  God  knoweth best all that They do
Quran Translation.4127: The Unbelievers will be Led to Hell in crowd   Until  when they arrive there  Its gates will be opened  And its Keepers will say    Did not apostles come To you from among yourselves  Rehearsing to you the Signs Of your Lord  and warning you Of the Meeting of this Day Of yours     The answer Will be     True   but The Decree of Punishment Has been proved true Against the Unbelievers
Quran Translation.4128: To them  will be said     Enter ye the gates of Hell  To dwell therein   And evil is  this  Abode of the arrogant
Quran Translation.4129: And those who feared Their Lord will be led To the Garden in crowds   Until behold  they arrive there   Its gates will be opened   And its Keepers will say     Peace be upon you   Well have ye done   Enter ye here  To dwell therein
Quran Translation.4130: They will say     Praise be to God  Who has Truly fulfilled His promise To us  and has given us  This  land in heritage   We can dwell in the Garden as we will   how excellent A reward for those Who work  righteousness
Quran Translation.4131: And thou wilt see The angels surrounding the Throne  Divine  On all sides  singing Glory And Praise to their Lord  The Decision between them  At Judgment  will be In  perfect  justice  And the cry  on all sides  will be    Praise be to God  The Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.4133: The revelation Of this Book Is from God  Exalted in Power  Full of Knowledge
Quran Translation.4134: Who forgiveth Sin  Accepteth Repentance  Is Strict in Punishment  And hath a Long Reach  In all things   There is no god But He   to Him Is the Final Goal
Quran Translation.4135: None can dispute About the Signs of God But the Unbelievers  Let not  then  Their strutting about Through the land Deceive thee
Quran Translation.4136: But  there were people  before them  Who denied  the Signs   The People of Noah  And the Confederates  Of Evil  after them   And every People plotted Against their prophet  To seize him  and disputed By means of vanities  Therewith to condemn The Truth   but it was I That seized them   And how  terrible  Was My Requital
Quran Translation.4137: Thus was the Decree Of thy Lord proved true Against the Unbelievers   That truly they are Companions of the Fire
Quran Translation.4138: Those who sustain The Throne  of God  And those around it Sing Glory and Praise To their Lord   believe In Him   and implore Forgiveness For those who believe     Our Lord   Thy Reach Is over all things  In Mercy and Knowledge  Forgive  then  those who Turn in Repentance  and follow Thy Path   and preserve them From the Penalty Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.4139: And grant  our Lord   That they enter The Gardens of Eternity  Which Thou hast promised To them  and to the righteous Among their fathers  Their wives  and their posterity   For Thou art  He   The Exalted in Might  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4140: And preserve them From  all  ills   And any whom Thou Dost preserve from ills That Day  on them Wilt Thou have bestowed Mercy indeed   and that Will be truly  for them  The highest Achievement
Quran Translation.4141: The Unbelievers will be Addressed     Greater was The aversion of God to you Than  is  your aversion To yourselves  seeing that ye Were called to the Faith And ye used to refuse
Quran Translation.4142: They will say     Our Lord   Twice hast Thou made us Without life  and twice Hast Thou given us Life   Now have we recognised Our sins   is there Any way out  of this
Quran Translation.4143: The answer will be &colon     This is because  when God was invoked as The Only  object of worship   Ye did reject Faith  But when partners were Joined to Him  ye believed   The Command is with God  Most High  Most Great
Quran Translation.4144: He it is Who showeth You His Signs  and sendeth Down Sustenance for you From the sky   but only Those receive admonition Who turn  to God
Quran Translation.4145: Call ye  then  upon God With sincere devotion to Him  Even though the Unbelievers May detest it
Quran Translation.4146: Raised high above ranks  Or degrees    He is  the Lord Of the Throne  of authority    By His Command doth He Send the spirit  of inspiration  To any of His servants He pleases  that it may Warn  men  of the Day Of Mutual Meeting
Quran Translation.4147: The Day whereon They will  all  come forth   Not a single thing Concerning them is hidden From God  Whose will be The Dominion that Day   That of God  the One  The Irresistible
Quran Translation.4148: That Day will every soul Be requited for what It earned   no injustice Will there be that Day  For God is Swift In taking account
Quran Translation.4149: Warn them of the Day That is  ever  drawing near  When the Hearts will  Come  right up to the Throats To choke  them    No intimate friend Nor intercessor will the wrong doers Have  who could be Listened to
Quran Translation.4150: God  knows of  the tricks  That deceive with the eyes  And all that hearts  Of men  conceal
Quran Translation.4151: And God will judge With  Justice and  Truth   But those whom  men  Invoke besides Him  will Not  be in a position  To judge at all  Verily it is God  alone  Who hears and sees  All things
Quran Translation.4152: Do they not travel Through the earth and see What was the End Of those before them   They were even superior To them in strength  And in the traces  they Have left  in the land   But God did call them To account for their sins  And none had they To defend them against God
Quran Translation.4153: That was because there came To them their apostles With Clear  Signs   But they rejected them   So God called them To account   for He is Full of Strength  Strict in Punishment
Quran Translation.4154: Of old We sent Moses  With Our Signs And an Authority manifest
Quran Translation.4155: To Pharaoh  Hāmān  And Qārūn   but they Called  him    a sorcerer Telling lies
Quran Translation.4156: Now  when he came to them In Truth  from Us  They said    Slay the sons Of those who believe With him  and keep alive Their females    but the plots Of Unbelievers  end  in nothing But errors  and delusions
Quran Translation.4157: Said Pharaoh     Leave me To slay Moses   and let him Call on his Lord   What I fear is lest He should change your religion  Or lest he should cause Mischief to appear In the land
Quran Translation.4158: Moses said     I have indeed Called upon my Lord And your Lord  For pro   from every Arrogant one who believes not In the Day of Account
Quran Translation.4159: A Believer  a man From among the people Of Pharaoh  who had concealed His faith  said     Will ye Slay a man because he Says    My Lord is God      When he has indeed come To you with Clear  Signs  From your Lord   And if He be a liar  on him Is  the sin of  his lie   But  if he is telling The Truth  then will Fall on you something Of the  calamity  of which He warns you   truly God guides not one Who transgresses and lies
Quran Translation.4160: O my People   yours Is the dominion this day   Ye have the upper hand In the land   but who Will help us from The Punishment of God  Should it befall us     Pharaoh said     I but Point out to you that Which I see  myself    Nor do I guide you But to the Path of Right
Quran Translation.4161: Then said the man Who believed     O my People   Truly I do fear For you something like The Day  of disaster  Of the Confederates  in sin
Quran Translation.4162: Something like the fate Of the People of Noah  The  Ad  and the Thamūd  And those who came After them   but God Never wishes injustice To His Servants
Quran Translation.4163: And O my People   I fear for you a Day When there will be Mutual calling  and wailing
Quran Translation.4164: A Day when ye Shall turn your backs And flee   no defender Shall ye have from God   Any whom God leaves To stray  there is none To guide
Quran Translation.4165: And to you there came Joseph in times gone by  With Clear Signs  but Ye ceased not to doubt Of the  mission  for which He had come   at length  When he died  ye said     No apostle will God send After him    Thus doth God Leave to stray such as Transgress and live in doubt
Quran Translation.4166: Such  as dispute about The Signs of God  Without any authority That hath reached them  Grievous and odious  Is such conduct  In the sight of God And of the Believers  Thus doth God seal up Every heart of arrogant And obstinate transgressors
Quran Translation.4167: Pharaoh said     O Hāmān   Build me a lofty palace  That I may attain The ways and means
Quran Translation.4168: The ways and means Of  reaching  the heavens  And that I may mount up To the God of Moses   But as far as I am concerned  I think  Moses  is a liar     Thus was made alluring  In Pharaoh s eyes  The evil of his deeds  And he was hindered From the Path   and the plot Of Pharaoh led to nothing But perdition  for him
Quran Translation.4169: The man who believed said Further     O my People   Follow me   I will lead You to the Path of Right
Quran Translation.4170: O my People   This life Of the present is nothing But  temporary  convenience   It is the Hereafter That is the Home That will last
Quran Translation.4171: He that works evil Will not be requited But by the like thereof   And he that works A righteous deed whether Man or woman and is A Believer such will enter The Garden  of Bliss    therein Will they have abundance Without measure
Quran Translation.4172: And O my People   How  strange  it is For me to call you To Salvation while ye Call me to the Fire
Quran Translation.4173: Ye do call upon me To blaspheme against God  And to join with Him Partners of whom I have No knowledge   and I Call you to the Exalted In Power  Who forgives Again and again
Quran Translation.4174: Without doubt ye do call Me to one who is not Fit to be called to  Whether in this world  Or in the Hereafter   Our Return will be To God   and the Transgressors Will be Companions Of the Fire
Quran Translation.4175: Soon will ye remember What I say to you  now   My  own  affair I commit To God   for God  ever  Watches over His Servants
Quran Translation.4176: Then God saved him From  every  ill that they Plotted  against him   But the brunt of the Penalty Encompassed on all sides The People of Pharaoh
Quran Translation.4177: In front of the Fire Will they be brought  Morning and evening   And  the Sentence will be  On the Day that Judgment will be established     Cast ye the People Of Pharaoh into The severest Penalty
Quran Translation.4178: Behold  they will dispute With each other in the Fire   The weak ones  who followed  Will say to those who Had been arrogant    We but Followed you   can ye then Take  on yourselves  from us Some share of the Fire
Quran Translation.4179: Those who had been arrogant Will say     We are all In this  Fire    Truly  God has judged Between  His  Servants
Quran Translation.4180: Those in the Fire will say To the Keepers of Hell     Pray to your Lord To lighten us the Penalty For a Day  at least
Quran Translation.4181: They will say     Did there Not come to you Your apostles with Clear Signs     They will say    Yes    They will reply    Then Pray  as ye like    But The Prayer of those Without Faith is nothing But  futile wandering  In  mazes of  error
Quran Translation.4182: We will  without doubt  Help Our apostles and those Who believe   both  In this world s life And on the Day When the Witnesses Will stand forth
Quran Translation.4183: The Day when no profit Will it be to Wrong doers To present their excuses  But they will  only  have The Curse and the Home Of Misery
Quran Translation.4184: We did aforetime give Moses The  Book of  Guidance  And We gave the Book In inheritance to the Children Of Israel
Quran Translation.4185: A Guide and a Message To men of understanding
Quran Translation.4186: Patiently  then  persevere   For the Promise of God Is true   and ask forgiveness For thy fault  and celebrate The Praises of thy Lord In the evening And in the morning
Quran Translation.4187: Those who dispute About the Signs of God Without any authority Bestowed on them  there is Nothing in their breasts But  the quest of  greatness  Which they shall never Attain to   seek refuge  Then  in God   it is He Who hears and sees  all things
Quran Translation.4188: Assuredly the creation Of the heavens And the earth Is a greater  matter  Than the creation of men   Yet most men understand not
Quran Translation.4189: Not equal are the blind And those who  clearly  see   Nor are  equal  those Who believe and work Deeds of righteousness  and Those who do evil  Little do ye learn By admonition
Quran Translation.4190: The Hour will certainly come   Therein is no doubt   Yet most men believe not
Quran Translation.4191: And your Lord says     Call on Me   I Will answer your  Prayer    But those who are Too arrogant to serve Me Will surely find themselves In Hell in humiliation
Quran Translation.4192: It is God Who has Made the Night for you  That ye may rest therein  And the Day  as that Which helps  you  to see  Verily God is Full of Grace and Bounty to men   Yet most men give No thanks
Quran Translation.4193: Such is God  your Lord  The Creator of all things  There is no god but He   Then how ye are deluded Away from the Truth
Quran Translation.4194: Thus are deluded those Who are wont to reject The Signs of God
Quran Translation.4195: It is God Who has Made for you the earth As a resting place  And the sky as a canopy  And has given you shape And made your shapes Beautiful  and has provided For you Sustenance  Of things pure and good   Such is God your Lord  So Glory to God  The Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.4196: He is the Living  One    There is no god but He   Call upon Him  giving Him Sincere devotion  Praise be To God  Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.4197: Say     I have been forbidden To invoke those whom ye Invoke besides God  seeing that The Clear Signs have come To me from my Lord   And I have been commanded To bow  in Islām  To the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.4198: It is He Who has Created you from dust  Then from a sperm drop  Then from a leech like clot   Then does He get you Out  into the light  As a child   then lets you  Grow and  reach your age Of full strength   then Lets you become old  Though of you there are Some who die before   And lets you reach A Term appointed   In order that ye May learn wisdom
Quran Translation.4199: It is He Who gives Life And Death   and when He Decides upon an affair  He says to it    Be    And it is
Quran Translation.4200: Seest thou not those That dispute concerning The Signs of God   How are they turned away  From Reality
Quran Translation.4201: Those who reject the Book And the  revelations  with which We sent Our apostles   But soon shall they know
Quran Translation.4202: When the yokes  shall be  Round their necks  And the chains   They shall be dragged along
Quran Translation.4203: In the boiling fetid fluid   Then in the Fire Shall they be burned
Quran Translation.4204: Then shall it be said To them     Where are The  deities  to which Ye gave part worship
Quran Translation.4205: In derogation of God     They will reply     They have Left us in the lurch   Nay  we invoked not  Of old  anything  that had Real existence    Thus Does God leave The Unbelievers to stray
Quran Translation.4206: That was because Ye were wont to rejoice On the earth in things Other than the Truth  And that ye were wont To be insolent
Quran Translation.4207: Enter ye the gates Of Hell  to dwell therein   And evil is  this  abode Of the arrogant
Quran Translation.4208: So persevere in patience   For the Promise of God Is true   and whether We show thee  in this life  Some part of what We Promise them  or We Take thy soul  to Our Mercy   Before that    in any case  It is to Us that They shall  all  return
Quran Translation.4209: We did aforetime send Apostles before thee   of them There are some whose story We have related to thee  And some whose story We have not related To thee  It was not  Possible  for any apostle To bring a Sign except By the leave of God   But when the Command Of God issued  The matter was decided In truth and justice  And there perished  There and then  those Who stood on Falsehoods
Quran Translation.4210: It is God Who made Cattle for you  that ye May use some for riding And some for food
Quran Translation.4211: And there are  other  advantages In them for you  besides    That ye may through them Attain to any need  There may be  in your hearts   And on them and on ships Ye are carried
Quran Translation.4212: And He shows you  always  His Signs   then which Of the Signs of God Will ye deny
Quran Translation.4213: Do they not travel through The earth and see what Was the End of those Before them   They were More numerous than these And superior in strength And in the traces  They have left  in the land   Yet all that they accomplished Was of no profit to them
Quran Translation.4214: For when their apostles Came to them With Clear Signs  they exulted In such knowledge  and skill  As they had   but That very  Wrath  at which They were wont to scoff Hemmed them in
Quran Translation.4215: But when they saw Our Punishment  they said     We believe in God  The One God and we Reject the partners we used To join with Him
Quran Translation.4216: But their professing the Faith When they  actually  saw Our Punishment was not going To profit them   Such has been  God s way Of dealing with His servants  From the most ancient times   And even thus did The rejecters of God Perish  utterly
Quran Translation.4218: A revelation from  God   Most Gracious  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.4219: A Book  whereof the verses Are explained in detail   A Qur ān in Arabic  For people who understand
Quran Translation.4220: Giving Good News And Admonition   yet most Of them turn away  And so they hear not
Quran Translation.4221: They say     Our hearts are Under veils   concealed  From that to which thou Dost invite us  and In our ears is a deafness  And between us and thee Is a screen   so do Thou  what thou wilt    For us  we shall do  What we will
Quran Translation.4222: Say thou     I am But a man like you   It is revealed to me By inspiration  that your God Is One God   so stand True to Him  and ask For His forgiveness    And woe to those who Join gods with God
Quran Translation.4223: Those who practice not Regular Charity  and who Even deny the Hereafter
Quran Translation.4224: For those who believe And work deeds of righteousness Is a reward that will Never fail
Quran Translation.4225: Say   Is it that ye Deny Him Who created The earth in two Days   And do ye join equals With Him   He is The Lord of  all  The Worlds
Quran Translation.4226: He set on the  earth   Mountains standing firm  High above it  And bestowed blessings on The earth  and measured therein All things to give them Nourishment in due proportion  In four Days  in accordance With  the needs of  Those who seek  sustenance
Quran Translation.4227: Moreover He comprehended In His design the sky  And it had been  as  smoke   He said to it And to the earth     Come ye together  Willingly or unwillingly    They said     We do come  Together   in willing obedience
Quran Translation.4228: So He completed them As seven firmaments In two Days  and He Assigned to each heaven Its duty and command  And We adorned The lower heaven With lights  and  provided it  With guard  Such Is the Decree of  Him  The Exalted in Might  Full of knowledge
Quran Translation.4229: But if they turn away  Say thou     I have warned You of a stunning Punishment  As of thunder and lightning  Like that which  overtook  The  Ad and the Thamūd
Quran Translation.4230: Behold  the apostles came To them  from before them And behind them   preaching      Serve none but God    They said    If our Lord Had so pleased  He would Certainly have sent down angels  To preach    now we reject Your mission  altogether
Quran Translation.4231: Now the  Ad behaved Arrogantly through the land  Against  all  truth and reason  And said     Who is superior To us in strength     What   Did they not see that God  Who created them  Was superior to them In strength   But they Continued to reject Our Signs
Quran Translation.4232: So We sent against them A furious Wind through days Of disaster  that We might Give them a taste Of a Penalty of humiliation In this Life   but the Penalty Of a Hereafter will be More humiliating still   And they will find No help
Quran Translation.4233: As to the Thamūd  We gave them guidance  But they preferred blindness  Of heart  to Guidance   So the stunning Punishment Of humiliation seized them  Because of what they had earned
Quran Translation.4234: But We delivered those Who believed and practiced righteousness
Quran Translation.4235: On the Day that The enemies of God Will be gathered together To the Fire  they will Be marched in ranks
Quran Translation.4236: At length  when they reach The  Fire   their hearing  Their sight  and their skins Will bear witness against them  As to  all  their deeds
Quran Translation.4237: They will say to their skins     Why bear ye witness Against us     They will say     God hath given us speech   He  Who giveth speech To everything   He created You for the first time  And unto Him were ye To return
Quran Translation.4238: Ye did not seek To hide yourselves  lest Your hearing  your sight  And your skins should bear Witness against you   But Ye did think that God Knew not many of the things That ye used to do
Quran Translation.4239: But this thought of yours Which ye did entertain Concerning your Lord  hath Brought you to destruction  And  now  have ye become Of those utterly lost
Quran Translation.4240: If  then  they have patience  The Fire will be A Home for them   And if they beg To be received into favour  Into favour will they not  Then  be received
Quran Translation.4241: And We have destined For them intimate companions  Of like nature   who made Alluring to them what was Before them and behind them   And the sentence among The previous generations of Jinns And men  who have passed away  Is proved against them   For they are utterly lost
Quran Translation.4242: The Unbelievers say     Listen not to this Qur ān  But talk at random In the midst Of its  reading   that ye May gain the upper hand
Quran Translation.4243: But We will certainly Give the Unbelievers a taste Of a severe Penalty  And We will requite them For the worst of their deeds
Quran Translation.4244: Such is the requital Of the enemies of God  The Fire   therein will be For them the Eternal Home   A  fit  requital  for That they were wont To reject Our Signs
Quran Translation.4245: And the Unbelievers will say     Our Lord   Show us those  Among Jinns and men  Who misled us   we shall Crush them beneath our feet  So that they become The vilest  before all
Quran Translation.4246: In the case of those Who say    Our Lord Is God    and  further  Stand straight and steadfast  The angels descend on them  From time to time      Fear ye not      they suggest     Nor grieve   But receive The Glad Tidings Of the Garden  of Bliss   The which ye were promised
Quran Translation.4247: We are your protectors In this life and In the Hereafter   Therein shall ye have All that your souls Shall desire   therein Shall ye have all That ye ask for
Quran Translation.4248: A hospitable gift from One Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.4249: Who is better in speech Than one who calls  men  To God  works righteousness  And says    I am of those Who bow in Islam
Quran Translation.4250: Nor can Goodness and Evil Be equal  Repel  Evil  With what is better   Then will he between whom And thee was hatred Become as it were Thy friend and intimate
Quran Translation.4251: And no one will be Granted such goodness Except those who exercise Patience and self restraint  None but persons of The greatest good fortune
Quran Translation.4252: And if  at any time  An incitement to discord Is made to thee By the Evil One  Seek refuge in God  He is the One Who hears and knows All things
Quran Translation.4253: Among His Signs are The Night and the Day  And the Sun and the Moon  Adore not the sun And the moon  but adore God  Who created them  If it is Him ye wish To serve
Quran Translation.4254: But if they  Unbelievers  Are arrogant   no matter    For in the presence Of thy Lord are those Who celebrate His praises By night and by day  And they never flag  Nor feel themselves above it
Quran Translation.4255: And among His Signs In this   thou seest The earth barren and desolate   But when We send down Rain to it  it is stirred To life and yields increase  Truly  He Who gives life To the  dead  earth Can surely give life To  men  who are dead  For He has power Over all things
Quran Translation.4256: Those who pervert The Truth in Our Signs Are not hidden from Us  Which is better   he that Is cast into the Fire  Or he that comes safe through On the Day of Judgement   Do what ye will   Verily He seeth  clearly  All that ye do
Quran Translation.4257: Those who reject the Message When it comes to them  Are not hidden from Us   And indeed it is a Book Of exalted power
Quran Translation.4258: No falsehood can approach it From before or behind it   It is sent down By One Full of Wisdom  Worthy of all Praise
Quran Translation.4259: Nothing is said to thee That was not said To the apostles before thee   That thy Lord has At His command  all  Forgiveness As well as a most Grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.4260: Had We sent this as A Qur ān  in a language  Other than Arabic  they would Have said     Why are not Its verses explained in detail   What    a Book  not in Arabic And  a Messenger  an Arab     Say     It is a guide And a healing to those Who believe   and for those Who believe not  there is A deafness in their ears  And it is blindness in their  eyes    They are  as it were  Being called from a place Far distant
Quran Translation.4261: We certainly gave Moses The Book aforetime   but disputes Arose therein  Had it not Been for a Word That went forth before From thy Lord   their differences  Would have been settled Between them   but they Remained in suspicious Disquieting doubt thereon
Quran Translation.4262: Whoever works righteousness Benefits his own soul   Whoever works evil  it is Against his own soul   Nor is thy Lord ever Unjust  in the least  To His servants
Quran Translation.4263: To Him is referred The Knowledge of the Hour  of Judgment   He knows all    No date fruit comes out Of its sheath nor does A female conceive  within Her womb  nor bring forth  Young   but by His Knowledge  The Day that  God  will propound To them the  question     Where are the Partners  Ye attributed  to Me     They will say    We do Assure Thee not one Of us can bear witness
Quran Translation.4264: The  deities  they used to invoke Aforetime will leave them In the lurch  and they Will perceive that they Have no way of escape
Quran Translation.4265: Man does not weary Of asking for good  things   But if ill touches him  He gives up all hope  and  is lost in despair
Quran Translation.4266: When We give him a taste Of some mercy from Ourselves  After some adversity has Touched him  he is sure To say    This is due To my  merit    I think not That the Hour  of Judgment  Will  ever  Be established   But if I am brought back To my Lord  I have  much  good  stored  in His sight     But We will show The Unbelievers the truth Of all that they did  And We shall give them The taste of a severe Penalty
Quran Translation.4267: When We bestow favours On man  he turns away  And gets himself remote On his side  instead of Coming to Us    and when Evil seizes him   he comes  Full of prolonged prayer
Quran Translation.4268: Say     See ye if The  Revelation  is  really  From God  and yet do ye Reject it   Who is more Astray than one who Is in a schism Far  from any purpose
Quran Translation.4269: Soon will We show them Our Signs in the  furthest  Regions  of the earth   and In their own souls  until It becomes manifest to them That this is the Truth  Is it not enough that Thy Lord doth witness All things
Quran Translation.4270: Ah indeed   are they In doubt concerning The Meeting with their Lord   Ah indeed   it is He That doth encompass All things
Quran Translation.4273: Thus doth  He  send Inspiration to thee As  He did  to those before thee   God  Exalted in Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4274: To Him belongs all That is in the heavens And on earth   and He Is Most High  Most Great
Quran Translation.4275: The heavens are almost Rent asunder from above them  By His Glory    And the angels celebrate The Praises of their Lord  And pray for forgiveness For  all  beings on earth   Behold   Verily God is He  the Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.4276: And those who take As protectors others besides Him   God doth watch over them   And thou art not The disposer of their affairs
Quran Translation.4277: Thus have We sent By inspiration to thee An Arabic Qur ān   That thou mayest warn The Mother of Cities And all around her   And warn  them  of The Day of Assembly  Of which there is no doubt    When  some will be In the Garden  and some In the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.4278: If God had so willed  He could have made them A single people   but He Admits whom He will To His Mercy   And the wrong doers Will have no protector Nor helper
Quran Translation.4279: What   Have they taken  For worship  protectors Besides Him   But it is God  He is the Protector  And it is He Who Gives life to the dead   It is He Who has power Over all things
Quran Translation.4280: Whatever it be wherein Ye differ  the decision Thereof is with God   Such is God my Lord   In Him I trust  And to Him I turn
Quran Translation.4281: He is  the Creator Of the heavens And the earth   He has made For you pairs From among yourselves  And pairs among cattle   By this means does He Multiply you   there is nothing Whatever like unto Him  And He is the One That hears and sees  all things
Quran Translation.4282: To Him belong the keys Of the heavens and the earth   He enlarges and restricts  The Sustenance to whom He will   for He knows Full well all things
Quran Translation.4283: The same religion has He Established for you as that Which He enjoined on Noah The which We have sent By inspiration to thee And that which We enjoined On Abraham  Moses  and Jesus   Namely  that ye should remain Steadfast in Religion  and make No divisions therein   To those who worship Other things than God  Hard is the  way  To which thou callest them  God chooses to Himself Those whom He pleases  And guides to Himself Those who turn  to Him
Quran Translation.4284: And they became divided Only after knowledge Reached them  through selfish Envy as between themselves  Had it not been For a Word that Went forth before From thy Lord   Tending  to a Term appointed  The matter would have Been settled between them   But truly those who have Inherited the Book after them Are in suspicious  disquieting  Doubt concerning it
Quran Translation.4285: Now then  for that  reason   Call  them to the Faith   And stand steadfast As thou art commanded  Nor follow thou their vain Desires   but say     I believe In the Book which God has sent down   And I am commanded To judge justly between you  God is Our Lord And your Lord  For us  Is the responsibility for  Our deeds  and for you For your deeds  There is No contention between us And you  God will Bring us together  And to Him is  Our  final goal
Quran Translation.4286: But those who dispute Concerning God after He Has been accepted   Futile is their dispute In the sight of Their Lord   on them Is Wrath and for them Will be a Penalty Terrible
Quran Translation.4287: It is God Who has Sent down the Book in truth  And the Balance  By which to weigh conduct   And what will make thee Realise that perhaps the Hour Is close at hand
Quran Translation.4288: Only those wish to Hasten it who believe not In it   those who believe Hold it in awe  And know that it is The Truth  Behold  verily Those that dispute concerning The Hour are far astray
Quran Translation.4289: Gracious is God To His servants   He gives Sustenance To whom He pleases   And He has Power And can carry out His Will
Quran Translation.4290: To any that desires The tilth of the Hereafter  We give increase In his tilth   and to any That desires the tilth Of this world  We grant Somewhat thereof  but he Has no share or lot In the Hereafter
Quran Translation.4291: What   Have they partners  In godhead   who have Established for them some Religion without the permission Of God   Had it not Been for the Decree Of Judgement  the matter Would have been decided Between them  at once   But verily the wrong doers Will have a grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.4292: Thou wilt see the wrong doers In fear on account of what They have earned  and  the burden Of  that must  necessarily  Fall on them  But those Who believe and work Righteous deeds will be In the luxuriant meads Of the Gardens   they shall Have  before their Lord  All that they wish for  That will indeed be The magnificent Bounty  Of God
Quran Translation.4293: That is  the Bounty  whereof God gives Glad Tidings To His Servants who Believe and do righteous deeds  Say     No reward do I Ask of you for this Except the love Of those near of kin    And if any one earns Any good  We shall give Him an increase of good In respect thereof   for God Is Oft Forgiving  Most Ready To appreciate  service
Quran Translation.4294: What   Do they say    He has forged a falsehood Against God     But if God Willed  He could seal up Thy heart  And God Blots out Vanity  and proves The Truth by His Words  For He knows well The secrets of all hearts
Quran Translation.4295: He is the One that accepts Repentance from His Servants And forgives sins   And He knows all That ye do
Quran Translation.4296: And He listens to Those who believe and Do deeds of righteousness  And gives them increase Of His Bounty   but For the Unbelievers there is A terrible Penalty
Quran Translation.4297: If God were to enlarge The provision for His Servants  They would indeed transgress Beyond all bounds Through the earth   But He sends  it  down In due measure As He pleases   For He is with His Servants Well acquainted  Watchful
Quran Translation.4298: He is the One that sends down Rain  even  after  men  have Given up all hope  And scatters His Mercy  Far and wide   And He Is the Protector  Worthy Of all Praise
Quran Translation.4299: And among His Signs Is the creation of The heavens and the earth  And the living creatures That He has scattered Through them   and He Has power to gather them Together when He wills
Quran Translation.4300: Whatever misfortune Happens to you  is because Of the things your hands Have wrought and for many  Of them  He grants forgiveness
Quran Translation.4301: Nor can ye frustrate  aught    Fleeing  through the earth   Nor have ye besides God Any one to protect Or to help
Quran Translation.4302: And among His Signs Are the ships  smooth running Through the ocean   tall  As mountains
Quran Translation.4303: If it be His Will  He can still the Wind   Then would they become Motionless on the back Of the  ocean   Verily In this are Signs For everyone who patiently Perseveres and is grateful
Quran Translation.4304: Or He can cause them To perish because of The  evil  which  the men  Have earned   but much Doth He forgive
Quran Translation.4305: But let those know  who Dispute about Our Signs  That there is for them No way of escape
Quran Translation.4306: Whatever ye are given  here  Is  but  a convenience Of this Life   but that Which is with God Is better and more lasting    It is  for those who believe And put their trust In their Lord
Quran Translation.4307: Those who avoid the greater Crimes and shameful deeds  And  when they are angry Even then forgive
Quran Translation.4308: Those who hearken To their Lord  and establish Regular prayer   who  conduct  Their affairs by mutual Consultation   Who spend out of what We bestow on them For Sustenance
Quran Translation.4309: And those who  when An oppressive wrong is inflicted On them   are not cowed But  help and defend themselves
Quran Translation.4310: The recompense for an injury Is an injury equal thereto  In degree    but if a person Forgives and makes reconciliation  His reward is due From God   for  God  Loveth not those who Do wrong
Quran Translation.4311: But indeed if any do Help and defend themselves After a wrong  done  To them  against such There is no cause Of blame
Quran Translation.4312: The blame is only Against those who oppress Men with wrong doing And insolently transgress Beyond bounds through the land  Defying right and justice   For such there will be A Penalty grievous
Quran Translation.4313: But indeed if any Show patience and forgive  That would truly be An exercise of courageous will And resolution in the conduct Of affairs
Quran Translation.4314: For any whom God Leaves astray  there is No protector thereafter  And thou wilt see The wrong doers  when In sight of the Penalty  Say     Is there any way  To effect  a return
Quran Translation.4315: And thou wilt see them Brought forward to the  Penalty   In a humble frame of mind Because of  their  disgrace   And  looking with a stealthy Glance  And the Believers Will say     Those are indeed In loss who have given To perdition their own selves And those belonging to them On the Day of Judgement  Behold   Truly the wrong doers Are in a lasting Penalty
Quran Translation.4316: And no protectors have they To help them  Other than God  And for any whom God Leaves to stray  there is No way  to the Goal
Quran Translation.4317: Hearken ye to your Lord  Before there come a Day Which there will be No putting back  because Of  the ordainment of  God   That Day there will be For you no place of refuge Nor will there be for you Any room for denial  Of your sins
Quran Translation.4318: If then they turn away  We have not sent thee As a guard over them  Thy duty is but to convey  The Message   And truly  When We give man A taste of a Mercy From Ourselves  he doth Exult thereat  but When some ill happens To him  on account Of the deeds which His hands have sent forth  Truly then is man ungrateful
Quran Translation.4319: To God belongs the dominion Of the heavens and the earth  He creates what He wills  And plans   He bestows  Children  male or female According to His Will  and Plan
Quran Translation.4320: Or He bestows both males And females  and He leaves Barren whom He will   For He is full Of knowledge and power
Quran Translation.4321: It is not fitting For a man that God Should speak to him Except by inspiration  Or from behind a veil  Or by the sending Of a Messenger To reveal  with God s permission  What God wills   for He Is Most High  Most Wise
Quran Translation.4322: And thus have We  By Our command  sent Inspiration to thee   Thou knowest not  before  What was Revelation  and What was Faith   but We Have made the  Qur ān  A Light  wherewith We Guide such of Our servants As We will   and verily Thou dost guide  men  To the Straight Way
Quran Translation.4323: The Way of God  To Whom belongs Whatever is in the heavens And whatever is on earth  Behold  how  all affairs Tend towards God
Quran Translation.4325: By the Book that Makes things clear
Quran Translation.4326: We have made it A Qur ān in Arabic  That ye may be able To understand  and learn wisdom
Quran Translation.4327: And verily  it is In the Mother of the Book  In Our Presence  high  In dignity   full of wisdom
Quran Translation.4328: Shall We then Take away the Message From you and repel  you   For that ye are a people Transgressing beyond bounds
Quran Translation.4329: But how many were The prophets We sent Amongst the peoples of old
Quran Translation.4330: And never came there A prophet to them But they mocked him
Quran Translation.4331: So We destroyed  them  Stronger in power than these   And  thus  has passed on The Parable of the peoples Of old
Quran Translation.4332: If thou wert To question them    Who created The heavens and the earth     They would be sure to reply    They were created by  Him   The Exalted in Power  Full of Knowledge
Quran Translation.4333: Yea  the same that  Has made for you The earth  like a carpet  Spread out  and has made For you roads  and channels  Therein  in order that ye May find guidance  on the way
Quran Translation.4334: That sends down  From time to time  Rain from the sky In due measure    And We raise to life Therewith a land that is Dead   even so will ye Be raised  from the dead
Quran Translation.4335: That has created pairs In all things  and has made For you ships and cattle On which ye ride
Quran Translation.4336: In order that ye may Sit firm and square On their backs  and when So seated  ye may Celebrate the  kind  favour Of your Lord  and say    Glory to Him Who Has subjected these To our  use   for we Could never have accomplished This  by ourselves
Quran Translation.4337: And to our Lord  surely  Must we turn back
Quran Translation.4338: Yet they attribute To some of His servants A share with Him  In His godhead    Truly is man a blasphemous Ingrate avowed
Quran Translation.4339: What   Has He taken Daughters out of what He Himself creates  and granted To you sons for choice
Quran Translation.4340: When news is brought To one of them of  the birth Of  what he sets up As a likeness to  God  Most Gracious  his face Darkens  and he is filled With inward grief
Quran Translation.4341: Is then one brought up Among trinkets  and unable To give a clear account In a dispute  to be Associated with God
Quran Translation.4342: And they make into females Angels who themselves serve God  Did they witness Their creation   Their evidence Will be recorded  and they Will be called to account
Quran Translation.4343: Ah      they say    If It had been the Will Of  God  Most Gracious  We should not have Worshipped such  deities      Of that they have No knowledge   They Do nothing but lie
Quran Translation.4344: What   have We given them A Book before this  To which they are Holding fast
Quran Translation.4345: Nay   they say     We found Our fathers following A certain religion  And we do guide ourselves By their footsteps
Quran Translation.4346: Just in the same way  Whenever We sent a Warner Before thee to any people  The wealthy ones among them Said     We found our fathers Following a certain religion  And we will certainly Follow in their footsteps
Quran Translation.4347: He said     What   Even if I brought you Better guidance than that Which ye found Your fathers following     They said     For us  We deny that ye  prophets  Are sent  on a mission At all
Quran Translation.4348: So We exacted retribution From them   now see What was the end Of those who rejected  Truth
Quran Translation.4349: Behold   Abraham said To his father and his people     I do indeed clear myself Of what ye worship
Quran Translation.4350: I worship  only Him Who made me  and He Will certainly guide me
Quran Translation.4351: And he left it As a Word To endure among those Who came after him  That they may turn back  To God
Quran Translation.4352: Yea  I have given The good things of this life To these  men  and Their fathers  until the Truth Has come to them  And an Apostle Making things clear
Quran Translation.4353: But when the Truth came To them  they said     This is sorcery  and we Do reject it
Quran Translation.4354: Also  they say     Why Is not this Qur ān sent Down to some leading man In either of the two  Chief  cities
Quran Translation.4355: Is it they who would portion out The Mercy of thy Lord   It is We Who portion out Between them their livelihood In the life of this world   And We raise some of them Above others in ranks  So that some may command Work from others  But the Mercy of thy Lord Is better than the  wealth  Which they amass
Quran Translation.4356: And were it not that  All  men might become Of one  evil  way of life  We would provide  For everyone that blasphemes Against  God  Most Gracious  Silver roofs for their houses  And  silver  stair ways On which to go up
Quran Translation.4357: And  silver  doors To their houses  and thrones  Of silver  on which They could recline
Quran Translation.4358: And also adornments Of gold  But all this Were nothing but conveniences Of the present life   The Hereafter  in the sight Of thy Lord  is For the Righteous
Quran Translation.4359: If anyone withdraws himself From remembrance Of  God  Most Gracious  We appoint for him An evil one  to be An intimate companion to him
Quran Translation.4360: Such  evil ones  really Hinder them from the Path  But they think that they Are being guided aright
Quran Translation.4361: At length  when  such a one  Comes to Us  he says  To his evil companion      Would that between me And thee were the distance Of East and West     Ah   Evil is the companion  indeed
Quran Translation.4362: When ye have done wrong  It will avail you nothing  That day  that ye shall be Partners in punishment
Quran Translation.4363: Canst thou then make The deaf to hear  or give Di  to the blind Or to such as  wander  In manifest error
Quran Translation.4364: Even if We take thee Away  We shall be sure To exact retribution from them
Quran Translation.4365: Or We shall show thee That  accomplished  which We Have promised them   For verily We shall Prevail over them
Quran Translation.4366: So hold thou fast To the Revelation sent down To thee   verily thou Art on Straight Way
Quran Translation.4367: The  Qur ān  is indeed The Message  for thee And for thy people   And soon shall ye  All  be brought to account
Quran Translation.4368: And question thou Our apostles Whom We sent before thee   Did We appoint any deities Other than  God  Most Gracious  To be worshipped
Quran Translation.4369: We did send Moses Aforetime  with Our Signs  To Pharaoh and his Chiefs   He said    I am an apostle Of the Lord of the Worlds
Quran Translation.4370: But when he came to them With Our Signs  behold  They ridiculed them
Quran Translation.4371: We showed them Sign After Sign  each grater Than its fellow  and We Seized them with Punishment  In order that they Might turn  to Us
Quran Translation.4372: And they said    O thou Sorcerer   Invoke thy Lord For us according to His covenant with thee   For we shall truly Accept guidance
Quran Translation.4373: But when We removed The Penalty from them  Behold  they broke their word
Quran Translation.4374: And Pharaoh proclaimed Among his people  saying     O my people   Does not The dominion of Egypt Belong to me   witness  These streams flowing Underneath my  palace    What   See ye not then
Quran Translation.4375: Am I not better Than this  Moses   who Is a contemptible wretch And can scarcely Express himself clearly
Quran Translation.4376: Then why are not Gold bracelets bestowed On him  or  why  Come  not  with him Angels accompanying him In procession
Quran Translation.4377: Thus did he make Fools of his people  And they obeyed him   Truly were they a people Rebellious  against God
Quran Translation.4378: When at length they Provoked Us  We exacted Retribution from them  and We drowned them all
Quran Translation.4379: And We made them  A people  of the Past And an Example To later ages
Quran Translation.4380: When  Jesus  the son Of Mary is held up As an example  behold  Thy people raise a clamour Thereat  in ridicule
Quran Translation.4381: And they say    Are Our gods best  or he     This they set forth To thee  only by way Of disputation   yea  they Are a contentious people
Quran Translation.4382: He was no more than A servant   We granted Our favour to him  And We made him An example to the Children Of Israel
Quran Translation.4383: And if it were Our Will  We could make angels From amongst you  succeeding Each other on the earth
Quran Translation.4384: And  Jesus  shall be A Sign  for the coming Of  the Hour  of Judgment    Therefore have no doubt About the  Hour   but Follow ye Me   this Is a Straight Way
Quran Translation.4385: Let not the Evil One Hinder you   for he is To you an enemy avowed
Quran Translation.4386: When Jesus came With Clear Signs  he said     Now have I come To you with Wisdom  And in order to make Clear to you some Of the  points  on which Ye dispute   therefore fear God And obey me
Quran Translation.4387: For God  He is my Lord And your Lord   so worship Ye Him   this is A Straight Way
Quran Translation.4388: But sects from among Themselves fell into disagreement   Then woe to the wrong doers  From the Penalty Of a Grievous Day
Quran Translation.4389: Do they only wait For the Hour that it Should come on them All of a sudden  While they perceive not
Quran Translation.4390: Friends on that Day Will be foes  one To another  except The Righteous
Quran Translation.4391: My devotees   No fear shall be On you that Day  Nor shall ye grieve
Quran Translation.4392: Being  those who have believed In Our Signs and bowed  Their wills to Ours  in Islām
Quran Translation.4393: Enter ye the Garden  Ye and your wives  In  beauty and  rejoicing
Quran Translation.4394: To them will be passed Round  dishes and goblets Of gold   there will be There all that the souls Could desire  all that The eyes could delight in   And ye shall abide Therein  for aye
Quran Translation.4395: Such will be the Garden Of which ye are made Heirs for your  good  deeds  In life
Quran Translation.4396: Ye shall have therein Abundance of fruit  from which Ye shall have satisfaction
Quran Translation.4397: The Sinners will be In the Punishment of Hell  To dwell therein  for aye
Quran Translation.4398: Nowise will the  punishment  Be lightened for them  And in despair will they Be there overwhelmed
Quran Translation.4399: Nowise shall We Be unjust to them   But it is they who Have been unjust themselves
Quran Translation.4400: They will cry     O Mālik   Would that thy Lord Put and end to us     He will say    Nay  but Ye shall abide
Quran Translation.4401: Verily We have brought The Truth to you   But most of you Have a hatred for Truth
Quran Translation.4402: What   Have they settled Some Plan  among themselves    But it is We Who Settle things
Quran Translation.4403: Or do they think That We hear not Their secrets and their Private counsels   Indeed  We do   and Our Messengers Are by them  to record
Quran Translation.4404: Say     If  God  Most Gracious Had a son  I would Be the first to worship
Quran Translation.4405: Glory to the Lord Of the heavens and the earth  The Lord of the Throne  Of Authority     He is Free  from the things They attribute  to Him
Quran Translation.4406: So leave them to babble And play  with vanities  Until they meet that Day Of theirs  which they Have been promised
Quran Translation.4407: It is He Who is God In heaven and God on earth   And He is Full Of Wisdom and Knowledge
Quran Translation.4408: And blessed is He To Whom belongs the dominion Of the heavens and the earth  And all between them   With Him is the knowledge Of the Hour  of Judgment    And to Him shall ye Be brought back
Quran Translation.4409: And those whom they invoke Besides God have no power Of intercession   only he Who bears witness to the Truth  And they know  him
Quran Translation.4410: If thou ask them  Who Created them  they will Certainly say  God   how Then are they deluded Away  from the Truth
Quran Translation.4411: God has knowledge  Of the  Prophet s  cry    O my Lord   Truly These are a people Who will not believe
Quran Translation.4412: But turn away from them  And say   Peace     But soon shall they know
Quran Translation.4414: By the Book that Makes things clear
Quran Translation.4415: We sent it down During a blessed night   For We  ever  wish To warn  against Evil
Quran Translation.4416: In that  night  is made Distinct every affair Of wisdom
Quran Translation.4417: By command  from Our Presence  For We  ever  Send  revelations
Quran Translation.4418: As a Mercy From thy Lord   For He hears and knows  All things
Quran Translation.4419: The Lord of the heavens And the earth and all Between them  if ye  but  Have an assured faith
Quran Translation.4420: There is no god but He   It is He Who gives life And gives death   The Lord and Cherisher To you and your earliest Ancestors
Quran Translation.4421: Yet they play about In doubt
Quran Translation.4422: Then watch thou For the Day That the sky will Bring forth a kind Of smoke  or mist  Plainly visible
Quran Translation.4423: Enveloping the people   This will be a Penalty Grievous
Quran Translation.4424: They will say &colon     Our Lord   Remove The Penalty from us  For We do really believe
Quran Translation.4425: How shall the Message Be  effectual  for them  Seeing that an Apostle Explaining things clearly Has  already  come to them
Quran Translation.4426: Yet they turn away From him and say     Tutored  By others   a man possessed
Quran Translation.4427: We shall indeed remove The Penalty for a while   But  truly ye will revert  To your ways
Quran Translation.4428: One day We shall seize You with a mighty onslaught   We will indeed  then  Exact Retribution
Quran Translation.4429: We did  before them  Try the people of Pharaoh   There came to them An apostle most honourable
Quran Translation.4430: Saying     Restore to me The servants of God   I am to you an apostle Worthy of all trust
Quran Translation.4431: And be not arrogant As against God   For I come to you With authority manifest
Quran Translation.4432: For me  I have sought Safety with my Lord And your Lord  against Your injuring me
Quran Translation.4433: If ye believe me not  At least keep yourselves Away from me
Quran Translation.4434: But they were aggressive &colon   Then he cried To his Lord     These are indeed A people given to sin
Quran Translation.4435: The reply came &colon     March forth with My servants By night   for ye are Sure to be pursued
Quran Translation.4436: And leave the sea As a furrow  divided    For they are a host  Destined  to be drowned
Quran Translation.4437: How many were the gardens And springs they left behind
Quran Translation.4438: And corn fields And noble buildings
Quran Translation.4439: And wealth  and conveniences Of life   wherein they Had taken such delight
Quran Translation.4440: Thus  was their end    And We made other people Inherit  those things
Quran Translation.4441: And neither heaven Nor earth shed a tear Over them   nor were They given a respite  again
Quran Translation.4442: We did deliver aforetime The Children of Israel From humiliating Punishment
Quran Translation.4443: Inflicted by Pharaoh  for he Was arrogant  even  among Inordinate transgressors
Quran Translation.4444: And We chose them aforetime Above the nations  knowingly
Quran Translation.4445: And granted them Signs In which there was A manifest trial
Quran Translation.4446: As to these  Quraish   They say forsooth
Quran Translation.4447: There is nothing beyond Our first death  And we shall not Be raised again
Quran Translation.4448: Then bring  back  Our forefathers  if what Ye say is true
Quran Translation.4449: What   are they better Than the people of Tubba  And those who were Before them  We destroyed Them because they were Guilty of sin
Quran Translation.4450: We created not The heavens  the earth  And all between them  Merely in  idle  sport
Quran Translation.4451: We created them not Except for just ends   But most of them Do not understand
Quran Translation.4452: Verily the Day of Sorting Out is the time Appointed for all of them
Quran Translation.4453: The Day when no protector Can avail his client In aught  and no help Can they receive
Quran Translation.4454: Except such as receive God s Mercy   for He is Exalted in Might  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.4456: Will be the food Of the Sinful
Quran Translation.4457: Like molten brass   It will boil In their insides
Quran Translation.4458: Like the boiling Of scalding water
Quran Translation.4459: A voice will cry     Seize ye him And drag him Into the midst Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.4460: Then pour over his head The Penalty of Boiling Water
Quran Translation.4461: Taste thou  this    Truly wast thou Mighty  full of honour
Quran Translation.4462: Truly this is what Ye used to doubt
Quran Translation.4463: As to the Righteous  They will be  in A position of Security
Quran Translation.4465: Dressed in fine silk And in rich brocade  They will face each other
Quran Translation.4466: So   and We shall Join them to Companions With beautiful  big  And lustrous eyes
Quran Translation.4467: There can they call For every kind of fruit In peace and security
Quran Translation.4468: Nor will they there Taste Death  except the first Death   and He will preserve Them from the Penalty Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.4469: As a Bounty from thy Lord   That will be The supreme achievement
Quran Translation.4470: Verily  We have made This  Qur ān  easy  In thy tongue  In order that they May give heed
Quran Translation.4471: So wait thou and watch   For they  too  are waiting
Quran Translation.4473: The revelation Of the Book Is from God The Exalted in Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4474: Verily in the heavens And the earth  are Signs For those who believe
Quran Translation.4475: And in the creation Of yourselves and the fact That animals are scattered  Through the earth   are Signs For those of assured Faith
Quran Translation.4476: And in the alternation Of Night and Day  And the fact that God Sends down Sustenance from The sky  and revives therewith The earth after its death  And the change Of the winds  are Signs For those that are wise
Quran Translation.4477: Such are the Signs Of God  which We rehearse to thee In truth   then in what Exposition will they believe After  rejecting  God And His Signs
Quran Translation.4478: Woe to each sinful Dealer in Falsehoods
Quran Translation.4479: He hears the Signs Of God rehearsed to him  Yet is obstinate and lofty  As if he had not Heard them   then announce To him a Penalty Grievous
Quran Translation.4480: And when he learns Something of Our Signs  He takes them in jest   For such there will be A humiliating Penalty
Quran Translation.4481: In front of them is Hell   and of no profit To them is anything They may have earned  Nor any protectors they May have taken to themselves Besides God   for them Is a tremendous Penalty
Quran Translation.4482: This is  true  Guidance   And for those who reject The Signs of their Lord  Is a grievous Penalty Of abomination
Quran Translation.4483: It is God Who has Subjected the sea to you  That ships may sail Through it by His command  That ye may seek Of His Bounty  and that Ye may be grateful
Quran Translation.4484: And He has subjected To you  as from Him  All that is in the heavens And on earth   behold  In that are Signs indeed For those who reflect
Quran Translation.4485: Tell those who believe  To forgive those who Do not look forward To the Days of God   It is for Him to recompense  For good or ill  each People According to what They have earned
Quran Translation.4486: If any one does A righteous deed It enures to the benefit Of his own soul   If he does evil  It works against  His own soul   In the end will ye  All  be brought back To your Lord
Quran Translation.4487: We did aforetime Grant to the Children Of Israel the Book  The Power of Command  And Prophethood   We gave Them  for Sustenance  things Good and pure   and We Favoured them above the nations
Quran Translation.4488: And We granted them Clear Signs in affairs  Of Religion    it was only After knowledge had been Granted to them that they Fell into schisms  through Insolent envy among themselves  Verily thy Lord will judge Between them on the Day Of Judgement as to those Matters in which they Set up differences
Quran Translation.4489: Then We put thee On the  right  Way Of Religion   so follow Thou that  Way   And follow not the desires Of those who know not
Quran Translation.4490: They will be of no Use to thee in the sight Of God   it is only Wrong doers  that stand as  Protectors  one to another   But God is the Protector Of the Righteous
Quran Translation.4491: These are clear evidences To men  and a Guidance And Mercy to those Of assured Faith
Quran Translation.4492: What   do those who Seek after evil ways Think that We shall Hold them equal with Those who believe and Do righteous deeds  that Equal will be their Life and their death   Ill is the judgment That they make
Quran Translation.4493: God created the heavens And the earth for Just ends  and in order That each soul may find The recompense of what It has earned  and none Of them be wronged
Quran Translation.4494: Then seest thou such A one as takes As his god his own Vain desire   God has  Knowing  him as such   Left him astray  and sealed His hearing and his heart  And understanding   and put A cover on his sight  Who  then  will guide him After God  has withdrawn Guidance    Will ye not Then receive admonition
Quran Translation.4495: And they say     What is There but our life In this world   We shall die and we live  And nothing but Time Can destroy us    But Of that they have no Knowledge   they merely conjecture
Quran Translation.4496: And when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them  Their argument is nothing But this   they say    Bring  Back  our forefathers  if What ye say is true
Quran Translation.4497: Say     It is God Who Gives you life  then Gives you death   then He will gather you together For the Day of Judgement About which there is No doubt     but most Men do not understand
Quran Translation.4498: To God belongs The dominion of the heavens And the earth  and The Day that the Hour Of Judgment is established  That Day will the dealers In Falsehood perish
Quran Translation.4499: And thou wilt see Every sect bowing the knee   Every sect will be called To its Record     This Day Shall ye be recompensed For all that ye did
Quran Translation.4500: This Our Record speaks About you with truth   For We were wont To put on record All that ye did
Quran Translation.4501: Then  as to those who Believed and did righteous Deeds  their Lord will Admit them to His Mercy   That will be the Achievement For all to see
Quran Translation.4502: But as to those who Rejected God   to them Will be said      Were not Our Signs rehearsed to you   But ye were arrogant  And were a people Given to sin
Quran Translation.4503: And when it was said That the promise of God Was true  and that the Hour There was no doubt About its  coming   ye Used to say    We Know not what is The Hour   we only think It is an idea  and we Have no firm assurance
Quran Translation.4504: Then will appear to them The evil  fruits  of what They did  and they will be Completely encircled by that Which they used to mock at
Quran Translation.4505: It will also be said     This Day We will forget You as ye forgot The meeting of this Day Of yours   And your Abode is the Fire  and No helpers have ye
Quran Translation.4506: This  because ye used To take the Signs of God In jest  and the life Of the world deceived you      From  the Day  therefore  They shall not be taken out Thence  nor shall they be Received into Grace
Quran Translation.4507: Then Praise be to God  Lord of the heavens And Lord of the earth  Lord and Cherisher Of all the worlds
Quran Translation.4508: To Him be Glory Throughout the heavens And the earth   and He Is Exalted in Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4510: The revelation Of the Book Is from God The Exalted in Power  Full of Wisdom
Quran Translation.4511: We created not The heavens and the earth And all between them But for just ends  and For a term appointed   But those who reject Faith Turn away from that Whereof they are warned
Quran Translation.4512: Say    Do ye see What it is ye invoke Besides God   Show me What it is they Have created on earth  Or have they a share In the heavens   Bring me a Book  Revealed  before this  Or any remnant of knowledge  Ye may have   if ye Are telling the truth
Quran Translation.4513: And who is more astray Than one who invokes  Besides God  such as will Not answer him to the Day Of Judgement  and who  In fact  are unconscious Of their call  to them
