Quran Translation.5241: He Who created Death And Life  that He May try which of you Is best in deed   And He is the Exalted In Might  Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.5242: He Who created The seven heavens One above another   No want of proportion Wilt thou see In the Creation Of  God  Most Gracious  So turn thy vision again   Seest thou any flaw
Quran Translation.5243: Again turn thy vision A second time    thy  vision Will come back to thee Dull and discomfited  In a state worn out
Quran Translation.5244: And We have   From of old   Adorned the lowest heaven With Lamps  and We Have made such  Lamps   As  missiles to drive away the Evil Ones  And have prepared for them The Penalty Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.5245: For those who reject Their Lord  and Cherisher  Is the Penalty of Hell   And evil is  such  destination
Quran Translation.5246: When they are cast therein  They will hear The  terrible  drawing in Of its breath Even as it blazes forth
Quran Translation.5247: Almost bursting with fury   Every time a Group Is cast therein  its Keepers Will ask    Did no Warner Come to you
Quran Translation.5248: They will say   Yes indeed   A Warner did come to us  But we rejected him And said    God never Sent down any  Message    Ye are in nothing but An egregious delusion
Quran Translation.5249: They will further say     Had we but listened Or used our intelligence  We should not  now  Be among the Companions Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.5250: They will then confess Their sins   but far Will be  Forgiveness  From the Companions Of the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.5251: As for those who Fear their Lord unseen  For them is Forgiveness And a great Reward
Quran Translation.5252: And whether ye hide Your word or publish it  He certainly has  full  knowledge  Of the secrets of  all  hearts
Quran Translation.5253: Should He not know   He that created   And He is the One That understands the finest Mysteries  and  is Well acquainted  with them
Quran Translation.5254: It is He Who has Made the earth manageable For you  so traverse Ye through its tracts And enjoy of the Sustenance Which He furnishes   but Unto Him is the Resur
Quran Translation.5255: Do ye feel secure that He Who is in Heaven Will not cause you To be swallowed up By the earth when it Shakes  as in an earthquake
Quran Translation.5256: Or do ye feel secure That He Who is in Heaven Will not send against you A violent tornado  With showers of stones   So that ye shall Know how  terrible  Was My warning
Quran Translation.5257: But indeed men before them Rejected  My warning    Then how  terrible  was My re   of them
Quran Translation.5258: Do they not observe The birds above them  Spreading their wings And folding them in   None can uphold them Except  God  Most Gracious   Truly it is He That watches over all things
Quran Translation.5259: Nay  who is there That can help you   Even as  an army  Besides  God  Most Merciful   In nothing but delusion Are the Unbelievers
Quran Translation.5260: Or who is there That can provide you With Sustenance if He Were to withhold His provision   Nay  they obstinately persist In insolent impiety And flight  from the Truth
Quran Translation.5261: Is then one who Walks headlong  with his face Grovelling  better guided   Or one who walks Evenly on a Straight Way
Quran Translation.5262: Say     It is He Who Has created you  and made You grow   and made For you the faculties Of hearing  seeing  feeling and understanding   Little thanks it is ye give
Quran Translation.5263: Say     It is He Who Has multiplied you Through the earth  And to Him shall ye Be gathered together
Quran Translation.5264: They ask   When will This promise be  fulfilled     If ye are telling The truth
Quran Translation.5265: Say     As to the knowledge Of the time  it is With God alone   I am  sent  only To warn plainly in public
Quran Translation.5266: At length  when they See it close at hand  Grieved will be the faces Of the Unbelievers  And it will be said  To them      This is  the promise fulfilled   Which ye were calling for
Quran Translation.5267: Say     See ye   If God were To destroy me  And those with me  Or if He bestows His Mercy on us   Yet who can deliver the Unbelievers from A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.5268: Say     He is  God  Most Gracious   we have Believed in Him  And on Him have we Put our trust   So  soon will ye know Which  of us  it is That is in manifest error
Quran Translation.5269: Say    See ye    If your stream be Some morning lost  In the underground earth   Who then can supply you With clear flowing water
Quran Translation.5270: Nun  By the Pen And by the  Record  Which  men  write
Quran Translation.5271: Thou art not  By the grace of thy Lord  Mad or possessed
Quran Translation.5272: Nay  verily for thee Is a Reward unfailing
Quran Translation.5273: And thou  standest  On an exalted standard Of character
Quran Translation.5274: Soon wilt thou see  And they will see
Quran Translation.5275: Which of you is Afflicted with madness
Quran Translation.5276: Verily it is thy Lord That knoweth best  Which  among men  Hath strayed from His Path   And He knoweth best Those who receive  True  Guidance
Quran Translation.5277: So hearken not To those who deny  the Truth
Quran Translation.5278: Their desire is that Thou shouldst be pliant   So would they be pliant
Quran Translation.5279: Need not the type Of despicable man   Ready with oaths
Quran Translation.5280: A slanderer  going about With calumnies
Quran Translation.5281: Habitually  hindering  all  good  Transgressing beyond bounds  Deep in sin
Quran Translation.5282: Violent  and cruel    With all that  base born
Quran Translation.5283: Because he possesses Wealth and  numerous  sons
Quran Translation.5284: When to him are rehearsed Our Signs    Tales of the Ancients    He cries
Quran Translation.5285: Soon shall We brand  The beast  on the snout
Quran Translation.5286: Verily We have tried them As We tried the People Of the Garden  When they resolved to gather The fruits of the  garden  In the morning
Quran Translation.5287: But made no reservation     If it be God s Will
Quran Translation.5288: Then there came On the  garden  A visitation from thy Lord   Which swept away  all around  While they were asleep
Quran Translation.5289: So the  garden  became  By the morning  like A dark and desolate spot   Whose fruit had been gathered
Quran Translation.5290: As the morning broke  They called out  One to another
Quran Translation.5291: Go ye to your tilth  Betimes  in morning  if ye would gather The fruits
Quran Translation.5292: So they departed  conversing In secret low tones   saying
Quran Translation.5293: Let not a single indigent Person break in upon you Into the  garden  this day
Quran Translation.5294: And they opened the morning  Strong in an  unjust  resolve
Quran Translation.5295: But when they saw The  garden   they said    We have surely lost our way
Quran Translation.5296: Indeed we are shut out  Of the fruits of our labor
Quran Translation.5297: Said one of them  More just  than the rest      Did I not say to you    Why not glorify  God
Quran Translation.5298: They said    Glory To our Lord  Verily we Have been doing wrong
Quran Translation.5299: Then they turned  one Against another  in reproach
Quran Translation.5300: They said    Alas for us   We have indeed transgressed
Quran Translation.5301: It may be that our Lord Will give us in exchange A better  garden  than this   for we do turn to Him  In repentance
Quran Translation.5302: Such is the Punishment  In this life    but greater Is the Punishment In the Hereafter   If only they knew
Quran Translation.5303: Verily  for the Righteous  Are Gardens of Delight  In the Presence Of their Lord
Quran Translation.5304: Shall We then treat The People of Faith Like the People of Sin
Quran Translation.5305: What is the matter With you   How judge ye
Quran Translation.5306: Or have ye a Book Through which ye learn
Quran Translation.5307: That ye shall have  Through it whatever Ye choose
Quran Translation.5308: Or have ye Covenants With Us on oath  Reaching to the Day Of Judgment   providing  That ye shall have Whatever ye shall demand
Quran Translation.5309: Ask thou of them  Which of them will stand Surety for that
Quran Translation.5310: Or have they some   Partners    in Godhead    Then let them produce Their   partners    If they are truthful
Quran Translation.5311: The Day that the Shin Shall be laid bare  And they shall be summoned To bow in adoration  But they shall not be able
Quran Translation.5312: Their eyes will be Cast down   ignominy will Cover them   seeing that They had been summoned Aforetime to bow in adoration  While they were whole   And had refused
Quran Translation.5313: Then leave Me alone With such as reject This Message   by degrees Shall We punish them From di s they perceive not
Quran Translation.5314: A  long  respite will I Grant them   truly Powerful is My plan
Quran Translation.5315: Or is it that thou dost Ask them for a reward  So that they are burdened With a load of debt
Quran Translation.5316: Or that the Unseen Is in their hands  so that They can write it down
Quran Translation.5317: So wait with patience For the Command Of thy Lord  and be not Like the Companion Of the Fish   when he Cried out in agony
Quran Translation.5318: Had not Grace From His Lord Reached him  he Would indeed have been Cast off on the naked Shore  in disgrace
Quran Translation.5319: Thus did his Lord Choose him and make him Of the company Of the Righteous
Quran Translation.5320: And the Unbelievers Would almost trip thee up With their eyes when they Hear the Message   and they Say     Surely he is possessed
Quran Translation.5321: But it is nothing less Than a Message To all the worlds
Quran Translation.5324: And what will make Thee realise what The Sure Reality is
Quran Translation.5325: The Thamūd And the  Ād people  Branded  as false The Stunning Calamity
Quran Translation.5326: But the Thamūd   They were destroyed By a terrible Storm Of thunder and lightning
Quran Translation.5327: And the  Ād   They were destroyed By a furious Wind  Exceedingly violent
Quran Translation.5328: He made it rage Against them seven nights And eight days in succession   So that thou couldst see The  whole  people lying Prostrate in its  path   As if they had been Roots of hollow palm trees Tumbled down
Quran Translation.5329: Then seest thou any Of them left surviving
Quran Translation.5330: And Pharaoh  And those before him  And the Cities Overthrown  Committed habitual Sin
Quran Translation.5331: And disobeyed  each  The apostle of their Lord   So He punished them With an abundant Penalty
Quran Translation.5332: We  when the water  Of Noah s flood  overflowed Beyond its limits  Carried you  mankind   In the floating  Ark
Quran Translation.5333: That We might Make it a Message Unto you  and that ears  That should hear the tale And  retain its memory Should bear its  lessons  In remembrance
Quran Translation.5334: Then  when one Blast is sounded On the Trumpet
Quran Translation.5335: And the earth is moved  And its mountains  And they are crushed to powder At one stroke
Quran Translation.5336: On that Day Shall the  Great  Event Come to pass
Quran Translation.5337: And the sky will be Rent asunder  for it will That Day be flimsy
Quran Translation.5338: And the angels will be On its sides  And eight will  that Day  Bear the Throne Of thy Lord above them
Quran Translation.5339: That Day shall ye be Brought to Judgment   Not an act of yours That ye hide will be hidden
Quran Translation.5340: Then he that will be Given his Record In his right hand Will say     Ah here   Read ye my Record
Quran Translation.5341: I did really understand That my Account would  One Day  reach me
Quran Translation.5342: And he will be In a life of Bliss
Quran Translation.5344: The Fruits whereof  Will hang in bunches  Low and near
Quran Translation.5345: Eat ye and drink ye  With full satisfaction   Because of the  good  That ye sent before you  In the days that are gone
Quran Translation.5346: And he that will Be given his Record In his left hand  Will say     Ah   would That my record had not Been given to me
Quran Translation.5347: And that I had never Realised how My account  stood
Quran Translation.5348: Ah   would that  Death  Had made an end of me
Quran Translation.5349: Of no profit to me Has been my wealth
Quran Translation.5350: My power has Perished from me
Quran Translation.5351: The stern command will say      Seize ye him  And bind ye him
Quran Translation.5352: And burn ye him In the Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.5353: Further  make him march In a chain  whereof The length is seventy cubits
Quran Translation.5354: This was he that Would not believe In God Most High
Quran Translation.5355: And would not encourage The feeding of the indigent
Quran Translation.5356: So no friend hath he Here this Day
Quran Translation.5357: Nor hath he any food Except the corruption From the washing of wounds
Quran Translation.5358: Which none do eat But those in sin
Quran Translation.5359: So I do Call to witness What ye see
Quran Translation.5361: That this is Verily the word Of an honoured apostle
Quran Translation.5362: It is not the word Of a poet   Little it is Ye believe
Quran Translation.5363: Nor is it the word Of a soothsayer   Little admonition it is Ye receive
Quran Translation.5364: This is  a Message Sent down from the Lord Of the Worlds
Quran Translation.5365: And if the apostle Were to invent Any sayings in Our name
Quran Translation.5366: We should certainly seize him By his right hand
Quran Translation.5367: And We should certainly Then cut off the artery Of his heart
Quran Translation.5368: Nor could any of you Withhold him  From Our wrath
Quran Translation.5369: But verily this Is a Message for The God fearing
Quran Translation.5370: And We certainly know That there are amongst you Those that reject  it
Quran Translation.5371: But truly  Revelation  Is a cause of sorrow For the Unbelievers
Quran Translation.5372: But verily it is Truth Of assured certainty
Quran Translation.5373: So glorify the name Of thy Lord Most High
Quran Translation.5374: A questioner asked About a Penalty To befall
Quran Translation.5375: The Unbelievers  The which there is none To ward off
Quran Translation.5376: A Penalty  from God  Lord of the Ways Of Ascent
Quran Translation.5377: The angels and The Spirit ascend Unto Him in a Day The measure whereof Is  as  fifty thousand years
Quran Translation.5378: Therefore do thou hold Patience  a Patience Of beautiful  contentment
Quran Translation.5379: They see the  Day  indeed As a far off  event
Quran Translation.5380: But We see it  Quite  near
Quran Translation.5381: The Day that The sky will be like Molten brass
Quran Translation.5382: And the mountains will be Like wool
Quran Translation.5383: And no friend will ask After a friend
Quran Translation.5384: Though they will be put In sight of each other   The sinner s desire will be   Would that he could Redeem himself from The Penalty of that Day By  sacrificing  his children
Quran Translation.5387: And all  all that is On earth  so it could Deliver him
Quran Translation.5388: By no means   For it would be The Fire of Hell
Quran Translation.5389: Plucking out  his being  Right to the skull
Quran Translation.5390: Inviting  all  such As turn their backs And turn away their faces  From the Right
Quran Translation.5391: And collect  wealth  And hide it  from use
Quran Translation.5392: Truly man was created Very impatient
Quran Translation.5394: And niggardly when Good reaches him
Quran Translation.5395: Not so those devoted To Prayer
Quran Translation.5396: Those who remain steadfast To their prayer
Quran Translation.5397: And those in whose wealth Is a recognised right
Quran Translation.5398: For the  needy  who asks And him who is prevented  For some reason from asking
Quran Translation.5399: And those who hold To the truth of the Day Of Judgment
Quran Translation.5400: And those who fear The displeasure of their Lord
Quran Translation.5401: For their Lord s displeasure Is the opposite of Peace And Tranquillity
Quran Translation.5402: And those who guard Their chastity
Quran Translation.5403: Except with their wives And the  captives  whom Their right hands possess   For  then  they are not To be blamed
Quran Translation.5404: But those who trespass Beyond this are transgressors
Quran Translation.5405: And those who respect Their trusts and covenants
Quran Translation.5406: And those who stand firm In their testimonies
Quran Translation.5407: And those who guard  The sacredness  of their worship
Quran Translation.5408: Such will be The honoured ones In the Gardens  of Bliss
Quran Translation.5409: Now what is The matter with the Unbelievers That they rush madly Before thee
Quran Translation.5410: From the right And from the left In crowds
Quran Translation.5411: Does every man of them Long to enter The Garden of Bliss
Quran Translation.5412: By no means   For We have created them Out of the  base matter  They know
Quran Translation.5413: Now I do Call to witness The Lord of all points In the East and the West That We can certainly
Quran Translation.5414: Substitute for them Better  men  than they   And We are not To be defeated  In Our Plan
Quran Translation.5415: So leave them To plunge in vain talk And play about  Until they encounter That Day of theirs which They have been promised
Quran Translation.5416: The Day whereon They will issue From their sepulchres In sudden haste As if they were Rushing to a goal post  Fixed for them
Quran Translation.5417: Their eyes lowered In de    Ignominy covering them  All over    Such is the Day The which they Are promised
Quran Translation.5418: We sent Noah To his People  With the Command       Do thou warn thy People Before there comes to them A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.5419: He said     O my People  I am to you A Warner  clear and open
Quran Translation.5420: That ye should worship God  fear Him  And obey me
Quran Translation.5421: So He may forgive you Your sins and give you Respite for a stated Term   For when the Term given By God is accomplished  It cannot be put forward   If ye only knew
Quran Translation.5422: He said     O my Lord   I have called to my People Night and day
Quran Translation.5423: But my call only Increases  their  flight  From the Right
Quran Translation.5424: And every time I have Called to them  that Thou Mightest forgive them  They have  only  thrust Their fingers into their ears  Covered themselves up with Their garments  grown obstinate And given themselves up To arrogance
Quran Translation.5425: So I have called to them Aloud
Quran Translation.5426: Further I have spoken To them in public And secretly in private
Quran Translation.5427: Saying   Ask forgiveness From your Lord   For He is Oft Forgiving
Quran Translation.5428: He will send rain To you in abundance
Quran Translation.5429: Give you increase In wealth and sons   And bestow on you Gardens and bestow on you Rivers  of flowing water
Quran Translation.5430: What is the matter With you  that ye Place not your hope For kindness and long suffering In God
Quran Translation.5431: Seeing that it is He That has created you In diverse stages
Quran Translation.5432: See ye not How God has created The seven heavens One above another
Quran Translation.5433: And made the moon A light in their midst  And made the sun As a  Glorious  Lamp
Quran Translation.5434: And God has produced You from the earth  Growing  gradually
Quran Translation.5435: And in the End He will return you Into the  earth  And raise you forth  Again at the Resur
Quran Translation.5436: And God has made The earth for you As a carpet  spread out
Quran Translation.5437: That ye may go about Therein  in spacious roads
Quran Translation.5438: Noah said    O my Lord   They have disobeyed me  But they follow  men  Whose wealth and children Give them no Increase But only Loss
Quran Translation.5439: And they have devised A tremendous Plot
Quran Translation.5440: And they have said  To each other     Abandon not your gods   Abandon neither Wadd Nor Suwā   neither Yagūth nor Ya ūq  Nor Nasr
Quran Translation.5441: They have already Misled many   and Grant Thou no increase To the wrong doers but in Straying  from their mark
Quran Translation.5442: Because of their sins They were drowned  In the flood   And were made to enter The Fire  of Punishment    And they found  In lieu of God  None to help them
Quran Translation.5443: And Noah said     O my Lord   Leave not Of the Unbelievers  A single one on earth
Quran Translation.5444: For  if Thou dost leave  Any of  them  they will But mislead Thy devotees  And they will breed none But wicked ungrateful ones
Quran Translation.5445: O my Lord   Forgive me  My parents  all who Enter my house in Faith  And  all  believing men And believing women   And to the wrong doers Grant Thou no increase But in Perdition
Quran Translation.5446: Say   It has been Revealed to me that A company of Jinns Listened  to the Qur ān   They said    We have Really heard a wonderful Recital
Quran Translation.5447: It gives guidance To the Right  And we have believed therein   We shall not join  in worship  Any  gods  with our Lord
Quran Translation.5448: And exalted is the Majesty Of our Lord   He has Taken neither a wife Nor a son
Quran Translation.5449: There were some foolish ones Among us  who used To utter extravagant lies Against God
Quran Translation.5450: But we do think That no man or spirit Should say aught that is Untrue against God
Quran Translation.5451: True  there were persons Among mankind who took shelter With persons among the Jinns  But they increased them In folly
Quran Translation.5452: And they  came to  think As ye thought  that God Would not raise up Any one  to Judgment
Quran Translation.5453: And we pried into The secrets of heaven   But we found it filled With stern guards And flaming fires
Quran Translation.5454: We used  indeed  to sit there In  hidden  stations  to  steal  A hearing   but any Who listens now Will find a flaming fire Watching him in ambush
Quran Translation.5455: And we understand not Whether ill is intended To those on earth  Or whether their Lord  Really  intends to guide Them to right conduct
Quran Translation.5456: There are among us Some that are righteous  And some the contrary   We follow divergent paths
Quran Translation.5457: But we think that we Can by no means frustrate God throughout the earth  Nor can we frustrate Him By flight
Quran Translation.5458: And as for us  Since we have listened To the Guidance  we have Accepted it   and any Who believes in his Lord Has no fear  either Of a short  account  Or of any injustice
Quran Translation.5459: Amongst us are some That submit their wills  To God   and some That swerve from justice  Now those who submit Their wills they have Sought out  the path  Of right conduct
Quran Translation.5460: But those who swerve   They are  but  fuel For Hell Fire
Quran Translation.5461: And God s Message is      If they  The pagans  Had  only  remained On the  right  Way  We should certainly have Bestowed on them Rain In abundance
Quran Translation.5462: That We might try them By that  means   But if any turns away From the remembrance Of his Lord  He will Cause him to undergo A severe Penalty
Quran Translation.5463: And the places of worship Are for God  alone    So invoke not any one Along with God
Quran Translation.5464: Yet when the Devotee Of God stands forth To invoke Him  they just Make round him a dense crowd
Quran Translation.5465: Say     I do No more than invoke My Lord  and I join not With Him any  false god
Quran Translation.5466: Say     It is not In my power to cause You harm  or to bring You to right conduct
Quran Translation.5467: Say     No one can Deliver me from God  If I were to disobey Him   Nor should I find refuge Except in Him
Quran Translation.5468: Unless I proclaim what I receive from God And His Messages   For any that disobey God And His Apostle  for them Is Hell   they shall dwell Therein for ever
Quran Translation.5469: At length  when they See  with their own eyes  That which they are promised   Then will they know Who it is that is Weakest in  his  helper And least important In point of numbers
Quran Translation.5470: Say     I know not whether The  Punishment  which ye Are promised is near  Or whether my Lord Will appoint for it A distant term
Quran Translation.5471: He  alone  knows the Unseen  Nor does He make any one Acquainted with His Mysteries
Quran Translation.5472: Except an apostle Whom He has chosen   And then He makes A band of watchers March before him And behind him
Quran Translation.5473: That he may know That they have  truly  Brought and delivered The Messages of their Lord   And He surrounds  All the mysteries  that are With them  and takes account Of every single thing
Quran Translation.5475: Stand  to prayer  by night  But not all night
Quran Translation.5476: Half of it   Or a little less
Quran Translation.5477: Or a little more   And recite the Qur ān In slow  measured rhythmic tones
Quran Translation.5478: Soon shall We send down To thee a weighty Message
Quran Translation.5479: Truly the rising by night Is most potent for governing  The soul   and most suitable For  framing  the Word  Of Prayer and Praise
Quran Translation.5480: True  there is for thee By day prolonged occupation With ordinary duties
Quran Translation.5481: But keep in remembrance The name of thy Lord And devote thyself To Him whole heartedly
Quran Translation.5482: He is  Lord of the East And the West   there is No god but He   Take Him therefore For  thy  Disposer of Affairs
Quran Translation.5483: And have patience with what They say  and leave them With noble  dignity
Quran Translation.5484: And leave Me  Alone to deal with  Those in possession of The good things of life  Who  yet  deny the Truth   And bear with them For a little while
Quran Translation.5485: With Us are Fetters  To bind them   and a Fire  To burn them
Quran Translation.5486: And a Food that chokes  And a Penalty Grievous
Quran Translation.5487: One Day the earth And the mountains Will be in violent commotion  And the mountains will be As a heap of sand Poured out and flowing down
Quran Translation.5488: We have sent to you   O men    an apostle  To be a witness concerning you  Even as We sent An apostle to Pharaoh
Quran Translation.5489: But Pharaoh disobeyed The apostle   so We Seized him with A heavy Punishment
Quran Translation.5490: Then how shall ye  If ye deny  God   Guard yourselves against A Day that will make Children hoary headed
Quran Translation.5491: Whereon the sky will be Cleft asunder   His Promise needs must Be accomplished
Quran Translation.5492: Verily this is an Admonition   Therefore  whoso will  let him Take a  straight  path To his Lord
Quran Translation.5493: Thy Lord doth know That thou standest forth  To prayer  nigh two thirds Of the night  or half The night  or a third Of the night  and so doth A party of those with thee  But God doth appoint Night And Day in due measure  He knoweth that ye are Unable to keep count thereof  So He hath turned to you  In mercy    read ye  Therefore  of the Qur ān As much as may be Easy for you  He knoweth That there may be  some  Among you in ill health   Others traveling through the land  Seeking of God s bounty   Yet others fighting In God s Cause  Read ye  Therefore  as much of the Qur an As may be easy  for you    And establish regular Prayer And give regular Charity   and loan to God A Beautiful Loan  And whatever good Ye send forth For your souls  Ye shall find it In God s Presence   Yea  better and Greater  in Reward  And seek ye the Grace Of God   for God is Oft Forgiving  Most Merciful
Quran Translation.5494: O thou wrapped up  In a mantle
Quran Translation.5496: And thy Lord Do thou magnify
Quran Translation.5497: And thy garments Keep free from stain
Quran Translation.5499: Nor expect  in giving  Any increase  for thyself
Quran Translation.5500: But  for thy Lord s  Cause   Be patient and constant
Quran Translation.5501: Finally  when the trumpet Is sounded
Quran Translation.5502: That will be that Day  A Day of Distress
Quran Translation.5503: Far from easy For those without Faith
Quran Translation.5504: Leave Me alone   to deal  With the  creature  whom I created  bare and  alone
Quran Translation.5505: To whom I granted Resources in abundance
Quran Translation.5506: And sons to be By his side
Quran Translation.5507: To whom I made  Life  smooth and comfortable
Quran Translation.5508: Yet is he greedy  That I should add  Yet more
Quran Translation.5509: By no means   For to Our Signs He has been refractory
Quran Translation.5510: Soon will I visit him With a mount of calamities
Quran Translation.5511: For he thought And he plotted
Quran Translation.5512: And woe to him   How he plotted
Quran Translation.5513: Yea  woe to him   How he plotted
Quran Translation.5515: Then he frowned And he scowled
Quran Translation.5516: Then he turned back And was haughty
Quran Translation.5517: Then said he     This is nothing but magic  Derived from of old
Quran Translation.5518: This is nothing but The word of a mortal
Quran Translation.5519: Soon will I Cast him into Hell Fire
Quran Translation.5520: And what will explain To thee what Hell Fire is
Quran Translation.5521: Naught doth it permit To endure  and naught Doth it leave alone
Quran Translation.5522: Darkening and changing The colour of man
Quran Translation.5524: And We have set none But angels as guardians Of the Fire   and We Have fixed their number Only as a trial For Unbelievers  in order That the people of the Book May arrive at certainty  And the Believers may increase In Faith   and that no doubts May be left for the People Of the Book and the Believers  And that those in whose hearts Is a disease and the Unbelievers May say    What symbol Doth God intend by this     Thus doth God leave to stray Whom He pleaseth and guide Whom He pleaseth   and none Can know the forces Of the Lord  except He  And this is no other than A warning to mankind
Quran Translation.5526: And by the Night As it retreateth
Quran Translation.5527: And by the Dawn As it shineth forth
Quran Translation.5528: This is but one Of the mighty  portents
Quran Translation.5530: To any of you that Chooses to press forward  Or to follow behind
Quran Translation.5531: Every soul will be  held  In pledge for its deeds
Quran Translation.5532: Except the Companions Of the Right Hand
Quran Translation.5533: They will be  in Gardens  of Delight    they will Question each other
Quran Translation.5535: What led you into Hell Fire
Quran Translation.5536: They will say    We were not of those Who prayed
Quran Translation.5537: Nor were we of those Who fed the indigent
Quran Translation.5538: But we used to talk Vanities with vain talkers
Quran Translation.5539: And we used to deny The Day of Judgment
Quran Translation.5540: Until there came to us  The Hour  that is certain
Quran Translation.5541: Then will no intercession Of  any  intercessors Profit them
Quran Translation.5542: Then what is The matter with them That they turn away From admonition
Quran Translation.5543: As if they were Affrighted asses
Quran Translation.5545: Forsooth  each one of them Wants to be given Scrolls  of revelation  spread out
Quran Translation.5546: By no means  But They fear not the Hereafter
Quran Translation.5547: Nay  this surely Is an admonition
Quran Translation.5548: Let any who will  Keep it in remembrance
Quran Translation.5549: But none will keep it In remembrance except As God wills   He Is the Lord of Righteousness  And the Lord of Forgiveness
Quran Translation.5550: I do call to witness The Resur  Day
Quran Translation.5551: And I do call to witness The self reproaching spirit    Eschew Evil
Quran Translation.5552: Does man think that We Cannot assemble his bones
Quran Translation.5553: Nay  We are able to put Together in perfect order The very tips of his fingers
Quran Translation.5554: But man wishes to do Wrong  even  in the time In front of him
Quran Translation.5555: He questions    When Is the Day of Resur
Quran Translation.5556: At length  when The Sight is dazed
Quran Translation.5557: And the moon is Buried in darkness
Quran Translation.5558: And the sun and moon Are joined together
Quran Translation.5559: That Day will Man say     Where is the refuge
Quran Translation.5560: By no means   No place of safety
Quran Translation.5561: Before thy Lord  alone   That Day will be The place of rest
Quran Translation.5562: That Day will Man Be told  all  that he Put forward  and all That he put back
Quran Translation.5563: Nay  man will be Evidence against himself
Quran Translation.5564: Even though he were To put up his excuses
Quran Translation.5565: Move not thy tongue Concerning the  Qur ān  to make haste therewith
Quran Translation.5566: It is for Us to collect it And to promulgate it
Quran Translation.5567: But when We have Promulgated it  follow thou Its recital  as promulgated
Quran Translation.5568: Nay more  it is For Us to explain it  And make it clear
Quran Translation.5569: Nay   ye men    But ye love The fleeting life
Quran Translation.5571: Some faces  that Day  Will beam  in brightness And beauty
Quran Translation.5573: And some faces that Day  Will be sad and dismal
Quran Translation.5574: In the thought that some Back breaking calamity was about To be inflicted on them
Quran Translation.5575: Yea  when  the soul  Reaches to the collar bone  in its exit
Quran Translation.5576: And there will be a cry    Who is a magician  To restore him
Quran Translation.5577: And he will conclude That it was  the Time  Of Parting
Quran Translation.5578: And one leg will be Joined with another
Quran Translation.5579: That Day the Drive Will be  all  to thy Lord
Quran Translation.5580: So he gave nothing In charity  nor Did he pray
Quran Translation.5581: But on the contrary  He rejected Truth And turned away
Quran Translation.5582: Then did he stalk To his family In full conceit
Quran Translation.5583: Woe to thee   O man    yea  woe
Quran Translation.5584: Again  woe to thee   O man     yea  woe
Quran Translation.5585: Does Man think That he will be left Uncontrolled   without purpose
Quran Translation.5586: Was he not a drop Of sperm emitted  In lowly form
Quran Translation.5587: Then did he become A leech like clot   Then did  God  make And fashion  him  In due proportion
Quran Translation.5588: And of him He made Two sexes  male And female
Quran Translation.5589: Has not He   the same   The power to give life To the dead
Quran Translation.5590: Has there not been Over Man a long period Of Time  when he was Nothing  not even  mentioned
Quran Translation.5591: Verily We created Man from a drop Of mingled sperm  In order to try him   So We gave him  the gifts   Of Hearing and Sight
Quran Translation.5592: We showed him the Way   Whether he be grateful Or ungrateful  rests on his will
Quran Translation.5593: For the Rejecters We have prepared Chains  Yokes and A Blazing Fire
Quran Translation.5594: As to the Righteous  They shall drink Of a Cup  of Wine  Mixed with Kafur
Quran Translation.5595: A Fountain where The Devotees of God Do drink  making it Flow in unstinted abundance
Quran Translation.5596: They perform  their  vows  And they fear a Day Whose evil flies far and wide
Quran Translation.5597: And they feed  for the love Of God  the indigent  The orphan  and the captive
Quran Translation.5598: Saying     We feed you for the sake of God alone   No reward do we desire From you nor thanks
Quran Translation.5599: We only fear a Day Of distressful Wrath From the side of our Lord
Quran Translation.5600: But God will deliver Them from the evil Of that Day  and will Shed over them a light Of Beauty and A  blissful  Joy
Quran Translation.5601: And because they were Patient and constant  He will Reward them with a Garden And  garments of  silk
Quran Translation.5602: Reclining in the  Garden  On raised thrones  They will see there neither The sun s  excessive heat  Nor  the moon s  excessive cold
Quran Translation.5603: And the shades of the  Garden  Will come low over them  And the bunches  of fruit   There  will hang low In humility
Quran Translation.5604: And amongst them will be Passed round vessels of silver And goblets of crystal
Quran Translation.5605: Crystal clear  made of silver   They will determine The measure thereof  According to their wishes
Quran Translation.5606: And they will be given To drink there of a Cup  of Wine  mixed With Zanjabil
Quran Translation.5608: And round about them Will  serve  youths Of perpetual  freshness    If thou seest them  Thou wouldst think them Scattered Pearls
Quran Translation.5609: And when thou lookest  It is there thou wilt see A Bliss and A Realm Magnificent
Quran Translation.5610: Upon them will be Green Garments of fine silk And heavy brocade  And they will be adorned With Bracelets of silver   And their Lord will Give to them to drink Of a Wine Pure and Holy
Quran Translation.5611: Verily this is a Reward For you  and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised
Quran Translation.5612: It is We Who Have sent down the Qur ān To thee by stages
Quran Translation.5613: Therefore be patient With constancy to the Command Of thy Lord  and hearken not To the sinner or the ingrate Among them
Quran Translation.5614: And celebrate the name Of thy Lord morning And evening
Quran Translation.5615: And part of the night  Prostrate thyself to Him   And glorify Him   A long night through
Quran Translation.5616: As to these  they love The fleeting life  And put away behind them A Day  that will be  hard
Quran Translation.5617: It is We Who created Them  and We have made Their joints strong   But  when We will  We can substitute The like of them By a complete change
Quran Translation.5618: This is an admonition   Whosoever will  let him Take a  straight  Path to his Lord
Quran Translation.5619: But ye will not  Except as God wills   For God is full of Knowledge and Wisdom
Quran Translation.5620: He will admit To His Mercy Whom He will   But the wrong doers   For them has He prepared A grievous Penalty
Quran Translation.5621: By the  Winds  Sent Forth One after another  To man s profit
Quran Translation.5622: Which then blow violently In tempestuous Gusts
Quran Translation.5623: And scatter  things  Far and wide
Quran Translation.5624: Then separate them  One from another
Quran Translation.5626: Whether of Justification Or of Warning
Quran Translation.5627: Assuredly  what ye are Promised must come to pass
Quran Translation.5628: Then when the stars Become dim
Quran Translation.5629: When the heaven Is cleft asunder
Quran Translation.5630: When the mountains are Scattered  to the winds  as dust
Quran Translation.5631: And when the apostles Are  all  appointed a time  To collect
Quran Translation.5632: For what Day Are these  Portents  deferred
Quran Translation.5633: For the Day of Sorting out
Quran Translation.5634: And what will explain To thee what is The Day of Sorting out
Quran Translation.5635: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5636: Did We not destroy The men of old  For their evil
Quran Translation.5637: So shall We make Later  generations  Follow them
Quran Translation.5638: Thus do We deal With men of sin
Quran Translation.5639: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5640: Have We not created You from a fluid  Held  despicable
Quran Translation.5641: The which We placed In a place of rest  Firmly fixed
Quran Translation.5642: For a period  of gestation  Determined  according to need
Quran Translation.5643: For We do determine  According to need    for We Are the Best to determine  things
Quran Translation.5644: Ah woe  that Day   To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5645: Have We not made The earth  as a place  To draw together
Quran Translation.5647: And made therein Mountains standing firm  Lofty  in stature    And provided for you Water sweet  and wholesome
Quran Translation.5648: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5649: It will be said &colon     Depart ye to that Which ye used to reject As false
Quran Translation.5650: Depart ye to a Shadow  Of smoke ascending  In three columns
Quran Translation.5651: Which yields  no shade Of coolness  and is Of no use against The fierce Blaze
Quran Translation.5652: Indeed it throws about Sparks  huge  as Forts
Quran Translation.5653: As if there were  A string of  yellow camels  Marching swiftly
Quran Translation.5654: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5655: That will be a Day When they shall not Be able to speak
Quran Translation.5656: Nor will it be Open to them To put forth pleas
Quran Translation.5657: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5658: That will be a Day Of Sorting out   We shall Gather you together And those before  you
Quran Translation.5659: Now  if ye have A trick  or plot   use it against Me
Quran Translation.5660: Ah woe  that Day  To the Rejecters of Truth
Quran Translation.5661: As to the Righteous  They shall be amidst  Cool  shades and springs  Of water
Quran Translation.5662: And  they shall have  Fruits   all they desire
Quran Translation.5663: Eat ye and drink ye To your heart s content   For that ye worked  Righteousness
